Diana, Princess of Wales
Diana, Princess of Wales, wazalwa or (née), Diana.
Benjamin Franklin wayeyipolymath Melika, oyayehala ukusuka 1706 - 1790.
Isisila senkukhu sibonwa mhla ligquthayo
Ubunjani bomntu buvela mhla anomsindo okanye kukubi
A UMzalwan’ uJoseph ngumKristu ongumKatolika, othabatha aze abazise abo bamlandelayo ngolwazi oluphathelele isiphelo sehlabathi. Olu lwazi luthatyathwe kwiimboni, ezinjengoLuz de Maria, abathi bayivile imiyalezo evela eZulwini. Kodwa asinguye yedwa weli qela. Amanye amajelo amaKatolika akhupha iividiyo ezingesiphelo sehlabathi. imiyalezo Kule miyalezo kuthiwa inxalenye enkulu yoluntu iya kufa ngenxa yokuba baye bahlukana kakhulu noThixo, kwaye kuphela abo bangamaKatolika abaya kukwazi ukuzisindisa, ukuguquka nokuguqula. Ikwabonisa ukuba icawe iyazikhwebula, njengoPopu uFrancis ethuka amaKristu, okanye ukutyunjwa kwe-antipope kunye neeleta eziyimfihlo ngokunjalo. Konke oku kuya kwenzeka kungekudala, kodwa kwixesha elizayo elingenammiselo.
Amakhonkco angaphandle.
A UPawulos waseTarsio ngumpostile. unegama lakhe lantlandlolo, uSawule, yaye emva koko, uPawulos, elompostile. USawule waguqukela kukholo olutsha emva kokuwa ehasheni lakhe endleleni eya eDamasko waza waba nombono awathi kuwo uYesu wambiza esithi: “Sawule, Sawule, unditshutshiselani na? Emva kokufunda imigaqo yolu nqulo lutsha kuHananiya, waguquka waza wathabatha igama elitsha likaPawulos, esiba ngumsasazi oqinisekileyo nozimiseleyo wesigidimi sikaKristu. Wabhala iileta, ngoku eziyinxalenye yeBhayibhile.￼
A uxolo. yintoni uxolo? uxolo yimvakalelo yokuba sempilweni ngaphandle koxinzelelo okanye ixhala, kwaye lufunwa ziinkonzo ezininzi. KubuKristu, uxolo luya kuhlala luhleli ukuba ubani uziphatha kakuhle ebomini, elandela iBhayibhile. Enye intsingiselo eqhelekileyo yokuxhalaba kukungabikho kweemfazwe.￼
A iosephu yintshukumo (hayi inkolo engqondweni yakho) ebandakanya ukukholelwa kuyo yonke into umzalwana ujoseph, umKrestu ongumKatolika, uthi. Enyanisweni, iziprofeto ezingokupheliswa kwehlabathi ziphuma kuye. Ezi ziprofeto, ezifunyenwe kwiimboni eziquka uLuz de Maria, zithetha ngeenyikima, izikhukula, ukuwa kwecawa, nentaphane yezinye izinto athi ziyinyaniso. Nabani na oyixhasayo uba nguiosephu.
Non Praevalebunt ngumjelo we-youtube womzalwana uYosefu, lowo unenjongo yokuba isiphelo sehlabathi siza kufika ngokukhawuleza ngaphandle kokuba siguquke. kweli jelo, kunye nerumble, joseph uthumela olu lwazi, luxutywe nemithandazo nezinye.
Amakhonkco angaphandle.
I-Ave Maria ngumthandazo obalulekileyo wamaKristu njengoko ifuna ukuphakamisa uMariya, unina kaYesu.
Bulisa uMariya ozele lubabalo, iNkosi yi nawe. Usikelelwe wena phakathi kwabafazi, usikelelwe isiqhamo sesizalo sakho uYesu.Mariya Ongcwele, unina kaYesu, sithandazele thina boni ngoku, nangexesha lokufa kwethu amen.
Idolophu yaseWillow eyonwabileyo yi - anime yeTV yaseJapan esekwekuncwadi lwabantwana bakaKenneth Graham , iTanoshii Kawabe . Iziqendu ezingama-26 zizonke. Usasazo ukusuka ngo-Oktobha 7, 1993 ukuya kuMatshi 31, 1994 kwiTV Tokyo , isikhululo semveliso .
Ukwenza into kodwa uyazazi iziphumo zalo nto uyenzayo.Lifana nqwa nelithi Uxhents'uzombelela. (@Oyama H.Dondolo umbhali.)
Yonke into iqala emehlweni.
Akukho nzwan'ingenasiphako
Yonke inamacala amabini.(Oyama H.Dondolo)
Isandla sesona siphelo sikude selungu ngalinye elingasentla emzimbeni womntu. Ixhotyiswe ngeminwe emi-5, inokwakheka okuntsonkothileyo, okubandakanya amathambo amaninzi, amalungu, imithambo, izihlunu kunye nemisipha. Ngaphezu koko, inokugcinwa kakuhle kunye nenethiwekhi eyinkimbinkimbi yemithambo yegazi.
Isandla sinemisebenzi eyahlukahlukeneyo: ikuvumela ukuba ubambe izinto, usebenze njengelungu lengqiqo ethintekayo, ikuvumela ukuba unxibelelane kwaye uqinisekise uzinzo kubantwana abasahamba kuzo zonke ezine. Iingxaki eziqhelekileyo ezinokuchaphazela isandla kukuphuka kwamathambo.
“NdinguYehova uThixo wakho, owakukhuphayo ezweni laseYiputa, endlwini yobukhoboka; ungabi nathixo bambi ngaphandle kwam. Uze ungazenzeli umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, nokuba ngowantoni na esemazulwini, nokuba yeyokuphantsi emhlabeni, nesemanzini aphantsi komhlaba. Uze ungaqubudi phambi kwazo, ungazikhonzi.” ( Eks 20:2-5 ) Kubhaliwe kwathiwa: “Uze unqule uYehova uThixo wakho, umkhonze yena yedwa” Xa umntu ekhetha ubukhoboka obutofotofo phezu kwenkululeko edinisayo. ukhonza izithixo. Utyekelo lomntu kukubeka into ethile njengeyona nto ibalulekileyo kubomi bukabani akulungeleyo ukuchitha ixesha efuna ulonwabo oluyimfuneko nolwanelisayo. Inkanuko yesithixo inyanzelisa ukulawulwa rhoqo kwamandla, athi, ethubeni, afunxwe ngokupheleleyo ngamabinzana ngokweminqweno okanye iminqweno kabani. Nangona kunzima ukuyichaza, izithixo zomntu zinokuba zingenakubalwa: amandla, imali okanye inyama yinxalenye yaloo mizekelo yenkcubeko yangoku ebekwe embindini wobuntu bakhe. Ngoxa izithixo ezinjalo namhlanje zingenakushenxiswa, akukho nto yimbi uThixo ayivumayo ebandakanyekileyo njengaye, njengoko ezivakalisa ukuba unguThixo onekhwele. Nangona kunjalo, ikhwele eluntwini yimbonakaliso egqibeleleyo yeso sivumelwano sokholo apho ubani athembisa ukubeka iNkosi kwincopho yezenzo zikabani, ukuze afumane inzuzo ayithembisayo ngokutshintshiselana nokuthembeka. Izithixo, ngelixa zinika ulonwabo lokuqala, zidala iziyobisi eziyityhefu, zithatha kancinci inkululeko esifuna ukuyinika isithixo endaweni yoko. Ke ngoko, ikhwele libubungqina obengeziweyo bomgcini kunye nenkathalo. Wonke umntu unesithuba sokuzalisa, ukuba akukho ndawo yeNkosi, abanye oothixo baya kuthatha isithuba, belungele ukubeka iingcambu ezonakalisayo, ke ngoko, ukuthintela oku kungenzeki, umntu makangaweli kwiziphazamiso ezinetyala, elungisa ukuthanda kwakhe nokuzibophelela kwakhe. usukelo olubalaseleyo olukhokelela kokuphela koThixo okhululayo. Ngoko ke, umyalelo wokuqala usisenzo sokuzithanda. Ukwenza yonke imidla yentlalo ngokucokisekileyo akusokuze kukhotyokiswe, endaweni yoko, kwinkululeko epheleleyo, uThixo ubonakala njengobuthixo obukhoyo nobuphaphileyo.
Umntla womzimba apho kukho amalungu hlanu: incasa, ivumba, ukuva, ukubona kunye nokubamba, nangona kunjalo ikwasasazeke kuwo wonke umzimba. Ngaphakathi kukho ubuchopho. idityaniswe ngomzimba ngokubulela entanyeni.
Indlovu ayisindwa ngumboko wayo
"Indlovu ayisindwa ngumboko wayo" ithetha ukuba umntu akasindwa ngumthwalo wakhe.
Intamo yingingqi yomzimba edibanisa umqala nomzimba kwaye ivumela ukuphefumla nokugaya 
iliwa inqanawa liliwa elifumaneka eItali, kufutshane nesiqithi sasePanarea. ilitye kwindawo yalo ephezulu liphezulu iimitha ezingama-49, kwaye likhulu nge-0.0042 km2.
I-Edinburgh Enye yezona zikhulu esikhulu kunye nekomkhulu laseScotland, ummandla we-United Kingdom.
Nalu uluhlu langqaqa aseItali:
iliwa iSpinazzola liliwa lase-Italiya kwiziqithi zaseAeolian eSicily. Ngokulawulwayo yeyaLipari, kwiphondo laseMessina. inkulu 0.0055 km2
Iliwa laseFaraglione liliwa lase-Italiya, eliseziqithini zaseAeolian, malunga neemitha ezingama-300 ukusuka kwisiqithi saseSalina. iliwa linemvelaphi yentaba-mlilo kwaye likhulu nge-0,0049 km2.
IFoggia sisixeko esiseItali, kwingingqi yePuglia, nakwiphondo elibizwa ngegama elinye.
IMilan sisixeko esikhulu kunye nekomkhulu lommandla weLombardy eItali
ICuneo liphondo kwingingqi yasePiedmont, ummandla waseItali
ICerignola sisixeko esikwiphondo laseFoggia, iphondo elikummandla wePuglia, ummandla wase-Itali
IAmsterdam sesona sixeko sikhulu kunye nekomkhulu laseNetherlands, kwiphondo laseNorth Holland
ILondon sesona sixeko sikhulu kunye nekomkhulu laseUnited Kingdom
esi sixeko sesinye sezona zixeko zikhulu eYurophu
IOslo likomkhulu laseNorway, ikhaya elinabantu abamalunga nama-700,000. Ukuqwalasela kwakhona ummandla wonke we-metropolitan, abantu bafikelela malunga ne-1.5 yezigidi
IMadrid likomkhulu laseSpain. Bamalunga nezigidi ezi-3.2 abantu abahlala eMadrid, kodwa kuyo yonke idolophu abantu beza. 7.5 yezigidi zabantu.
ILisbon likomkhulu lasePortugal, likhaya labantu abamalunga nama-500,000. Inommandla ongaphezulu nje kweekhilomitha ezili-100 zesikwere
IRoma likomkhulu kunye nesona sixeko sinabantu abaninzi e-Itali. IRoma yayisisixeko esibalulekileyo embalini kuba yayilikomkhulu loBukhosi baseRoma.
IZagreb likomkhulu laseCroatia. malunga ne-7,7 yezigidi zabantu abahlala apho. ithatha indawo ye-641 square metres.
Imfazwe yehlabathi yokuqala
imfazwe yehlabathi yokuqala, ekwabizwa ngokuba yimfazwe enkulu, yimfazwe ebandakanya inxalenye enkulu yehlabathi, kwaye eyachasana namazwe e-axis ((iJamani, i-Austria-Hungary njl...) kunye namahlakani (ubukhosi baseNgilani, iFransi, iRussia njl...)
Yintoni igama eliqhelekileyo, kwaye ngoko intsingiselo yalo inokuqondwa kuphela kwimeko yesivakalisi
iphepha zizinto eziphuma emithini kwaye zisetyenziselwa ukubhala, kusetyenziswa i-inki.
I-Taipei 101 yindawo yesihlanu ubude emhlabeni. Igama layo livela kwimigangatho yayo, oko kukuthi 101. I-skyscraper yi-509.20 yeemitha ukuphakama. ITaipei 101 ikwilizwe laseTaiwan eAsia.
ICathaya ngumthi osoloko uluhlaza onokukhula ube ziimitha ezingama-40. Ukuphela kweentlobo eziphilayo ngoku yiCathaya agyrophilla Ihlala e-China kumaphondo aseGuangxi, eGuizhou naseHunan.
Uhlaselo lwase-Ukraine eRashiya
uhlaselo lwase-ukrainian lwase-russia lungquzulwano olubekwe e-ukraine, olwaqala ngoFebruwari 24, 2022, kwaye lusaqhubeka nanamhlanje. imimandla enqotshiweyo yiCrimea, eyaba yiRashiya esele ivele kwi-2014, kunye ne-Donbass, engekahluthwa ngokupheleleyo. ngaphezu koko, umcu waseRashiya unokubonwa ukusuka ekupheleni kweUkraine ukusuka kuMlambo iDnepr kwaye unobunzima beekhilomitha eziliqela kwaye unabela malunga nemilinganiselo efanayo, ukuya ekupheleni komphambili.
I-Superheroes yenye yemvumi uMnu Rain. Ingoma ebiyinxalenye yomnyhadala wesanremo 2023. Nabantwana bacule kule ngoma.
ngokuwa kobukhosi be-ottoman, i-romania esemazantsi, i-serbia kunye nelinye ilizwe lazimela. i-pan-Slavism ngumnqweno wokumanyanisa bonke abemi baseSerbia kubukumkani obunye, kwaye ekubeni iSerbia ngoku ibe bubukumkani obubodwa, yayinokwenzeka. into embi nakuba, ukuba enye intsimi Slavic kwaba ezandleni Austro-Hungarian Empire. oku kunokugqalwa njengesizathu semfazwe yehlabathi yokuqala, kuba iiserbs zahlasela i-archduke njalo njalo
iicrustaceans ziiarthropods ezihlala kakhulu emanzini. kwii-costaceans kukho iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zezilwanyana, ezifana ne-crab, i-cladocera, i-cirriperi, i-tantulocaridi kunye nokunye.
ukuba ndiyakwazi ukuyiqwalasela, mhlawumbi ungayidlulisela kummelwane wakho. ihempe sisigqubuthelo somzimba, nangona kufanele ukuba sele igqunywe ngehempe yangaphantsi. ngaphezu koko, ihempe ithathwa njengengubo
ICampomarino lido liqhezu likamasipala waseCampomarino. ihamlet kunye nomasipala kwiphondo laseCampobasso. iphondo laseCampobasso likwingingqi yaseMolise, edume ngelithi alikho. UMolise useItali
Iphupha inkwenkwezi iqhosha impumlo
 iphupha inkwenkwezi iqhosha impumlo
" I-Yume no Hoshi akukho Impumlo yeqhosha " ( Yume no Hoshi akukho Impumlo yeqhosha ) i- anime ye esasazwa kwi -TV ye-Asahi ukususela ngo-Oktobha 19, 1985 ukuya kwi -26 ka-Aprili 1986 . Idityaniswe yi- Asahi Broadcasting Corporation (ABC) kunye neSanrio . Ukusasazwa kweendawo zokubeka iMigqibelo nganye ukusuka kwi-19: 00 ukuya ku-19: 30 ( JST ). Iziqendu ezingama-26 zizonke.
Oopopayi bokuqala beTV kaSanrio  , i-anime ebonisa umlinganiswa we -Button Nose ka-Sanrio njengomlinganiswa ophambili. Kwiisetingi ezisemthethweni zikaSanrio, igama lokwenyani leButton Nose nguTrish, kodwa kwi-anime, yiNose yeqhosha, hayi iTrish.
Ividiyo ngokwayo yayisele igqityiwe ngo  1983 , kodwa kwakuyiminyaka emibini kamva ukuba ngokwenene yaboniswa kumabonakude .
Intombazana eneminyaka eyi-8 ehlala kwi-Strawberry Research Institute, i-Button Nose inzala yentsapho yasebukhosini yaseFukland Kingdom kwiplanethi yaseCalitontou. Ngenye imini, xa wayetyelele iPlanethi Calitontou, umalume wakhe, ukumkani, uDuke Fastener, wafumana itrone. I-Buttonnose, eyathi yaba ngukumkani woBukumkani baseHookland, iya kuchitha iintsuku ezimnandi eBukumkanini baseHookland [

 *Irekhodi enye: Ishishini loMculo likaVictor , iRekhodi yeNombolo. I-KV-3072
 (yakhutshwa ngo-Oktobha 20, 1985)
 *Irekhodi lesandi: Ishishini loMculo likaVictor , iRekhodi yeNombolo. JBX-25083, Umculo Tape No.VCK-6167
 (yakhutshwa ngoDisemba 16, 1985)
 * I-albhamu ye-CD: "I-Toy Chara Pop Collection Vol.2 Fancy &amp; Kawaii Edition" ( Ultra Vibe , Matshi 22, 2017, CDSOL-1781) Iingoma ze-26 kunye ne-27 ziquka ezi ngasentla ezimbini zeengoma zeengoma  .
Ibali lelali yaseTyroline
 "Chirorin Mura Monogatari" ngumsebenzi woopopayi beTV owasasazwa kwi-NHK Educational TV ukusuka ngo-Epreli 6, 1992 ukuya kuMatshi 19, 1993. 170 iziqephu zizonke.
I-Tschukundu kunye ne-Indlovu zizikhephe ezitsalwayo, ezakhiwe eMzantsi Afrika yi -Farocean Marine ukuyilwa ngabakhi beenqanawa baseDamen iDamen Group . Uyilo lwe-tug lwalusekelwe kwi- Damen Stan Tug 2006 . Iinqanawa zinezaphetha ezikhethekileyo zokuphatha iinkwili zoMkhosi waManzi woMzantsi Afrika . Zaziswa ngoFebruwari 2006 kwizibuk lasekhaya laseSimonstown .
I-National Ports Authority yaseMzantsi Afrika ikwasebenzisa i-crane edadayo ebizwa ngokuba yi "-Indlovu", ezinze eThekwini . 
indlovu idla ngokufumaneka kwiisekisi, izakhiwo zokufumana umvuzo
IConservatory yaseBari
I- Niccolò Piccinni Conservatory ( : "Conservatorio Niccolò Piccinni"
) yasekwa ngumculi we-violinist kunye nomgxeki womculo u-Giovanni Capaldi ngo-1925, kunye nekomkhulu e-Villa Bucciero, eBari, eItali. Yayisisikolo seshumi elinesine somculo esivela e-Itali. Eyokuqala yadalwa njengemfundo yomculo kwisikolo samabanga aphakamileyo ("Liceo Musicale"), kwi-1937 yaguqulwa yaba yi- conservatory, kwaye yaqanjwa ngokuhlonipha umqambi waseNtaliyane wenkulungwane yeshumi elinesibhozo uNiccolò Piccinni . 
le Conservatory ibekwe eBari, ikomkhulu lengingqi yePuglia yelizwe laseItali
Kumthetho nakurhulumente, de jure ( ; , ) ichaza izenzo ezamkelwa ngokusemthethweni, kungakhathaliseki nokuba isenzo sikho ngokwenyani. Ngokwahlukileyo, ("enyanisweni") ichaza iimeko ezikhoyo ngokwenyani, nokuba akukho jit ngokusemthethweni. 
isetyenziswa kwiinkalo ezahlukeneyo, kubandakanywa naleyo yamazwe: de jure ukuba urhulumente uyintoni na ephepheni kunye ne-facto ukuba yintoni kanye kanye.
Umgangatho "we-de facto" sisithethe okanye isivumelwano esifumene isikhundla esiphezulu ngokwamkelwa koluntu okanye amandla emarike (umzekelo, ngokungena kwangoko kwimarike ). De facto is a Latin phrase (literally "in fact"), here meaning "in practice but not necessarily ordained by law" or "in practice or actuality, but not officially established".
Igama elithi "de facto" standard lisetyenziswa ngokuchaseneyo nemigangatho echazwa yimibutho okanye emiselwe ngumthetho (ekwaziwa ngokuba yi "-de jure" standards ), okanye ukuvakalisa umgangatho obalaseleyo wokuzithandela xa kukho umgangatho omnye okhoyo wokusetyenziswa okufanayo. &lt;ref name=":0"&gt;
ngamanye amaxesha isetyenziswe kumxholo welizwe: i-de jure ichongiwe njengento ekwiphepha, kodwa i-facto i-state ayinalo uhlobo lwe-republic okanye uhlobo lombuso.
Icawa yindawo yokuhlanganisana yamaKristu, nokuba angamaKatolika, amaOthodoki okanye amaProtestanti
ISerbia &lt;/img&gt; , ; IsiSerbian : Србија, Srbija, &lt;/img&gt; ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseSerbia ( Serbian : Република Србија, Republika Srbija, &lt;/img&gt; ), lilizwe elivaliweyo kuMzantsi-mpuma nakuMbindi Yurophu, emi ekudibaneni kweendlela zePannonian Basin kunye neeBalkans . Yabelana ngemida yomhlaba kunye neHungary ukuya emantla, iRomania ukuya emantla-mpuma, iBulgaria ukuya empuma-mpuma, kuMantla eMacedonia ukuya emazantsi, iCroatia kunye neBosnia kunye neHerzegovina ngasentshona, kunye neMontenegro kumazantsi-ntshona, kwaye ibango lomda kunye neAlbania ngokusebenzisa ingxabano. ummandla waseKosovo . I-Serbia ngaphandle kwe-Kosovo inabemi malunga ne-6.7 yezigidi, malunga ne-8.4 yezigidi ukuba i-Kosovo ifakiwe. 
I-serbia yazalwa ngokuqhekeka kwe-yougoslavia kunye ne-serbia kunye ne-montenegro, ngaloo ndlela ikhokelela ekwakhiweni kwe-serbia.
Egypt ( IsiArabhu: مصر‎ Miṣr , ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yase-Arab yaseYiputa, lilizwe elinqumla ilizwekazi elihamba kwikona ekumntla-mpuma we-Afrika nakwikona ekumzantsi-ntshona we-Asiya ngebhulorho yomhlaba eyenziwe nguSingasiqithi weSinayi . Idalwe luLwandle lweMeditera ukuya emantla, iGaza Strip yasePalestine kunye noSirayeli ngasemantla-mpuma, uLwandle oluBomvu ngasempuma, iSudan emazantsi, kunye neLibhiya ngasentshona . Igophe laseAqaba kumntla-mpuma lohlula iJiphutha kwiJordan kunye neSaudi Arabia . ICairo likomkhulu kunye nesona sixeko sikhulu saseYiputa, ngelixa iAlexandria, isixeko sesibini ngobukhulu, siyindawo ebalulekileyo yemizi-mveliso kunye nabakhenkethi kunxweme lweMeditera . Kubemi abamalunga ne-100 lezigidi, iYiputa ililizwe le -14 ngokuba nabemi abaninzi emhlabeni .
Nangona impucuko yokuqala yavela kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo, ilizwe lanamhlanje laseYiputa lazalwa kuphela ngenkulungwane yama-20, xa iBritish Egypt yabhengeza inkululeko.
IOstriya, ngokusesikweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseOstriya, lilizwe elivaliweyo kumazantsi oMbindi Yurophu, emi kwiMpuma yeAlps . Ngumanyano lwamazwe alithoba, elinye lawo lilikomkhulu, iVienna, esona sixeko sinabantu abaninzi kunye norhulumente. IOstriya ijikelezwe yiJamani emantla-ntshona, iRiphabliki yaseCzech ukuya emantla, iSlovakia ukuya emantla-mpuma, iHungary ngasempuma, iSlovenia ne- Itali emazantsi, kunye neSwitzerland kunye neLiechtenstein ngasentshona. Ilizwe lithatha indawo engama- kwaye inabemi abazizigidi ezili-9. 
Ngaphambi kweMfazwe Yehlabathi I, uBukumkani baseOstriya babumanyaniswa noBukumkani baseHungary, kunye nezinye iintlanga, baba ngumbuso omnye omkhulu, obizwa ngokuba yi "Austro-Hungarian Empire"
IsiPhuthukezi ( ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yesiPhuthukezi ( isiphuthukezi: "República Portuguesa" ), lilizwe elikuSingasiqithi we -Iberia, kumazantsi-ntshona eYurophu, kwaye ummandla walo ukwabandakanya iziqithi zeAtlantiki zaseAzores naseMadeira . Ibonisa eyona ndawo yasentshona kwilizwekazi laseYurophu, kwaye isahlulo sayo sase Iberia sinomda ngasentshona nasezantsi kuLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki ukuya emantla nasempuma yiSpain, elona lizwe likuphela kwalo ukuba nomda womhlaba nePortugal . Iiarchipelagos zayo ezimbini zenza imimandla emibini ezimeleyo enoorhulumente bazo bemimandla . 
Ikomkhulu lasePortugal yiLisbon, isixeko esinabemi abamalunga nama-500,000
IUnited Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, eyaziwa njengeUnited Kingdom ( UK ) okanye iBritane, lilizwe elizimeleyo kunye nelizwe eYurophu, ukusuka kunxweme olukumantla-ntshona welizwekazi lelizwekazi . . Iquka iNgilani, iSkotlani, iWales kunye noMntla Ireland . I-United Kingdom ibandakanya isiqithi saseGreat Britain, indawo ekumntla-mpuma wesiqithi saseIreland, kunye neziqithi ezininzi ezincinci kwiBritish Isles . UMntla Ireland wabelana ngomda womhlaba kunye neRiphabhliki yaseIreland ; ngaphandle koko, i-United Kingdom ijikelezwe yi-Atlantic Ocean, i -North Sea, i- English Channel, i- Celtic Sea kunye noLwandle lwase-Irish . Iyonke indawo yaseUnited Kingdom , kuqikelelwa ukuba ngama-2020 abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-67. 
ubukumkani obumanyeneyo bakha baba nobukhosi obukhulu, obugqalwa njengobona bukhosi bukhulu embalini. nanamhlanje eminye imimandla eyenziwe ziziqithi ezincinci kulwandle kunye neminye imimandla engazimele.
UJudith Ortiz Cofer (ngoFebruwari 24, 1952 - Disemba 30, 2016) wayengumbhali wasePuerto Rican. Waziwa kakhulu ngemisebenzi yakhe yokuyila engeyonyani kwaye imisebenzi yakhe yeyokuveza iiyantlukwano kunye nezikhewu ezivelayo phakathi kwelifa lakhe lenkcubeko eyahluliweyo. Umsebenzi wakhe uphinda uphonononge izifundo ezinjengobuhlanga kunye nocalucalulo ngokwesini kwinkcubeko yaseMelika. Wayekwangumbhali n wencwadi yabantwana. Izihloko abhale ngazo malunga nomsebenzi wakhe: "Ibali loThando eliqala ngeSpanish", "Ukufikelela kwi-Mainland kunye neeNkongo eziNtsha ezikhethiweyo", "iMiqathango yokusinda", kunye "nembongi ephezulu", "i-Animal Jamboree / La Fiesta De Los Animales: Latino Folktales / Leyendas", kunye ne "-A" . "Ibheyile!" "/Masidanise" . Uninzi lwezihloko zakhe zimalunga nabantwana, izilwanyana nothando. UJudith Ortiz Cofer uvotelwe kwiHolo yababhali baseGeorgia yodumo "lwefame" .
UJudith Ortíz Cofer wazalelwa kuYesu uLugo Ortíz kunye noFanny Morot eHormigueros, ePuerto Rico, ngoFebruwari 24, 1952. Wafudukela ePaterson, eNew Jersey kunye nosapho lwakhe ngo-1956. UMorot (umama wakhe) wazala uJudith Ortíz Cofer xa wayeneminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu ubudala. . T bakholelwa ukuba baya kuba namathuba amaninzi kubazali abancinci eMelika. Nangona uLugo (uyise) wayethanda kakhulu ukusebenza eyunivesithi, wayeka isikolo waza wajoyina i- US Navy . Kamva, wabelwa ePanama xa kwazalwa intombi yakhe. Wadibana noJudith Ortiz Cofer okokuqala kwiminyaka emibini kamva. Ukufuduka kosapho lwakhe ukusuka ePuerto Rico ukuya eNew Jersey kwaba nefuthe ekubhaleni kwakhe.
Indlela athe waba ngumbhali ngayo.
Umsebenzi ka-Ortiz Cofer unokubizwa ngokuba yi-creative nonfiction. Isimbo sakhe sokubalisa saphenjelelwa kukubaliswa kwamabali omlomo, awaphefumlelwa ngumakhulu wakhe. EPuerto Rico, isiko labo kukubalisa amabali. Waqala umsebenzi wakhe wokubhala ngomsebenzi wemibongo, "iLatin Deli." Wonyulwa kwiBhaso lePulitzer. Eminye imisebenzi yakhe iphonononga iindidi ngeendidi, edibanisa imibongo, intsomi emfutshane, kunye nebali lobuqu. Imisebenzi ka-Ortiz Cofer ihlala igxile ekuphileni ubomi bakhe phakathi kweenkcubeko ezimbini, iMelika kunye nePuerto Rican, kunye nendlela oku kwazisa ngayo izimvo zakhe njengombhali. Umsebenzi wakhe uphinda uphonononge izifundo ezinjengobuhlanga kunye nocalucalulo ngokwesini kwinkcubeko yaseMelika.
UVirginia Esther Hamilton (ngoMatshi 12, 1934 – Februwari 19, 2002) wayengumbhali weencwadi zabantwana wase-Afrika-waseMelika . Wazalelwa kwaye wakhulela eYellow Springs, eOhio .
Umama kaVirginia Hamilton yayingu-Etta Bella Perry Hamilton kwaye utata wakhe yayinguKenneth James Hamilton. Ufunde kwiKholeji yaseAntiyokwe, kwiYunivesithi yaseOhio State, nakwiSikolo esitsha soPhando lweNtlalo. NgoMatshi 19, 1960 uHamilton watshata noArnold Adoff. Babenabantwana ababini kunye, uLeigh Hamilton Adoff kunye noJamie Levi Adoff. 
UVirginia Hamilton ubhale ikakhulu malunga neentsomi zase-Afrika zaseMelika kunye nelifa lemveli. U-Hamilton wabhala amabali akhe kuqala ecinga malunga nokulinganiswa kwabalinganiswa, iisetingi, kunye nemixholo, emva koko echukumisa imixholo yobuhlanga. Wabhala nangemibandela yasekuhlaleni, usukuzwano lwabantwana bakowenu nengcinezelo yoontanga. 
Ufumene iimbasa ezininzi ngokubhala kwakhe. Ku "-MC Higgins, Omkhulu", ibali lenkwenkwe emnyama ekhule ihlwempu eMzantsi, iphumelele i-US National Book Award kunye ne- Newbery Medal ngo-1975. Ukuphumelela ebomini, waphumelela iMbasa yezizwe ngezizwe yeHans Christian Andersen yokubhala uncwadi lwabantwana ngo-1992 kunye neMbasa yeLaura Ingalls Wilder ngo-1995 Ngenxa yocalucalulo ngokobuhlanga kuma-Afrika aseMelika ngexesha lobomi bakhe, impumelelo yakhe ibaluleke kakhulu.
Usweleke eDayton, eOhio ngenxa yomhlaza wamabele . 
&lt;templatestyles src="Infobox/style.css" /&gt;
UMelanie Joy (owazalwa nge-2 kaSeptemba, 1966) yingcali yengqondo yaseMelika kunye nombhali. Waziwa ngokudala igama elithi carnism, esisifundo kunye nophando malunga nobudlelwane babantu nezilwanyana kunye nezilwanyana zasekhaya. Ungumongameli ongumseki weqela leenkxaso ezingenzi nzuzo iBeyond Carnism. Wayengunjingalwazi wezengqondo kunye nezentlalo yoluntu kwiYunivesithi yaseMassachusetts eBoston . 
UMary Morrissy (owazalwa nge-25 kaJanuwari 1957) ngumbhali wenoveli waseIreland kunye nombhali webali elifutshane. Ubhala kubugcisa, intsomi kunye nembali. UMorrissy lilungu elikhethiweyo le- Aosdána, i-academy yase-Ireland yamagcisa kunye nababhali.
UMorrissy wazalelwa eDublin. Umntu ophumelele kwiKholeji yaseRathmines kunye neTekhnoloji yeYunivesithi yaseDublin, ufundise ukubhala ngobuchule e-Ireland nase-United States of America, ngokukodwa kwiYunivesithi yaseDublin, kwiKholeji yaseTrinity eDublin, kwiYunivesithi yase-Iowa, nakwiYunivesithi yaseCork . UMorrissy uqeqeshelwe ukuba yintatheli kwaye usebenze njengentatheli/umbhali/umhleli/umhleli ongaphantsi kweentsuku ezintathu zelizwe laseIreland. Ukwangumgxeki oye waphonononga iintsomi zeThe "Irish Times", "iPosi yoShishino lwangeCawa", kunye "noPhononongo lweencwadi zaseDublin" . 
Kupapasho lwengqokelela yakhe yokuqala yamabali amafutshane, "A Lazy Eye", (1993) uCandice Rodd wabhala "kwiThe Independent" : “UMorrissy akalogqirha wengqondo; zizele bubomi be-microbial kunye namandla angaqondakaliyo, aguqukayo. " "IThe New York Times" ichaze le ngqokelela “njengengqokelela yamabali abhalwe ngobuchule neyothusayo”. 
UMorrissy wayengumfo kwiThala leeNcwadi loLuntu laseNew York ngo-2005-6, apho wayephanda ngobomi bukaDade kaSean O'Casey, uBella, eyapapashwa emva koko "njengoKunyuka kukaBella Casey" ngo-2013. UAlfred Hickling uphonononge inoveli ekwiThe "Guardian" : “UMorrissy uhlaziya ibali likaBella ngeliso elichazayo ngeenkcukacha ezingahambelaniyo. Ipiyano ethe tye eshiywe esitratweni ngexesha lokunyuka kwe-Ista ivula i-portal kumaxesha atyebileyo; Ngelixa amandla akhe ngokuchasene nentlupheko kunye neempembelelo zamadoda angenasimilo naxhaphazayo ebeka ithempleyithi yamaqhawekazi emidlalo yomninawa wakhe: 'Abalinganiswa abasele bezelwe kwaye besele belungile, bezulazula kumagumbi abo angenangqondo befuna umbhali. " 
Kwi-2008-9 Morrissy wabamba isikhundla sikaJenny McKean Moore Umbhali-kwindawo yokuhlala kwiYunivesithi yaseGeorge Washington . 
Kwi-2015, uMorrissy waqeshwa njengoMhlohli kwi-Creative Writing kwi-University College Cork. 
UMorrissy upapashe "inoveli eqhumayo" -ingqokelela edibeneyo yamabali amafutshane ngo-2016. Ephonononga incwadi ethi "The Guardian", uClaire Kilroy wabhala: “ "Prosperity Drive" yincwadi ethetha ngesini nokufa. Abadlali baphambili - 'i-roll call yabonakeleyo nabalahlekileyo' - badibana bobabini kodwa abakwazi ukuyiphatha. Uvelwano, ukukhawuleza, uburharha kunye nobumnandi apho uMorrissy abonisa iingxaki zabo zikhokelela kumzuzu wobunzulu. ” 
Ngoku uMorrissy usebenza njengomqeqeshi wokubhala, enika iingcebiso zobuchule bomntu omnye, ukuhlela kunye neenkonzo zovavanyo kubabhali. 
UPatty Aubrey ngumbhali waseMelika osuka eCalifornia . Uye waqulunqa "iSobho seNkuku yoMphefumlo uchungechunge", kuquka "iSobho seNkuku yoMphefumlo wamaKristu."
Intshatsheli yokuxhotyiswa kwabasetyhini, u-Aubrey wabhala incwadi yabasetyhini kuphela, "ISophu yenkukhu yoMphefumlo woMfazi ongumKristu." Le ncwadi inamabali okwenene amabhinqa ajamelene nocelomngeni, amaxesha anzima nokuhlaziya ukholo lukabani. Izahluko ziquka Ukholo, Uthando Lwentsapho, Amandla KaThixo Okuphilisa, Ubuhlobo, Ukwenza Umahluko, Ucelomngeni Nemimangaliso. 
Wavela "Vuka!" Umboniso weTV ngo-2015. Ngo-2017 waboniswa kwimuvi ethi "The Soul of Success." Imibhalo yakhe iqatshelwe njengebalulekile kuhlobo lokuzinceda. Ube negalelo kwiincwadi ezahlukeneyo kwiinkalo zokuzinceda, ingqondo nomzimba, ukuqeqesha, imiba yobomi, imali, impumelelo, kunye nokusungula izinto ezintsha. Umbhali uLisa Nichols wabhala ukuba uAubrey "ngamandla anokwenzeka". Iincwadi zakhe zazithathwa njengezona zibalulekileyo kwiincwadi zokuzinceda.
I-Chicken Soul yoMphefumlo wamaKristu nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Isuphu yenkukhu yoMphefumlo woMfazi ongumKristu nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Isobho seNkuku kuMphefumlo kaMama omtsha nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
I-Chicken Soup ye-Soul Sisters nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Isuphu yenkukhu yoMphefumlo woMthandi woLwandle nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Utata oyiNtombi yoMphefumlo weSophu yenkukhu nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
I-Chicken Soup yoMphefumlo oMtsha ongumKristu nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Isuphu yenkukhu yoMphefumlo woomama abalindelekileyo nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Isuphu yenkukhu yoMphefumlo wabasindileyo boMhlaza nguJack Canfield kunye noMark Victor Hansen kunye noPatty Aubery
Isobho seNkukhu kuMphefumlo osindileyo nguJack Canfield, uBernie S. Siegel, kunye noPatty Aubrey.
Imvume inikelwe nguKate Butler Cpsc kunye noPatty Aubrey.
Thatha amandla akho nguPatty Aubery kunye noMark Mirkovich.
UMary Morrissey (owazalwa ngo-1949) ngumbhali waseMelika kunye netshantliziyo lokungaxhatshazwa kwamazwe ngamazwe. Ungumbhali "woKwakha iNdawo Yakho yamaphupha," exelela ubunzima bukaMorrissey kunye nezifundo kubomi bakhe bokuqala. Ukwangumbhali wencwadi ethi "Akukho Ngaphantsi Kobukhulu," incwadi emalunga nokuphilisa ubudlelwane. Ngowama-2002 waqokelela waza wahlela incwadi ethi "New Thought: A Practical Spirituality." 
Umbhali waseMelika uWayne Dyer wambiza ngokuba "ngomnye wabafundisi abacinga kakhulu ngexesha lethu." 
Esebenzayo ukusuka kumsebenzi wakhe wokuqala wokunceda abantu bamazwe ngamazwe, uMorrissey waseka i-Association for Global New Thinking ngo-1995 kwaye wayengumongameli wayo wokuqala. 
Ngo-1997 wadibanisa izandla nomzukulwana ka -Mahatma Gandhi, u-Arun Gandhi, ekusekeni "iXesha lezizwe ngezizwe lokuNonviolence" . Ukususela ngoJanuwari 2019, "iXesha lokuNgena koBundlobongela" labhiyozelwa kwihlabathi jikelele njengethuba "lokudibanisa uluntu, ukubaxhobisa ukuba babone kwaye bancede ukudala ihlabathi elingenabundlobongela." 
Kwincwadi yakhe, "i-Shadow Medicine: I-Placebo kwi-Conventional and Alternative Therapies," uJohn S. Haller ulumkisa ukuba ezinye iindlela zonyango, ezifana nokunikezelwa nguMary Morrissey, akufanele zithathwe njengento ethatha indawo yonyango oluqhelekileyo. 
Le Fabuleux Destin d'Amélie Poulain
I-Fabulous Destiny ka-Amélie Poulain yifilim yeFranco-German kaJean-Pierre Jeunet, eyakhutshwa ngo-2001.
Yinto ehlekisayo yothando ebhalwe nguJean-Pierre Jeunet kunye noGuillaume Laurant kunye no-Audrey Tautou kwindima yesihloko. Le filimu yaphefumlelwa ngokuthe ngqo yinyaniso ebomini bombhali uMichel Folco.
Lo mboniso bhanyabhanya luphawu loqobo kwaye ngamanye amaxesha olufanelekileyo kubomi bangoku eParis kwisithili saseMontmartre. Yenye yezona mpumelelo zinkulu zentengiso yehlabathi jikelele kwifilimu yesiFrentshi. Ifilimu ifumene iimbasa ezininzi, kunye nokuchongwa okuninzi kubandakanya ishumi elinesithathu kwiiCésars kunye nabahlanu kwiiOscars.
Ngo-2002, waphumelela iiCésars ezine, kuquka iFilimu eBalaseleyo kunye noMlawuli oMnandi.
Yakhawulwa ngoSeptemba 3, 1973, ngo-6: 28: 32 pm, ukusuka ekuqhameni kwe-oocyte evela kuNksk. Amandine Poulain, née Fouet, ngesidoda sikaMnu. Enghien - iibhafu.
U-Amélie Poulain wakhula eyedwa kwabanye abantwana ngenxa yokuba uyise, ugqirha we-taciturn, wamfumanisa ngokuphosakeleyo ukuba unesifo sentliziyo: utata wakhe akazange amchukumise ngaphandle kovavanyo lwezonyango, kungoko yabaleka ukubetha kwentliziyo yakhe xa wayeyilinganisa. Umama wakhe, kanye njengokuba utata wakhe ethintelwa, uyasweleka xa u-Amélie esemncinci, wabethwa ngempazamo ngumkhenkethi waseQuebec owayegqibe ukuzibulala ngokutsiba encochoyini yeCathedral yaseNotre-Dame eParis. Uyise emva koko urhoxa ngakumbi kwaye unikezela ubomi bakhe kulwakhiwo lwe-maniacal enikezelwe kumfazi wakhe ongasekhoyo. Eshiywe kwizixhobo zakhe, u-Amélie uphuhlisa umbono osisityebi ngendlela emangalisayo.
Ekubeni sele elibhinqa eliselula, u-Amélie yiweyitara kwivenkile yokutya eMontmartre, iCafé des 2 Moulins, eqhutywa ngulowo wayesakuba yigcisa lesekisi, esoloko ehlala ngabasebenzi abanemibala kunye nabathengi. Xa wayeneminyaka engama-23, uAmélie uphila ubomi obulula; Ulushiyile lonke ubudlelwane obuneemvakalelo emva kwemizamo engaphumeleliyo, uthanda ulonwabo olulula njengokukrazula i-creme brûlée ngecephe, ukutsiba umjelo waseSaint-Martin, efaka isandla sakhe engxoweni yeenkozo, ezama ukuqikelela ukuba zingakanani na izibini zaseParis. i-orgasm ngalo lonke ixesha (“Ishumi elinesihlanu!” usebezela ikhamera) kwaye uvumele iingcinga zabo ukuba zibaleke.
Ubomi bakhe batshintsha kakhulu ngobusuku bokusweleka kweNkosazana uDiana ngo-Agasti 31, 1997. Kuthotho lweemeko ezilandela umothuko wesibhengezo, wabhaqa emva kwebhodi engavalwanga kwigumbi lakhe lokuhlambela ibhokisi yentsimbi endala yebergamot yaseNancy waseLefèvre Georges. ikonefikhi ezaliswe ziinkumbulo ezifihlwe yinkwenkwe eyayihlala kwindlu yakhe kwiminyaka engama-40 ngaphambi kwayo. Echukumisekile kukufunyanwa kwakhe, uzimisele ukufumana umntu omdala ngoku obeke ibhokisi ukuze ayibuyisele kuye, ngelixa esenza isivumelwano naye: ukuba uyamfumana kwaye uyamvuyisa, uya kuzinikela ubomi bakhe ukunceda. abanye, kungenjalo embi kakhulu.
Emva kweempazamo ezimbalwa kunye nomsebenzi wobucuphi obucokisekileyo (encediswa nguRaymond Dufayel, umzobi obizwa ngokuba "yindoda yeglasi" ngenxa ye-osteogenesis engafezekanga), ubeka izandla zakhe kulwazi lwalowo wayesakuba ngumhlali weendawo, ubeka ibhokisi ngaphakathi. indawo yokufowuna yakhalisa ifowuni ukutsala le ndoda njengoko idlula. Xa evula ibhokisi, ufumana isityhilelo. Zonke iinkumbulo zakhe zobuntwana ezilityelweyo zithi qatha engqondweni yakhe. Uyamlandela ekude ukuya kwindawo yentselo aze amjonge engakhange azityhile. Ebona imiphumo emihle kuye, ugqiba kwelokuba asasaze okulungileyo kubomi babanye. U-Amélie emva koko uba luhlobo lwengelosi eyimfihlo egcina i-matchmaker. Ucenga uyise ukuba azalisekise iphupha lakhe lokujikeleza ihlabathi (ngoncedo lwe-me yegadi nain de jardin kunye nomhlobo wegosa). Kwakhona ubeka iisenti zakhe ezimbini kubomi babantu adibana nabo emsebenzini, ngaphezu koko uyakwazi ukuba ababini kubo bathandane: uGeorgette, i-hypochondriac, kunye noJoseph, indoda enomona ngokukhethekileyo. Ukwabhala ileta yomgunyathi ebhalela umphathiswa wakhe odandatheke kakhulu ukususela oko kwasweleka umyeni wakhe, ileta ekutyholwa ukuba yabhalwa ngumyeni, neyathi yabekwa gwenxa kwiminyaka engamashumi amane eyadlulayo yiPosi; ngelixa ephindezela uLucien ngenxa yengqumbo eqhubekayo athi umphathi wakhe, uMnu. Collignon, abe phezu kwakhe.
Kodwa ngoxa ebakhathalele abanye, akukho bani umkhathaleleyo. Ngokunceda abanye ukuba bafumane ulonwabo lwabo, ujongana nobomi bakhe obubodwa, enxulumanisa noMama Teresa, kunye nobudlelwane bakhe obunesiphithiphithi noNino Quincampoix, owayesengumntwana, eyinkwenkwe ebethayo yabahlobo bakhe basesikolweni, kwaye ngoku uyivenkile ethengisa ngesondo eselula. Unobhala wenkundla oqokelela iifoto zesazisi eziphoswe phantsi kweefoto zefoto kwaye athandane naye, ayizukunceda imicimbi. Nangona emenza umdla ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo zobuqhophololo zokumhenda (kubandakanya uhlobo lokuzingela ubutyebi ukuze afumane enye yealbham yeefoto zakhe ezilahlekileyo), uhlala eneentloni kakhulu kwaye ngokucwangcisiweyo uziva engakwazi ukusondela kuye. Kuya kufuneka afumane ingcebiso kaRaymond yokuqonda ukuba umntu unokusukela ulonwabo lwakhe ngelixa eqinisekisa olwezihlobo kunye nabamelwane bakhe.
Ucalucalulo ngokwesini
Ucalucalulo oluxhomekeke kumbala
Uphando lufumene ubungqina obuninzi bocalucalulo oluxhokeke kumbala wolusu kubulungisa bolwaphulo-mthetho, ishishini, uqoqosho, izindlu, ukhathalelo lwempilo, imidiya kunye nezopolitiko eUnited States naseYurophu . Izikhumba ezikhanyayo zibonwe njengazona zikhethekileyo kumazwe amaninzi eAfrika, eAsia naseMzantsi Melika .
Ubuhlanga buchaphazela phantse zonke iinkalo zobomi ngemihle ngemihla. Uphando lubonisa ukuba abantu bebala elintsundu banikwa abathuba amancinane ukuba bafumane imfundo ephakamileyo nakwingqesho kunabamhlophe . Abantu abantsundu baphathwa gxadalala kunabamhlophe. Njengabalingani bothando, bajongwa njengabantu abangathandekiyo kwaye abantu abamhlophe babajongwa njengento enqwenelekayo. Bakwafumana unyango lwezamayeza olubuthathaka. 
Ukunqumla kweendlela
Ukunqumla Kweendlela yinkqubo yokuhlalutya yokuqonda indlela abantu abahlukeneyo, bezentlalo kunye nezopolitiko ezidibanisa ngayo ukwenza iindlela ezahlukeneyo zocalucalulo kunye nelungelo . Ukudibana kweendlela kuchonga izinto ezininzi eziluncedo kunye nezingeloncedo. Imizekelo yale miba ibandakanya isini, uhlanga, umgangatho, inkolo, isiphene, ubunzima kunye nenkangeleko yomzimba . Ezi mpawu zentlalo zidibanayo kunye nezinxibelelanayo zinokuxhobisa kwaye zicinezele . 
Ukunqumla kweendlela kwandisa umda wamaza okuqala kunye namaza obufazi, egxininise kakhulu kumava amabhinqa amhlophe, aphakathi kunye nengxubano yosini, ukubandakanya amava ahlukeneyo amabhinqa anemibala, abafazi abangamahlwempu, abafazi abasuka kwamanye amazwe, kunye namanye amaqela. Ukunqumla kweendlela okuhambelana kunye nobubhinqa kujolise ekuzahluleni kububhinqa obumhlophe ngokuvuma amava ahlukeneyo kunye nobunikazi babasetyhini. 
Igama elithi "ukunqumla kweendlela" layilwa nguKimberlé Crenshaw ngo-1989. [7] chaza indlela iinkqubo ezidityanisiweyo zamagunya ezibachaphazela ngayo abo bajongelwe phantsi eluntwini . [7] Amatshantliziyo asebenzisa isakhelo ukukhuthaza ukulingana kwezentlalo nezopolitiko . Ukunqumla kweendlela kuchasene neenkqubo zohlalutyo eziphatha i-axis nganye yengcinezelo ngokuzimeleyo. Kulo mgaqo-sikhokelo, umzekelo, ukucalucalulwa kwabasetyhini abamnyama akunakuchazwa njengento elula yenzondo kubantu basetyhini kunye nobuhlanga, kodwa njengento enzima ngakumbi. I-Intersectionality ibandakanyeka kwimixholo efana nocinezelo oluphindaphindwe kathathu, ingcinezelo ehambelana nokuba ngumfazi ohluphekileyo okanye ovela kwelinye ilizwe. Uhlalutyo lonqumananiso lweendlela lungqamanisa ngokusondeleyo kunye nocalucalulo lwamabhinqa yohlalutyo lwamandla.
Ukugxekwa kuquka utyekelo lwenkqubo-sikhokelo yokunciphisa abantu kwiinkalo ezithile zabantu, nokusetyenziswa kwayo njengesixhobo sokucinga esichasene nezinye iinkqubo zolwazi lwabasetyhini . Abagxeki baye babonakalisa isakhelo njengento engaqondakaliyo kwaye engenazo iinjongo ezichaziweyo. Njengoko isekelwe kwimo yolwazi, abagxeki bathi ukugxila kumava ezihloko kunokukhokelela ekuchaseni kunye nokungakwazi ukuchonga izizathu eziqhelekileyo zengcinezelo. Uhlalutyo lwamanqaku emfundo apapashwe ngenyanga yoMnga ka-2019 lufumanise ukuba akukho ndlela zamkelwe ngokubanzi zobungakanani bokuphanda imibuzo yophando esekelwe ekudibaneni kweendlela kwaye inike iingcebiso malunga neendlela ezingcono zohlalutyo kuphando lwexesha elizayo. Uhlalutyo lwamanqaku emfundo olupapashwe ngenyanga KaCanzibe ka-2020 lufumanise ukuba ukudibana kweendlela kuhlala kungaqondwa kakuhle xa kusahlulwa ulwazi kwindlela yobungakanani. 
Ingqikelelo yokuhlangana kweendlela yaziswa kwinkalo yezifundo zomthetho ngumphengululi omnyama wabasetyhini uKimberlé Crenshaw, osebenzise eli gama kwizincoko ezimbini.  yapapashwa ngo-1989 nango-1991. Ngelixa ithiyori ngokuyintloko yaqala njengokuphononongwa kwengcinezelo yabasetyhini abamnyama kuluntu kunye neendlela abafumana ngayo ukuhlangana kweendlela ezahlukeneyo zengcinezelo, uhlalutyo luye lwanda ukuze lubandakanye iinkalo ezininzi zobuntu bentlalontle. Izazisi ezidla ngokubhekiswa kwi -feminism yesine ziquka ubuhlanga, isini, isini, isini, udidi, isakhono, ubuzwe, ubumi, inkolo, kunye nohlobo lomzimba. Eli gama alizange lamkelwe ngokubanzi ngabasetyhini kude kube ngama-2000 kwaye liye lakhula ukususela ngelo xesha. 
Ubuhlanga eMzantsi Afrika
Ubuhlanga , ukwahlulela okanye ubandlululo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye inemiphumela emibi eluntwini ,ubuhlanga okanye ukwahlulela bunokulandwa emva kwiingxelo zasembo zentsebenziswano phakathi kwabantu baseAfrika, baseAsia nabaseYurophu kunxweme lwaseMzantsi eAfrika . Ikho kwiinkulungwane ezininzi kwimbali yoMzantsi Afrika, isukela emva yamaDatshi yaseMazantsi eAfrika eyaqala ngo-1652 Phambi kokuba kuphunyezwe ilungelo lehlabathi jikelele ngo-1994, abemi baseMzantsi Afrika abaMhlophe, ingakumbi amaBhunu ngexesha localucalulo, babexhamla kumalungelo namalungelo awahlukeneyo avunywe ngumthetho okanye avunywe ngokwasentlalweni awayevinjwe abantu bomthonyama baseAfrika. &lt;ref name="bbc.com/news 2021"&gt;&lt;/ref&gt; Imizekelo yobuhlanga obucwangcisiweyo ngexesha lembali yoMzantsi Afrika iquka ukugxothwa ngenkani, ubukhulu nobuncinane ngokobuhlanga, nocalucalulo, ulwabiwo olungalinganiyo lwezibonelelo, nokungavunyelwa . Iingxwabangxwaba zobuhlanga nezopolitiko zihlala ziyinto ephambili kweli lizwe. 
Ubuhlanga bobukoloniyali.
Ummandla owawuza kuba nguMzantsi Afrika wale mihla wawukwindawo yoncedo kubarhwebi baseYurophu ababefuna ukuququzelela nokwenza urhwebo e- East Indies, ingakumbi amakholoniyali angamaPhuthukezi namaDatshi . Ngowe-1652, iNkampani yaseDutch East India yaseka iKoloni yaseCape eCape of Good Hope . Injongo yale koloni yayikukuqinisekisa ukuba iinqanawa zamaDatshi eziya nokubuya eBatavia zaziza kuba nomthombo wezinto ezintsha, njengoko ukufa yindlala kwabanga inani elikhulu labakhweli. Ngexesha lolawulo lwamaDatshi, abahlali baseDatshi (ekugqibeleni baziwa ngokuba ngamaBhunu ) baqalisa ukufudukela kwikoloni, besungula iindawo zokuhlala kulo mmandla wonke. 
Ukulingana ngokwesini
UKULINGANA NGOKWESINI yinkqubo yokuhlalutya isaziso soluntu. Ukudibana kweendlela kuchonga izinto ezininzi eziluncedo kunye nezingeloncedo. Imizekelo yale miba ibandakanya isini, uhlanga, umgangatho, inkolo, isiphene, ubunzima kunye nenkangeleko yomzimba . Ezi mpawu zentlalo zidibanayo kunye nezinxibelelanayo zinokuxhobisa kwaye zicinezele . 
Ukulingana ngokwesini kwandisa umda wamaza okuqala kunye namaza obufazi, egxininise kakhulu kumava amabhinqa amhlophe, aphakathi kunye nengxubano yesini, ukubandakanya amava ahlukeneyo amabhinqa anemibala, abafazi abangamahlwempu, abafazi abasuka kwamanye amazwe, kunye namanye amaqela. Ukunqumla kweendlela okuhambelana kunye nobubhinqa kujolise ekuzahluleni kububhinqa obumhlophe ngokuvuma amava ahlukeneyo kunye nobunikazi babasetyhini. 
Igama elithi "UKULIGANA NGOKWESINI" layilwa nguKimberlé Crenshaw ngo-1989. [7] chaza indlela iinkqubo ezidityanisiweyo zamagunya ezibachaphazela ngayo abo bajongelwe phantsi eluntwini . [7] Amatshantliziyo asebenzisa isakhelo ukukhuthaza ukulingana kwezentlalo nezopolitiko . Ukunqumla kweendlela kuchasene neenkqubo zohlalutyo eziphatha inkqubo nganye yengcinezelo ngokuzimeleyo. Kulo mgaqo-sikhokelo, umzekelo, ukucalucalulwa kwabasetyhini abamnyama akunakuchazwa njengento elula yenzondo kubantu basetyhini kunye nobuhlanga, kodwa njengento enzima ngakumbi. I-Intersectionality ibandakanyeka kwimixholo efana nocinezelo oluphindaphindwe kathathu, ingcinezelo ehambelana nokuba ngumfazi ohluphekileyo okanye ovela kwelinye ilizwe. Uhlalutyo lonqumananiso lweendlela lungqamanisa ngokusondeleyo kunye nocalucalulo lwamabhinqa yohlalutyo lwamandla.
Ukugxekwa kuquka utyekelo lwenkqubo-sikhokelo yokunciphisa abantu kwiinkalo ezithile zabantu, nokusetyenziswa kwayo njengesixhobo sokucinga esichasene nezinye iinkqubo zolwazi lwabasetyhini . Abagxeki baye babonakalisa isakhelo njengento engaqondakaliyo kwaye engenazo iinjongo ezichaziweyo. Njengoko isekelwe kwimo yolwazi, abagxeki bathi ukugxila kumava ezihloko kunokukhokelela ekuchaseni kunye nokungakwazi ukuchonga izizathu eziqhelekileyo zengcinezelo. Uhlalutyo lwamanqaku emfundo apapashwe ngenyanga yoMnga ka-2019 lufumanise ukuba akukho ndlela zamkelwe ngokubanzi zobungakanani bokuphanda imibuzo yophando esekelwe ekudibaneni kweendlela kwaye inike iingcebiso malunga neendlela ezingcono zohlalutyo kuphando lwexesha elizayo. Uhlalutyo lwamanqaku emfundo olupapashwe ngenyanga KaCanzibe ka-2020 lufumanise ukuba ukudibana kweendlela kuhlala kungaqondwa kakuhle xa kusahlulwa ulwazi kwindlela yobungakanani. 
Ingqikelelo yokuhlangana kweendlela yaziswa kwinkalo yezifundo zomthetho ngumphengululi omnyama wabasetyhini uKimberlé Crenshaw, osebenzise eli gama kwizincoko ezimbini.  yapapashwa ngo-1989 nango-1991. Ngelixa ithiyori ngokuyintloko yaqala njengokuphononongwa kwengcinezelo yabasetyhini abamnyama kuluntu kunye neendlela abafumana ngayo ukuhlangana kweendlela ezahlukeneyo zengcinezelo, uhlalutyo luye lwanda ukuze lubandakanye iinkalo ezininzi zobuntu bentlalontle. Izazisi ezidla ngokubhekiswa kwi -feminism yesine ziquka ubuhlanga, isini, isini, isini, udidi, isakhono, ubuzwe, ubumi, inkolo, kunye nohlobo lomzimba. Eli gama alizange lamkelwe ngokubanzi ngabasetyhini kude kube ngama-2000 kwaye liye lakhula ukususela ngelo xesha. 
Ucalucalulo lwamaziko
&lt;templatestyles src="Plainlist/styles.css"&gt;&lt;/templatestyles&gt;
Ngaphambilini, igama elithi “ubuhlanga” lalidla ngokusetyenziswa ngendlela elungileyo nelithi “umkhethe,” lisenza uluvo lomnye umntu olusekelwe kulwazi olungaphelelanga. Kwikota yokugqibela yeNkulungwane yama-20, ubuhlanga buye banxulunyaniswa neenkqubo endaweni yabantu. Ngowe-1977, uMnumzana David Wellman kwincwadi yakhe ethi "Portraits of White Racism", wachaza ubuhlanga “njengenkqubo yenzuzo esekelwe kubuhlanga,” ebonisa le ngcaciso ngemizekelo emininzi yabantu abamhlophe abaxhasa amaziko obuhlanga ngoxa bekhanyela ukuba banocalucalulo. Abantu abamhlophe banokuba nobubele kubantu abamnyama lo gama beqhubeka bexhasa ucalucalulo olucwangcisiweyo oluluncedo kubo, njengeendlela zokubolekisa ngemali, izikolo ezixhaswa ngemali entle, kunye namathuba emisebenzi. Ingqikelelo yocalucalulo ngokweziko yaphinda yavela kwiingxoxo zezopolitiko phakathi nasekupheleni kweminyaka yee-1990, kodwa ihleli ingumbono ekuphikiswana ngawo. Ubuhlanga bamaziko kulapho uhlanga lubangela inqanaba engafaniyo lokufikelela kwiimpahla,ndibala ntoni. 
Ukohluka, ukulingana, kunye nokufakwa
Ukohluka,ukulingana, kunye nokufakwa yingcamango ekhuthaza ukuphathwa ngokufanelekileyo kunye nokuzinikela ngokupheleleyo ko luntu ingakumbi kwiindawo zokusebenzela.Kukwa bandakanywa nabantu abaye babane mbali yokubonakaliswa ngaphantsi kocalucalulo ngenxa yemvelaphi yabo, isazisi, ukukhubazeka, njalo njalo. 
Psyduck kwiDada (isiJapan: コ ダ ッ ク, isiNgesi: Psyduck, iHong Kong inguqulelo yakudala yedada) sesinye sezidalwa eziyintsomi "Pokémon" kuthotho lwe "Pokémon" oluphethwe yiNintendo kunye neGame Freak. Yaziswa okokuqala kwiPokémon Red kunye nePokémon Green, kwaye ibonakale ekulandeleni kunye nokulungelelaniswa kolu chungechunge.  UKodak, okhangeleka okwedada, kudala eqaqanjelwa yintloko.  Xa inamanqaku amava aneleyo, iya kuguqukela kwiDada leGotha.
IChernobyl yi isixeko esilahliwe ngokuyinxenye iNdawo eKhethekileyo yaseChernobyl, ime Vyshhorod Raion emantla Kyiv Oblast, Ukraine. IChernobyl imalunga neekhilomitha ezingama-90 kumntla weKyiv, kunye neekhilomitha ezili-160 kumzantsi-ntshona wesixeko saseBelarusian eGomel. Phambi kokufuduswa kwaso, esi sixeko sasinabahlali abamalunga ne-14,000 (umlinganiselo ongaphantsi kwabamelwane Pripyat). Ngelixa uhlala naphina ngaphakathi kweChernobyl Exclusion Zone akukho mthethweni namhlanje, abasemagunyeni bayabanyamezela abo bakhetha ukuhlala kwezinye zeendawo ezingarhaxwanga, kwaye malunga ne-1,000 yabantu bahlala ePripyat namhlanje.
IHelsinki likomkhulu, inkawu, nesona sixeko sinabantu abaninzi Finland. Imi kunxweme lwe Gulf of Finland, sisihlalo sommandla Uusimaa kumazantsi eFinland, yaye inabemi abangama-658,864.
IHelsinki likomkhulu, inkawu, nesona sixeko sinabantu abaninzi Finland. Imi kunxweme lwe Gulf of Finland, sisihlalo sommandla Uusimaa kumazantsi eFinland, yaye inabemi abangama-658,864.
I-Opera yeSizwe yaseFinland kunye neBallet
I-Finnish National Opera neBallet () Helsinki kuphela kochwephesha lwaseFinland opera house. I-National Opera idlala operas kunye ballets kunye neekonsathi. IOpera yeSizwe ineokhestra yayo yobugcisa, Iokhestra yeSizwe yeOpera yeOpera, eneemvumi zeopera ezili-104. Ikwayara enamalungu angama-50 yeNational Opera kuphela kwekwayara esebenza isigxina yaseFinland. Le opera ikwanekwayara yabantwana eneemvumi ezingama-50. Abasibhozo kwiimvumi zeopera basisigxina, kwaye neendwendwe nazo ziyasetyenziswa. iBallet yeSizwe yaseFinland inabadanisi abangama-86. Ngo-2022, iNational Opera iya kuba nabasebenzi abamalunga nama-550 abasuka kumazwe angama-33 abasebenza rhoqo ngenyanga. Ushicilelo=Ooperabaletti.fi | I-Reference = 8/9/2022}}&lt;/ref&gt;
Ukusukela ngo-2018, umlawuli jikelele we-Opera yeSizwe ube Gita Kadambi. Umlawuli wobugcisa beopera ube Lilli Paasikivi ukusukela ngo-2013. Umlawuli wezobugcisa we-Ballet yeSizwe ngu Javier Torres. Waqala kwisikhundla sakhe ngo-Agasti 2022. Njengomqhubi oyintloko we-opera kunye ne-ballet, waqala ekuqaleni kwe-2022 Hannu Lintu; ixesha lakhe lithatha iminyaka emine enesiqingatha.
I-Opera yeSizwe yaseFinland kunye neBallet iqhutywa ngumlawuli we-Finnish National Opera kunye neBallet. (eyayifudula ibizwa ngokuba yiFinnish National Opera Foundation).
IOpera yeSizwe kunye neBallet isebenza kwindlu yeopera eyagqitywa ngo-1993, emi kumda osemantla ipaki yeHesperian, ekudibaneni kweendlela Mannerheimintie kunye [[Helsinginkatu|Helsinginkatu] ] kufutshane [[Töölönlahti]]. Ukunwebeka kwesitrato ngasemva kwayo kwicala le-Töölönlahti kuye kwabizwa ngokuba yi-Ooperankuja ngembeko yesikhumbuzo se-100th ye-opera. Yle.news August 2011.&lt;/ref&gt;
[[Ifayile:Edvard Fazer.jpg|thumb|cha Ukwenziwa rhoqo kweopera eFinland kwaqala ngo-1873, xa isebe lokucula leFinnish Theatre lasekwa phantsi kwegama elithi "Suomalainen opera". Ngaphambi koko, kuphela ukhenkethiso lweenkampani zeopera zangaphandle kunye nemidlalo yeqonga eye yabonwa eFinland. Umboniso weopera wokuqala eFinland wawubonakala ngathi "[[uThe Barber waseSeville]" ngo-1849. Iopera yaseFinland yaqhuba de kwangowe-1879, xa kwafuneka ivalwe ngenxa yeengxaki zemali. Ngexesha layo elifutshane lokusebenza, ivelise inani elimalunga nama-450 emidlalo yeopera, equka iioperas ezipheleleyo ezingama-26, imiboniso yeopera kunye ne-operetta enye.
I-Geometry Dash luluhlu lwemidlalo yevidiyo yeqonga yomculo ephuhliswe nguMphuhlisi waseSweden uRobert "RobTop" iTopala. Umdlalo wokuqala, iGeometry Dash, yakhululwa ngomhla we-13 Agasti 2013 kwi-iOS kunye ne-Android, kunye nenguqulo ye-Steam ngomhla we-22 kaDisemba 2014. Kwi-Geometry Dash, abadlali balawula ukuhamba kwe-icon kwaye bahambe ngamanqanaba asekelwe kumculo, ngelixa bephepha imiqobo enjalo. njengezikhonkwane ezithi ngoko nangoko Zitshabalalise i icon kwimpembelelo.
INorton Flats yayiyindawo yembali yaseSpain yokuVuselela ubuKholoniyadi eLos Angeles, eCalifornia. Yayilwa ngumyili wezakhiwo waseSan Francisco uLeonard L. Jones kwaye yakhiwa ngo-1924 no-1926.
I-Bloodbath yi-1.9/2.0/2.1 Extreme Demon mega-collaboration ebanjwe, yaqinisekiswa yaza yapapashwa nguRiot ngo-Eyethupha 12, 2015 kwiGeometry Dash. Ukulandela ukuqinisekiswa kwayo, yabekwa kwi-#1 kuLuhlu lweeRekhodi zeDemon ezisemthethweni (ngoku eyaziwa ngokuba yiDemonlist). Ngokulula naliphi na elinye inqanaba lingacela umngeni kwesi sikhundla kwisithuba esingaphezu konyaka de iSakupen Hell ikhululwe, iphawula ukuqala kokwehla kwayo kubunzima obubonwayo. Sisavenge sesibini se-trilogy echongiweyo yoluntu efana ne-Extreme Demons efanayo, eyandulelayo kunye ne-Cataclysm ephumelelayo, kwaye onke amanqanaba adityaniswe kwinguqulelo epheleleyo abe yi-AfterCataBath.
I-Herobrine ngumxholo we-creepypasta eyenziwe ekuhlaleni. Ungomnye weempawu eziphambili zoluntu zeMinecraft, ukanti iHerobrine ayikabikho kuyo nayiphi na inguqulelo yomdlalo.
Ibali lokuqala kunye nomfanekiso owake wathunyelwa malunga neHerobrine, kunye nemijelo ye-Brocraft, ithathwa njenge-canonical, njengoko yayisisiseko ekudalweni kunye nokuthandwa komlinganiswa. Nasiphi na isiqulatho esithunyelwe emva kwezi ziganeko sithathwa njengeenguqu ezenziwe ngabalandeli kunye nokwahluka.
UWolfgang Müller-Wiener
UWolfgang Müller-Wiener (Friedrichswerth, Thuringia, 17 May 1923 - Istanbul, Turkey, 25 Matshi 1991) wayengumbhali-mbali wezokwakha waseJamani, i-archaeologist kunye neByzantinist.
I-mockbuster (ekwaziwa njenge-knockbuster okanye ithuba lokuyila) yifilim eyenzelwe ukuxhaphaza upapasho lomnye umfanekiso oshukumayo omkhulu onesihloko okanye umxholo ofanayo. Ii-mockbusters zihlala zenziwe ngebhajethi ephantsi kunye nemveliso ekhawulezayo yokwandisa inzuzo. "I-Mockbuster" yi-portmanteau yamagama "ukuhlekisa" kunye "ne-blockbuster".
Isikolo samabanga aphakamileyo i-Eura sisikolo samabanga aphakamileyo esibanzi. Isikolo esiphakamileyo asigxininisi nasiphi na isifundo ngokukodwa, kodwa sibonelela ngoluhlu olufanelekileyo lwezifundo kuzo zonke izifundo zamabanga aphakamileyo.
UJukka Pirttimäki yinqununu yesikolo samabanga aphakamileyo, isikolo samabanga aphakamileyo sasekwa ngo-1944, isikolo esiphakamileyo sinabafundi abamalunga ne-170 kunye nootitshala abangama-20.
USeppo Kaarlo Jaakkola (28 kaJanuwari 1920 Tampere – 25 Disemba 2006 Nokia) wayengumdlali wehoki yomkhenkce waseFinland. Udlale umsebenzi wakhe eTampere Ilves kwaye wadlala kwiqela lesizwe laseFinnish lehoki yomkhenkce, elathatha inxaxheba kwiNdebe yeHlabathi eSwitzerland okokuqala ngentwasahlobo ka-1939.
Isixeko yindawo ehlala abantu abaninzi. Amazwe amaninzi anezixeko.
IRopsa sisiqithi sasePäijänte ePäijät-Hämee eSysmä. YeyasePäijänte National Park.
UMrBeast ngumsebenzisi weYouTube waseMelika. Uyaziwa ngokwenza imingeni kunye neevidiyo ezibandakanya imali eninzi.
Intsomi ye-zelda linyathelo lomdlalo we-adventure ye-adventure edalwe nguMdali weSihlalo waseJapan Shigeru Simahla Iphuhlisiwe kwaye ipapashwe yiNintendo, nangona ezinye izibonelelo eziphathwayo kunye nokukhutshelwa kwakhona zikhutshiwe kwiflegi, eVanpool, kunye neGrezzo. I-gameplay ibandakanya isenzo se-adventure kunye nezinto ze-RPG ze-RPG.
 ngesiIrish ; ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseIreland ( ; lilizwe elililungu leManyano yaseYurophu . Ngokwembono yombutho wombuso, yiriphabliki yepalamente enonyulo oludumileyo lukamongameli kuphela kwimeko apho iPalamente ingayibonakalisi enye ekupheleni kwesigunyaziso salowo uphumayo.
Ilizwe lase ireland nom ligubungela wonke umphezulu wesiqithi esibizwa ngegama elinye, kuba umntla we ireland unobukumkani obumanyeneyo.
ESwitzerland ngexesha leMfazwe Yehlabathi
EiSwitzerland lilizwe elikumbindi weYurophu
budeni beMfazwe Yehlabathi I neMfazwe Yehlabathi II, iSwitzerland yagcina ubundilele bezixhobo, yaye ayizange ihlaselwe ngabamelwane bayo, ngokuyinxenye ngenxa yokuma kwayo, ubukhulu becala buneentaba. IJamani yayisisongelo kwaye iSwitzerland yakha ukhuselo olunamandla. Yasebenza "njengamandla okukhusela" kwiibelligerents zamacala omabini, kunye nendima ekhethekileyo ekuncedeni amabanjwa emfazwe. Amazwe alwayo ayenza yaba yindawo yozakuzo, ubuntlola kunye norhwebo, kunye nokuba yindawo ekhuselekileyo yeembacu ezingama-300,000.
Ibala lezemidlalo laseDomenico Monterisi
Ibala lezemidlalo laseDomenico Monterisi, elalisakuba yiCampo Littorio, libala lemidlalo yesixeko saseCerignola . Iqela lebhola ekhatywayo le -Audace Cerignola lidlala imidlalo yalo yangaphakathi apho. 
Ekuqaleni yenzelwe ukuba ibe nomthamo wezihlalo ze-3,000, iye yangenelela ngeendlela ezininzi zokwandisa kwiminyaka yokufikelela kwizihlalo zangoku ze-7,500, zinikwe amabhongo kunye neziphumo eziphunyeziweyo Cerignola, ekubeni inkampani ithathwe kwi-2014 yintsapho yaseGrieco, umnini we uphawu lweProshop .
Ihlonipha zonke iimpawu eziza kuthathwa njengebala le -UEFA lodidi lwesi-3 .
Ulwakhiwo oluguquguqukayo
Itekhnoloji kaloliwe ethi kwesinye isitokhwe esiqengqelekayo ivumela ukuthambekela kokujikeleza okuzenzekelayo komzimba ngokubhekiselele kwiibhogi xa uhamba kwiigophe kuchazwa njenge -trim, for ukuba ukuze kuvumeleke isantya esiphezulu xa ukuba ngeendlela ze-curvilinear.
I-e.tv (edla ngokubizwa ngokuba ngu e) sesona sikhululo sikamabonakude sokuqala nesisesomoya sabucala eMzantsi Afrika . Lijelo likamabonakude lesihlanu kweli lizwe, lilandela amajelo amathathu aqhutywa liZiko loSasazo loMzantsi Afrika eliphantsi korhulumente (oko kukuthi, iSABC 1, iSABC 2 kunye neSABC 3 ) kunye nejelo labucala le -M-Net elixhaswa ngemali ngumrhumo. Ngo-1997, ijelo le-e.tv lathenga amalungelo okusasaza okusasaza imidlalo ye-English Premier League (EPL) kwaye, kamva, lathenga namalungelo okusasaza imidlalo ye-UEFA Champions League .
Ngaphandle kweSABC, ikwindawo yesibini elizweni ngokubukelwa kakhulu, ngokuya ngolwazi olufunyenwe kwi-DStv . 
I-Consortium ineenguqu ezininzi kubunini, nangona kunjalo umdlali obalaseleyo usoloko eyi-HCI: ithenge abanini-zabelo abambalwa abamnyama abangazange baphumelele ukubuyisela iimali-mboleko abazisebenzisayo ukuthenga isiteki se-Midi TV. I-Warner Bros. yathengisa Isabelo sayo esasingange-25% sejelo ngo-2001, sinexhala lokuba abanakuze bakwazi ukusebenzisa ubunini obupheleleyo: Umthetho wobunini bejelo losasazo loMzantsi Afrika umisela umda amaqumrhu angaphandle ukuba angabi nanto ingaphezulu kwe-25% yesitishi sikamabonakude.
UMarcel Golding, owayesakuba ngumbutho wabasebenzi, wanyanzelwa ukuba arhoxe njengomphathi wesi sikhululo ekupheleni kweyeDwarha ka-2014, emva kokuthengwa kwezabelo awayezenza kumenzi wezixhobo ze-elektroniki eMzantsi Afrika u-Ellies. I-HCI iye yanyanzelisa, kumaxwebhu enkundla, ukuba ukuthengwa kwe-R24 yezigidi zezabelo kumenzi we-elektroniki, ekwavelisa iibhokisi zedijithali, ngaphandle kwemvume. UGolding, ecela umngeni ekususweni kwakhe njenge-CEO, wathi iinzame zokumsusa zibangelwa kukuba urhulumente weANC ufuna ukulawula iindaba zesi sikhululo ngokungenelela okuthe ngqo. 
Ize ibizwe i-eNews Channel Africa. Umsasazi weendaba zikamabonakude weeyure ezingama-24 ejongene neendaba ezaseMzantsi Afrika nezaseAfrika . Lo msasazi waba yinkonzo yeendaba yokuqala nebukelwa kakhulu kwilizwe lonke yeeyure ezingama-24 xa yayiqalwa ngoJuni ka-2008 Lijelo leendaba lokuqala elika-e.tv elifumaneka kwi -DStv kuphela.
Ijelo lomboniso bhanyabhanya elibonisa iimuvi ezilungele usapho ezixutywe nedrama nezothando.
Isitishi sokuzonwabisa ngokubanzi ebonisa i-telenovelas ezahlukeneyo kunye nolunye udweliso lwenkqubo.
Ijelo lesibini lomboniso bhanyabhanya esibonisa ubukhulu becala intshukumo kunye neemuvi eziyonwabisayo
Ijelo labantwana elineenkqubo zakudala nezangoku ezibonwa kwibhloko ye-e.tv yabantwana, iCraze.
Ithembisa ukuba iya kuba yiparadesi yababukeli abazonwabisayo enamabali obomi achulumancisayo, abalinganiswa ababangel’ umdla neemvakalelo zomntu. Kukho into enyanzelekileyo kumntu wonke.
Igubungela uluhlu lweentlobo, kubandakanya indlela yokuphila, ukutya, umculo, ubugcisa kunye nokuzonwabisa ngokubanzi. Iza kusasaza ii-sitcoms kunye needrama ezithile.
Ijelo liphinda lidlala iidrama zaseTurkey ezibonwe kwezinye izikhululo. 
Amajelo angaphambili.
Itshaneli ephinda idlala umxholo ovela kwi-e.tv kunye nezinye iitshaneli zayo
Iindaba zesibini kunye nejelo lezemidlalo lokuqala elivela kwi-eMedia Investments esungulwe ngokukodwa kwi -Openview .
Ijelo esekwe kwabasetyhini elinomxube wenyani, indlela yokuphila, kunye neetelenovelas.
Ijelo lomculo elinika umxube weengoma zasekhaya nezamazwe ngamazwe.
Ijelo laseAfrika elibonisa umxholo ovela kwiAfrika iphela.
UAshoka okanye UAshoka Omkhulu (304 BCE ukuya ku-232 BCE) wayengumlawuli waseNdiya. Wayengumlawuli wesithathu woBukhosi baseMaurya. Uthathwa njengoyena mlawuli mkhulu welizwekazi laseIndiya kude kube ngoku.
Ulawulo lwakhe lwalususela ku-269 BC ukuya ku-232 BC kwiIndiya yakudala. Ubukhosi buka-Emperor Ashoka babukwimimandla emininzi yeIndiya, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Nepal kunye neBangladesh yanamhlanje. Obu bukhosi bukhulu baseMaurya bubobona bukhosi bukhulu baseIndiya ukusukela ngelo xesha ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Emva kokuphumelela imfazwe yaseKalinga, wayeyithiyile imfazwe waza wamkela ubuBhuda. Wazama ukusasaza ubuBhuda kulo lonke elaseAsiya. Wakha amawaka eetempile zamaBhuda. UAshoka uthathwa njengomnye wabalawuli abakhulu kwihlabathi.
U-Emperor Ashoka naye uyaziwa ngolawulo olungcono kunye nolusebenzayo. Wayesenza izinto ezininzi enceda abantu bakhe. I'Emblem' yeRiphabhlikhi yaseIndiya ithathwe kwiNtsika yoMlawuli uAshoka. 'I-Ashoka Chakra' inikwe indawo kwiflegi yesizwe yaseIndiya. U-Ashoka uthathwa njengoyena mlawuli mkhulu kwaye uthandwa kakhulu kwi-subcontinent yaseIndiya.
Ellen Gracie Northfleet
Ellen Gracie Northfleet ; owazalwa ngoFebruwari 16, 1948) yiBrazil ijaji. Ungumfazi wokuqala ukumiselwa INkundla Ephakamileyo yaseBrazil kunye nomongameli wokuqala weNkundla obhinqileyo.
Ngo-Agasti 8, 2011, warhoxa eNkundleni, iminyaka esi-7 ngaphambi kolwandiso olupheleleyo olwaluza kuhamba de ibe neminyaka engama-70 ubudala.
Khange kubekho sibhengezo sisesikweni ngesigqibo sakhe sokuthatha umhlala-phantsi kwaye akukho msitho usesikweni ekuhambeni kwakhe. 
Emva kokuhamba kwakhe iBrazilian Association of Federal Judges yapapasha ingxelo yasesidlangalaleni icela ukuba kunyulwe ummeli kaMantyi kwisikhundla sakhe. U-Ellen Gracie wayengengomantyi womsebenzi ekubeni engazange abhale iimviwo ukuze abe nguMgwebi we-Federal, njengoko kunjalo kumalungu kaMantyi we-Federal. Uchongelwe isikhundla ngumongameli waseBrazil ngoko Fernando Henrique Cardoso.
Iziganeko kaGui kunye noEstopa
Iziganeko kaGui kunye noEstopa (IsiPhuthukezi: "As Aventuras de Gui &amp; Estopa") luthotho lweekhathuni zaseBrasil ezenziwe ngumlingisi kunye nombhali uMariana Caltabiano. Olu ngcelele lwaboniswa kwiCartoon Network ngo-2009.
IMakosi yifemu yeenkonzo zobuchwephesha egxile ekuqhubeni iiprojekthi kwihlabathi jikelele ngeenkonzo zezimali ukusukela ngo-2001. Inekomkhulu eNew York,IYunayithedi Steyitsi kwaye yasekwa South Africa nguDarren Isaacs.UDarren uthweswe isidanga University of the Witwatersrand Rhawuti, eMzantsi Afrika, wafumana isidanga kwi-Accounting and Financing. Amava akhe abandakanya isicwangciso soshishino, umngcipheko wemali, uphuhliso lweshishini elitsha; kunye nophicotho-zincwadi nokubalwa.
UMakosi uqashe ngaphezu kwe-1,500 lababhali-mali e-United Kingdom, e-United States of America, eMzantsi Afrika, e-Australia nakwamanye amazwe alishumi elinesibini.
&lt;templatestyles src="Infobox/style.css" /&gt;
UGqr. Minoo Ghamari (owazalwa ngoSeptemba 23, 1989) ngugqirha wamazinyo wase-Australia-Iranian ozinze eMelbourne. Waziwa kakhulu ngobuchule bakhe kwi-Cosmetic dentistry kwaye ufumene amava okusebenza kumazwekazi amathathu ahlukeneyo.[1] UGqr. Ghamari ngumseki weGorgeous Smiles Dentistry kwaye ngoku usebenza njengogqirha wamazinyo oyintloko kugqirha wamazinyo.
Ngobuchule bakhe bokudala umxholo wedijithali kunye nokuzibandakanya ngokusebenzisa izibambo zakhe ezahlukeneyo zemidiya yoluntu, uGqr Ghamari uzuze abathengi abaninzi kwaye uqokelele amawaka abalandeli kwiiakhawunti zakhe zentlalo [4] Kutshanje unikwe imbeko ngeAustralian Achievers Awards kwaye uboniswe kwiVogue Australia ngomsebenzi wakhe ebaleni. 
Ubomi bokuqala kunye nemfundo.
UGqr. Ghamari wazalwa ngoSeptemba 23, 1989, eRasht, eIran. Kwi-2013, wathuthela e-Australia kunye nomama wakhe uDkt May Balaei, ongudokotela wamazinyo. UGqr. Ghamari ufumene isidanga sakhe sobuGqirha kutyando lwamazinyo kwiDyunivesithi yaseDebrecen, eHungary. Emva kwexesha walucoca uviwo lwase-Australia lwamazinyo ukuze abe ngugqirha wamazinyo oqinisekisiweyo e-Australia.
UGqr. Ghamari kunye nomama wakhe baye baseka iGorgeous Smiles Dentistry ngonyaka ka-2014. [7] [8] Kwisithuba seminyaka esi-8, i-ofisi yamazinyo iye yaphumela kwimicelimngeni yokuziseka kwaye ijongene nobhubhane we-covid kwaye iye yavela njengeyona kliniki iphambili kagqirha wamazinyo e-Australia. [9][10]
UGqr. Ghamari usebenzisa amaqonga akhe eendaba zoluntu ukuze ahlale eqhagamshelwe kwaye ezibandakanye nabalandeli bakhe be-intanethi.[11] Ngokusebenzisa izibambo zakhe ezahlukeneyo zemidiya yoluntu, uGqr. Ghamari uhlala ebelana ngeengcebiso zococeko lwamazinyo, umxholo wokwazisa, ukubonisana simahla, iiseshini ezibukhoma, izipho, kunye nokusebenzisana nabanye oogqirha bamazinyo.[12] Izakhono zakhe zokudala umxholo ziye zamnceda ukuba akhulise ishishini lakhe ngokuphindwe kabini kwaye ngenxa yale Gorgeous Smiles Dentistry ibambe ithuba lokwandisa imisebenzi yayo kulo lonke elaseOstreliya.
&lt;templatestyles src="Infobox/style.css" /&gt;
Md Mehedi hasan, (owazalwa ngo-Epreli 08, 2003) owaziwa ngokuba ngu Shovon Ahmed. UnguSomashishini waseBangladeshi, uMthengisi weDijithali, ingcali ye-SEO, iNgcali yoLwazi lwePhaneli, uMbhali, umyili weWebhusayithi kunye nomdali womxholo. Waziwa kakhulu njengomseki weRaw Marketer. I-platform ye-intanethi ye-digital marketing enikezela zonke iinkonzo zentengiso yedijithali kunye nezisombululo malunga ne-SEO, i-SMM, i-SEM njl njl. Ungomnye wabantu abanempembelelo e-Bangladesh.
Ubeba uyakwendel'enkosini kanti uyakwendela kumfokazana
&lt;templatestyles src="Infobox/style.css" /&gt;
Damon Aleczander ngusomashishini waseMelika, usozimali, isithethi kunye nobuntu be-Intanethi. Ungumseki we-imruvu.io kakhulu, kunye nezinye iinkampani ezininzi.
I-CEO, i-Financial Strategist, i-Business Consultant, i-Finance Consultant, i-Finance Broker
Ndikwishishini lezemali. Ndiqale eli shishini ukunceda abantu ukuba balungise kwaye balinganise iimali zabo, kunye nokunceda abanini bamashishini baqale kwaye balinganise amashishini abo. Millionaire by 25. Iquka kuzo zonke iimpapasho ezininzi. ubuntu kwimidiya yoluntu. Umnikazi weshishini ophumeleleyo. Umrhwebi ophumeleleyo kunye nomphathi wengxowa-mali ngaphambi koko.
Ukhulele kwikhaya elihlwempuzekileyo. Uhlala emantla eWashington nakwiindawo ezikunxweme olusempuma eoregon. Waphuma ekholejini eneminyaka eyi-19. Waqhubela phambili ngokupheleleyo kwishishini ukusukela ngelo xesha ukuya phambili.
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseAmsterdam Schiphol
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseAmsterdam Schiphol, ngesiDatshi "iLuchthaven Amsterdam-Schiphol" (ebizwa ngokuba ), sesona sikhululo seenqwelomoya eNetherlands . Ifumaneka kumazantsi e - Amsterdam, kumasipala wase Haarlemmermeer . I-Schiphol yenye yezona zikhululo zeenqwelomoya ezibaluleke kakhulu zaseYurophu kubakhweli kunye nokuhamba kwempahla. Kwaye ikwayenye yezikhululo zeenqwelo moya zokuqala emhlabeni ngenani lemigaqo yeenqwelomoya. Kwi -2010, kunye ne abakhweli abahambayo, i-Schiphol yisikhululo seenqwelomoya sesihlanu esikhulu kwilizwekazi ngokugcwala kwabahambi ngasemva kweLondon-Heathrow, eParis-Roissy, eFrankfurt naseMadrid .Nangona kunjalo, ngo-2012 yaba sisikhululo seenqwelomoya sesine esixakekileyo eYurophu esinabakhweli abangama abadlulayo.
oku kufumaneka e-netherlands, ilizwe laseYurophu
Yakutsk ( ; , ) sisixeko esilikomkhulu saseSakha, eRashiya, esimi malunga kumzantsi weArctic Circle . Ikhuthazwe lishishini lemigodi, iYakutsk iye yaba sesinye sezona zixeko zengingqi zaseRussia ezikhula ngokukhawuleza, enabemi abangama-355,443 kuBalo luka-2021. 
Yakutsk — apho ubushushu bonyaka obuphakathi ngu , amaqondo obushushu aphezulu ebusika ahlala engaphantsi , kwaye irekhodi lisezantsi ngu- , — sesona sixeko sibandayo ehlabathini. I-Yakutsk ikwasesona sixeko sikhulu sikwi -permafrost eqhubekayo ; ekuphela kwesixeko esikhulu yiNorilsk, ekwaseSiberia . I-Yakutsk ibekwe kwi -Central Yakutian Lowland kwaye iyizibuko elikhulu kuMlambo waseLena . Ikhonzwa kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya saseYakutsk kunye nesikhululo seenqwelomoya esincinci saseMagan.
AmaTaliyane kwiLegion yaseFransi yangaphandle
Ubukho bamavolontiya ase-Italiya kwi-French Foreign Legion bekusoloko kuninzi. Ukususela ngo-1831 ukuya ku-2014, malunga namashumi amathandathu amawaka akhonza apho. Amagosa angaphambili okanye amajoni omkhosi weNapoleon , abathandi belizwe leRisorgimento, ii-aristocrat, izaphuli-mthetho ezilukhuni, ama -anti-fascists, amaYuda atshutshiswa yimithetho yobuhlanga, i- anarchists, i- fascists, i-republicans kunye nabahlaseli, baninzi abo bafuna ikhusi okanye isenzo phantsi. i kepi emhlophe.
Ngexesha leMfazwe yeHlabathi yokuQala yonke iyunithi yenziwe ngamaTaliyane ngokupheleleyo: iLegion Garibaldina . Ngo -1939, amaTaliyane angama-639 abhalisa kwiLegion, ngelixa ukusuka kwi-1944 ukuya kwi-1954, unyaka wokuwa kwenqaba yaseDien Bien Phu, malunga nama-10,000 amaTaliyane aye abhaliswa kuMkhosi waNgaphandle kwaye uninzi lwawo lwalufudukele ngokufihlakeleyo eFransi . Ekuweni kwenqaba i-5,000 legionaries yase-Italiya yayisilwa kwiMfazwe yase-Indochina, ngaphezu kwewaka babengamabanjwa ase-Italiya emfazwe yase- Viet Minh kwaye ngaphezu kwe-1,300 yafa ekulweni ukususela ngo -1946 .
Kwindibano yepalamente yase-Italiya nge-13 ka-Okthobha ngo-1950, uGiancarlo Pajetta wayigxeka into yokuba amanye amacandelo ezopolitiko aqhayisa ngokusetyenziswa kwemikhosi yase-Italiya e-Indochina: "Uyabona, eli binzana lingabonakala linamandla kuwe, kodwa kule nkalo ndingacaphula. wena liphephandaba elipapashwa eRoma, iphephandaba elixhasa ngenzondelelo umgaqo-nkqubo wakho wezomkhosi wangoku; ndibhekisa kwiphephandaba likaSanti Savarino. Kweli phephandaba, nje izolo, ngokubhekiselele kwimikhosi yaseFransi e- Indochina, ye-Foreign Legion e- Indochina (apho esaziyo ukuba zingaphi "ii-bastards" zaseNtaliyane eziphelileyo, kwaye zeziphi izizathu) kubhaliwe: "«Okwangoku, ithe incinci kakhulu ukuba amawaka amaTaliyane alwa ne-reds e-Indochina.Kwaye balwa kuMkhosi Wasemzini!»" »
Pa pa pa pa pa pa pa pa pa
Ta ta ta ta ta ta ta ta ta ta
Umbutho weRhafu yeeNtengiselwano zeZimali kunye neNtshukumo yaBemi
I -Association pour la Taxation des Transactions financières et pour l'Action Citoyenne ( Umbutho weRhafu yeeNtengiselwano zemali kunye neNtshukumo yabemi, i- ATTAC ) ngumbutho wamatshantliziyo owadalwa ekuqaleni ukukhuthaza ukusekwa kwerhafu kwiintengiselwano zotshintshiselwano lwangaphandle .
Isini luphawu olugqibayo enoba into evelisa iintlobano zesini ivelisa iigamete zenkunzi okanye zamabhinqa . Izityalo zamadoda kunye nezilwanyana zivelisa i-gametes encinci ehambayo (i-spermatozoa, i-sperm, i-pollen ), ngelixa abafazi bavelisa ezinkulu, ezingenayo i-motile ( i-ova, edla ngokubizwa ngokuba ngamaseli eqanda). Izinto eziphilayo ezivelisa zombini ezi ntlobo zezilwanyana zibizwa ngokuba zii hermaphrodites . Ngexesha lokuzala, iigametes zamadoda nabasetyhini ziyadibana ukuze zenze ii-zygotes, ezikhula zibe yinzala efumana iimpawu kumzali ngamnye.
Amadoda kunye nabasetyhini beentlobo banokuba nokufana komzimba (i-monomorphism yesondo) okanye iyantlukwano (i- sexual dimorphism ) ebonisa iingcinezelo ezahlukeneyo zokuzala kwisini esahlukileyo. 
kodwa ukuba isondo asinayo iincopho ezijoliswe ekuzaleni, ngoko ke &amp;egrave; ngokuchasene nemvelo kwaye &amp;egrave; ngoko ke isenzo esingcolileyo.
Attel ngumlambo waseBavaria, eJamani . YUrophu.
Ingena kwi- Inn kufuphi neRamerberg .
ISivumelwano saseVersailles
ISivumelwano saseVersailles yayisisivumelwano soxolo esatyikitywa ngomhla wama-28 kuJuni ngo-1919. Njengesona sivumelwano sibalulekileyo seMfazwe Yehlabathi I, yaphelisa imeko yemfazwe phakathi kweJamani kunye nenkoliso yaMazwe Amanyeneyo . Kwasayinwa kwiBhotwe laseVersailles, kanye kwiminyaka emihlanu emva kokubulawa kukaArchduke uFranz Ferdinand, okwakhokelela emfazweni. Amanye aMandla aseMbindini kwicala laseJamani atyikitya izivumelwano ezahlukeneyo. IUnited States ayizange isivume isivumelwano saseVersailles kwaye yenze isivumelwano soxolo esahlukileyo neJamani. Nangona i- armistice ye-11 kaNovemba ka-1918 yawuphelisa umlo wokwenene, kwathatha iinyanga ezintandathu zothethathethwano lwe-Allied kwiNkomfa yoXolo yaseParis ukugqiba isivumelwano soxolo. IJamani ayizange ivunyelwe ukuba nenxaxheba kwiingxoxo-kwanyanzeleka ukuba isayine isiphumo sokugqibela. 
kodwa amahlakani anika iJamani imeko ethob’ isidima kangangokuba yazala ubuNazi yaza yakhokelela kwiMfazwe Yehlabathi II
IsiHungary ( &lt;/img&gt; ) lilizwe elivaliweyo kuMbindi Yurophu . Ithatha yeCarpathian Basin, ijikeleze iSlovakia ukuya emantla, iUkraine ukuya emantla-mpuma, iRomania ukuya empuma nakumazantsi-mpuma, iSerbia emazantsi, iCroatia kunye neSlovenia kumazantsi-ntshona, kunye neOstriya ngasentshona. IHungary inabemi abazizigidi ezisisi-9.7, uninzi lwabo bengabemi baseHungary kunye neqaqobana lamaRomani . IsiHungary, ulwimi olusemthethweni, lolona lwimi luthethwa kakhulu emhlabeni lwesiUralic kwaye phakathi kweelwimi ezimbalwa ezingezizo zaseIndo-European ezithethwa kakhulu eYurophu. IBudapest likomkhulu lelizwe kunye nesona sixeko sikhulu ; eminye imimandla emikhulu yasezidolophini iquka iDebrecen, iSzeged, iMiskolc, iPécs, neGyőr .
iHungary ngaphambili yayihleli kunye neAustria kwaye yayibumba iAustriaHungary
Iriphabliki yaseAfrika eseMbindini
IRiphabhliki yaseMbindi Afrika ( CAR ; ; IsiFrentshi: "République centrafricaine" , RCA ; , okanye Centrafrique , ) lilizwe elivaliweyo kuMbindi Afrika . Imida yiChad ukuya emantla, iSudan ukuya kumntla-mpuma, iSouth Sudan ukuya kumzantsi-mpuma, iDemocratic Republic of the Congo ukuya emazantsi, iRiphabhlikhi yaseCongo emazantsi ntshona, kunye neCameroon ngasentshona .
IRiphabliki yoMbindi Afrika igubungela ummandla omalunga . , it had an estimated population of around million. , the Central African Republic is the scene of a civil war, which is ongoing since 2012.
Iriphabliki yombindi we-Afrika isezantsi kuluhlu lwe-HDI, kwaye ke ngoko umgangatho wobomi awuwona ungcono
ISweden, ngokusesikweni uBukumkani baseSweden, lilizwe laseNordic elikuSingasiqithi weScandinavia kuMntla Yurophu . Umda weNorway ukuya entshona nakumantla, iFinland ukuya empuma, kwaye idityaniswe neDenmark kumzantsi-ntshona ngebhulorho itonela ngaphesheya kwe- Öresund . Kwi- , iSweden lelona lizwe likhulu leNordic, ilizwe lesithathu ngobukhulu kwi- European Union, kunye nelizwe lesihlanu ngobukhulu eYurophu. Ikomkhulu kunye nesona sixeko sikhulu yiStockholm . ISweden inabemi bebonke be-10.5 million, kunye noxinaniso oluphantsi lwabemi be , malunga ne-87% yabantu baseSweden abahlala kwimimandla yasezidolophini, ethatha i-1.5% yomhlaba wonke, kumbindi kunye nesiqingatha esisemazantsi welizwe.
ILələdulan yilali ekumasipala waseAran eLerik Rayon yaseAzerbaijan . 
Iinno ( ) luhlobo lwemibongo, oludla ngokudityaniswa nomculo, lwemo yestrophic kunye nesihloko esiphakamileyo: ukuthanda izwe, intsomi, inkolo . Ingqokelela yamaiinno abizwa ngokuba iinno-ecawa kwaye ixhaphakile kwinkonzo yobuKristu nomthandazo .
Kumaxesha amandulo eli inno laliyingoma yonqulo ezinikele kuThixo nasekuzukisweni kwawo. Yaqala yaphuhliswa kwiMpuma Ekufuphi ( "Inni Hurriti" ) kwaye kamva kwimpucuko yamaGrike : incinci kancinane kwiRoma, apho yayicaciswe kakhulu ngendlela yokwakheka kwihexameters .
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseHervey Bay
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseHervey Bay 
sesona sikhululo seenqwelomoya isixeko saseHervey Bay, Queensland, Australia kunye nommandla weFraser Coast obandakanya isixeko esikufuphi saseMaryborough .
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya, esiku- kumzantsi-mpuma wePialba, iphinde yavulwa phakathi ku-2005, emva kokuba ibala leenqwelomoya elikhoyo liye lafumana uphuculo lwe-11.5 yezigidi zeedola ezibandakanya ulwakhiwo lwesakhiwo esitsha kunye nokwandiswa kwe- ekhoyo. indlela yokubaleka ukuya kwi- ukulungiselela iinkonzo zejethi ezivela kwiVirgin Australia .
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoSeptemba ka-2006, iSunshine Express Airlines ibonelele ngeenkonzo zemihla ngemihla kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya ukusuka eBrisbane. Inkampani yeenqwelomoya yayeka yonke imisebenzi ecwangcisiweyo ngomhla woku-1 ku-Okthobha ka-2006 emva kokufunyanwa okucetywayo yi -Regional Express Airlines yapheliswa kwaye injongo ye- QantasLink yokwazisa ngeenkonzo zaseBrisbane yabhengezwa. 
Isikhululo sikaloliwe sasePlatja de Castelldefels
IPlatja de Castelldefels yiRodalies de Catalunya kwisikhululo sikaloliwe esisebenzela ulwandle lwesithili sase Castelldefels, e Catalonia, Spain. Ibekwe malunga emazantsi edolophu enkulu kwaye ngaphantsi ukusuka elunxwemeni, iyenza ixakeke kakhulu ngeenyanga zasehlotyeni kodwa iphantse ibe yintlango ebusika. Ikhonzwa ngoololiwe abathile kumzila wenkonzo kaloliwe waseBarcelona .
Ajjanahalli, Bangalore South
IAjjanahalli, iBangalore South yilali ekumazantsi eKarnataka, eIndiya. Ibekwe kwiBangalore, South taluk yesithili saseBangalore eKarnataka.
Umda omkhulu ummelwane okufutshane
Umda omkhulu okufutshane nommelwane ( LMNN ) ukuhlelwa yi- algorithm yokufunda ngomatshini wokufunda nge-metric . Ifunda ipseudometric eyenzelwe ukuhlelwa kommelwane okufutshane k . I-algorithm isekelwe kwi -semifinite programming, i-sub-class ye -convex optimization .
Injongo yokufunda ephantsi kweliso (ukuhlelwa ngokukodwa) kukufunda umgaqo wesigqibo onokuhlela iimeko zedatha ngokweeklasi ezichazwe kwangaphambili. Umthetho ongummelwane okufutshane uthatha iseti yedatha "yoqeqesho" yemizekelo ebhaliweyo (okt iiklasi ziyaziwa). Ihlela umzekelo omtsha wedatha kunye neklasi efunyenwe kwivoti yesininzi semizekelo yoqeqesho ekufutshane (ebhaliweyo). Ukusondela kulinganiswa nge- metric echazwe kwangaphambili .
I-10,000 ( ishumi lamawaka ) linani lendalo elilandela u-9,999 kwaye landulele i-10,001.
Ngenkulungwane yama-34 BC
Inkulungwane ye -34 BC yayiyinkulungwane eyathatha unyaka wama-3400 ngaphambi kokuzalwa kukaKristu ukuya ku-3301 BC
Iziganeko ze- 1410s eNgilani.
I- (mfutshane ye "IiNdaba zoShishino kunye nezoQoqosho") ) liphephandaba lemihla ngemihla eJapan elipapashwe yiSankei Inendawo yesixhenxe ephezulu phakathi kwamaphephandaba engingqi eJapan . Phakathi kwamaphephandaba aseJapan, ukuhanjiswa kusemva "Yomiuri Shimbun", Seikyo Shimbun, "Asahi Shimbun", "Chunichi Shimbun", "Mainichi Shimbun", "the Nikkei", Nikkan Gendai, kunye neMidlalo yaseTokyo .
Nangona ngokwenene iphepha lengingqi elikhonza iKansai kunye neKanto, liye lahlelwa njenge "iphephandaba lesizwe" ngomgaqo-nkqubo wekhosi ye-reverse yelizwe lezoshishino ( Keidanren ).
Iminyaka yee-1010 BC yiminyaka elishumi eyathatha ukusuka ku-1019 BC ukuya ku-1010 BC.
AAAAA Abakhenkethi Abakhenkethi baseTshayina
I-AAAA ( 5A ) inikezelwa kwezona ndawo zibalulekileyo kwaye zigcinwe kakuhle kwiRiphabhlikhi yaBantu baseShayina, inikwe inqanaba eliphezulu kwiindidi zokulinganisa ezisetyenziswa nguMphathiswa weNkcubeko kunye noKhenketho . Ukusukela ngo-2020, kukho iindawo zokhenketho ezingama-279 ezidweliswe njenge-5A.
UEsawu ngunyana omkhulu kaIsake kwiBhayibhile yesiHebhere . Ukhankanywe kwiNcwadi yeGenesis kunye nabaprofeti u-Obhadiya noMalaki . ITestamente Entsha yamaKristu ibhekisela kuye kwiNcwadi eya kumaRoma nakwincwadi eya kumaHebhere.
Ngokutsho kweBhayibhile yesiHebhere, uEsawu ngunozala wamaEdom nomkhuluwa kaYakobi, usolusapho wamaSirayeli. UYakobi noEsawu babengoonyana bakaIsake noRebheka kunye nabazukulwana baka- Abraham noSara . Kula mawele, uEsawu waba ngowokuqala ukuzalwa kunye noYakobi elandela, ebambe isithende sakhe. UIsake ubeminyaka imashumi mathandathu ezelwe, ukuzalwa kwaloo makhwenkwe.
ISlovakia &lt;/img&gt; ; &lt;/img&gt; ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhliki yaseSlovak ( &lt;/img&gt; ), lilizwe elivaliweyo kuMbindi Yurophu . Ijikelezwe yiPoland emantla, iUkraine ngasempuma, iHungary emazantsi, iOstriya kumazantsi-ntshona, kunye neRiphabliki yaseCzech emntla-ntshona. Ilizwe laseSlovakia elineentaba ubukhulu becala lithatha malunga ne , enabemi abangaphezu kwezigidi ezi-5.4. Idolophu enkulu kunye neyona dolophu inkulu yiBratislava, ngelixa isixeko sesibini ngobukhulu yiKošice .
ISlovakia ("Slovakia") , ngokusemthethweni iSlovak Republic (eSlovak "Slovensko" okanye "iSlovenská republika") lilizwe elivaliweyo nelisekwe njengeriphabliki yepalamente emi kumbindi-mpuma weYurophu . Inabemi abangaphezu kwezigidi ezi-5 zabemi kunye nommandla omalunga ne-49,000 yeekhilomitha zeekhilomitha. Esona sixeko sikhulu ikwalikomkhulu, iBratislava, kwaye esesibini isixeko esikhulu yiKošice. Imida iRiphabhlikhi yaseCzech ukuya emantla-ntshona, iPoland ukuya emantla, iUkraine ngasempuma, iHungary ukuya emazantsi kunye neOstriya emazantsi-ntshona. Lilizwe elililungu leManyano yaseYurophu, i-NATO, iZizwe eziManyeneyo, i-OECD kunye neWTO . Ulwimi olusemthethweni sisiSlovak, ulwimi lweqela leSlavic.
AmaSlavs afika kwindawo ngoku ebizwa ngokuba yiSlovakia phakathi kwe- 5th kunye ne -6th inkulungwane ngexesha lohlaselo lwama-barbarian . Kuyo yonke imbali, iinxalenye ezahlukeneyo zentsimi yangoku yayizezoBukumkani baseSamos (ipolisi yokuqala eyaziwayo yamaSlav), iNqununu yaseNitra, i-Great Moravia, uBukumkani baseHungary, i- Austro-Hungary Empire kunye neCzechoslovakia. Ngo-Oktobha 30, 1918, kwavunywa iSibhengezo sikaMartin okanye iSindululo Sabantu baseSlovakia. Ilizwe elizimeleyo laseSlovakia lalikhona ngokufutshane ngexesha leMfazwe Yehlabathi II, njengelizwe likanodoli waseJamani yamaNazi ukusuka kwi-1939 ukuya kwi-1944.
