Ukususela ngowe-1945, iSlovakia yaphinda yaba yinxalenye yeCzechoslovakia. IRiphabhlikhi yaseSlovak kunye neRiphabhlikhi yaseCzech yazalwa ngomhla we-1 kaJanuwari 1993 ukusuka kwisahlulo, esigunyaziswe yipalamente yaseCzechoslovakia, eyayisele ithathe igama leCzech kunye neSlovak Federal Republic ukususela ngo-1990.
ISlovakia iwela kwiqela lamazwe ahambele phambili. Kwi-2004 yajoyina i-European Union kwaye yamkela i -euro kwi-2009. I-Slovakia, iSlovenia, i-Estonia, iLatvia, iLithuania kunye neCroatia kuphela amazwe avela kwiBloc yangaphambili yaseMpuma ukuba abe yinxalenye ye-European Union, i- Eurozone, indawo ye-Schengen kunye ne-NATO ngaxeshanye.
Umphakathi waseCzech
IRiphabliki yaseCzech ( Czech : "Česká republika", ) okanye iCzechia ( "Česko" ), lilizwe elililungu leManyano yaseYurophu, elikuMbindi Yurophu.
Ijikelezwe yiSlovakia emazantsi mpuma, iOstriya emazantsi, iJamani ngasentshona, kunye nePoland emantla. Lilizwe elivaliweyo . Ikomkhulu layo yiPrague . Ngokwembali yenziwe yimimandla emithathu emikhulu: iBohemia (entshona), iMoravia (empuma) kunye neSilesia (yahlulwe kunye nePoland kwaye, ngenxalenye encinci, neJamani).
Wazalwa ngo-1 kaJanuwari 1993, kunye neSlovakia, ukusuka kwisahlulo soxolo saseCzechoslovakia, eyathi ukususela ngo-1990 yathatha igama leCzech kunye neSlovak Federal Republic, iRiphabhliki yaseCzech iyinxalenye ye- European Union kunye ne -NATO kwaye yenye yezona ndawo zikhuselekileyo. kwihlabathi, ngokwe- Global Peace Index 2019. Ayizange ithathe i -euro njengemali yayo.
ICuba ( &lt;/img&gt; , &lt;/img&gt; ; ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseCuba ( &lt;/img&gt; ), lilizwe lesiqithi elibandakanya isiqithi saseCuba, kunye ne -Isla de la Juventud kunye neqela leziqithi ezincinci. ICuba ilapho kuhlangana khona uLwandle lweCaribbean, iGulf of Mexico, kunye noLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki. ICuba ikwimpuma yeYucatán Peninsula (eMexico), emazantsi elizwe laseMelika iFlorida kunye neBahamas, kwintshona ye- Hispaniola ( iHaiti / iRiphabhlikhi yaseDominican ), nakumantla eJamaica kunye neZiqithi zeCayman . IHavana sesona sixeko sikhulu kunye nekomkhulu; ezinye izixeko ezikhulu ziquka iSantiago de Cuba kunye neCamagüey . Indawo esemthethweni yeRiphabhlikhi yaseCuba yi- (ngaphandle kwamanzi ommandla) kodwa iyonke ngama- kubandakanywa ummandla woqoqosho olulodwa . ICuba lilizwe lesibini elinabantu abaninzi kwiCaribbean emva kweHaiti, elinabemi abangaphezu kwezigidi ezili-11. 
I-Bhelarusi, ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseBelarus, lilizwe elivaliweyo eMpuma Yurophu. Ijikelezwe yiRussia ngasempuma nakumantla-mpuma, iUkraine emazantsi, iPoland ngasentshona, kunye neLithuania kunye neLatvia emantla-ntshona. Ukugubungela ummandla kunye nabemi abazizigidi ezisisi-9.2, iBelarus lelona lizwe likhulu kakhulu kunye ne- 20th-elinabantu abaninzi eYurophu. Eli lizwe linemozulu ene -hemiboreal kwaye lahlulwe ngokolawulo laba ziingingqi ezisixhenxe .I-Minsk yeyona dolophu inkulu kunye neyona dolophu inkulu.
Phakathi kwexesha eliphakathi kunye nenkulungwane yama-20, amazwe ahlukeneyo ngamaxesha ahlukeneyo ayelawula imihlaba yeBelarus yanamhlanje, kuquka iKievan Rus ', iNqununu yasePolotsk, iGrand Duchy yaseLithuania, i- Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, kunye noBukhosi baseRashiya .Emva kweRevolution yaseRashiya ngowe-1917, kwavela amazwe ahlukeneyo ekhuphisana ngokuba semthethweni phakathi kweMfazwe yamakhaya, eyaphela ngokunyuka kwe- SSR yaseByelorussian, eyathi yaba lilizwe elisisiseko le -Soviet Union ngo-1922. Emva kweMfazwe yasePoland-Soviet, iBelarus yalahlekelwa phantse isiqingatha sommandla wayo ePoland. Uninzi lwemida yaseBelarus yathatha imilo yayo yangoku ngo-1939, xa amanye amazwe eRiphabhlikhi yesiBini yasePoland aphinda adityaniswa kuyo emva kohlaselo lwaseSoviet ePoland, kwaye yagqitywa emva kweMfazwe Yehlabathi. II. &lt;ref name="uni2"&gt;.
INorway, ngokusemthethweni uBukumkani baseNorway, lilizwe laseNordic kuMntla Yurophu, ummandla omkhulu welizwe oquka intshona kunye neyona ndawo isemantla yePeninsula yaseScandinavia. Isiqithi esisemagqagaleni eArctic iJan Mayen kunye nechweba laseSvalbard nazo ziyinxalenye yeNorway. Isiqithi saseBouvet, esise- Subantarctic, sixhomekeke eNorway; ikwabeka amabango kwimimandla ye-Antarctic yasePeter I Island kunye ne-Queen Maud Land . Ikomkhulu kunye nesixeko esikhulu eNorway yiOslo .
INorway inommandla kwaye yayinabemi abayi-5,488,984 ngoJanuwari 2023. Ilizwe labelana ngomda omde osempuma kunye neSweden kubude be- . Umda weFinland kunye neRussia ukuya emantla-mpuma kunye neSkagerrak Strait emazantsi, kwelinye icala apho yiDenmark kunye neUnited Kingdom . INorway inonxweme olubanzi, olujongene noLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki olukuMntla noLwandle iBarents . Impembelelo yaselwandle ilawula imozulu yaseNorway, kunye namaqondo obushushu asezantsi kumanxweme olwandle; Umbindi welizwe, ngelixa ubanda, nawo uthambile ngokuphawulekayo kuneendawo ezikwenye indawo ehlabathini kwezo zide zisemantla. Kwanasebusuku emantla, amaqondo obushushu angaphezu komkhenkce ayinto eqhelekileyo kunxweme. Impembelelo yaselwandle izisa imvula ephezulu kunye nekhephu kwiindawo ezithile zelizwe.
UHarald V weNdlu yaseGlücksburg unguKumkani wangoku waseNorway. UJonas Gahr Støre ube yinkulumbuso ukusukela ngo-2021. Njengelizwe elimanyeneyo elinobukhosi obunomgaqo-siseko, iNorway yahlula amandla karhulumente phakathi kwepalamente, ikhabhinethi kunye nenkundla ephakamileyo, njengoko kumiselwe ngumgaqo -siseko we - 1814.
. Ubukumkani basekwa ngo-872 njengokudityaniswa kwezikumkani ezininzi ezincinci kwaye bekukho ngokuqhubekayo kwi-1, Iminyaka i . Ukusukela ngo-1537 ukuya kowe-1814, iNorway yayiyinxalenye yoBukumkani baseDenmark-Norway, kwaye, ukusuka ngo-1814 ukuya kowe-19 y, yayikumanyano lobuqu noBukumkani baseSweden. INorway yayingathathi cala ngexesha leMfazwe yeHlabathi yokuQala, kwaye nakwiMfazwe yesibini yeHlabathi de kwango-Epreli ngo-1940 xa ilizwe lahlaselwa laza lathinjwa yiJamani yamaNazi de kwaba sekupheleni kwemfazwe.
Umnyhadala weSlane (odla ngokubizwa ngokuba nguSlane ) yikonsathi ephindaphindwayo ebibanjwa iminyaka emininzi ukusukela ngo-1981 kumhlaba weSlane Castle kumda weSlane e County Meath, eIreland. Le nqaba iphethwe yi -8th Marquess Conyngham, eyayisaziwa ngegama lembeko i- Earl yeNtaba iCharles ukusuka ngo-1974 ukuya kutsho ngo-2009. I-Slane ilele phakathi kweNavan kunye neDrogheda, malunga ne-45 km kumntla-ntshona weDublin . Iikonsathi zidla ngokuba ngoMgqibelo ngo-Agasti, ukusuka ngo-12:00 ukuya ku-22:00. Iindawo ezithambekileyo zeSlane Castle zenza iqonga lendalo elilungele iikonsathi. Kangangangama-70,000–110,000 abantu abadla ngokuzimasa. Omnye wemida yendawo nguMlambo iBoyne . Abantu ababini basweleka ngelixa bezama ukuqubha emlanjeni ukufumana ukufikelela simahla kwikonsathi ye- REM ngo-1995. Ubuncinci beminyaka yokwamkelwa kwi-Slane Festival yancitshiswa ngo-2006 ukusuka kwi-18 ukuya kwi-16 ngenxa yezikhalazo. 
I-Aiken Promotions imema abaculi abafana noDavid Bowie, uBob Dylan, uKumkanikazi, i-Rolling Stones, kunye noBruce Springsteen ukuba benze ngexesha le-1980. 2001 kunye 2013 kuphela iminyaka apho iikonsathi ezimbini zabanjwa ngonyaka omnye. Kwi-2001, zombini iikonsathi zabhalwa ngu -U2. Ngo-2013, ikhonsathi yokuqala yayiphethwe nguBon Jovi kwaye eyesibini ngu- Eminem, owayeye wayirhoxisa imbonakalo yakhe ye-Slane ngo-2005 emva kokungena ekubuyiseleni iziyobisi.
Ingxaki yezemali yiyo nayiphi na intlaninge ebanzi yeemeko apho ezinye ii-asethi zemali ngequbuliso zilahlekelwa yinxalenye enkulu yexabiso lazo. Ngenkulungwane ye-19 nasekuqaleni kwe-20, iingxaki zemali ezininzi zazinxulunyaniswa noloyiko lwebhanki, kwaye ukudodobala koqoqosho okuninzi kuhambelana nolu loyiko. Ezinye iimeko ezidla ngokubizwa ngokuba ziingxaki zemali ziquka ukuthotywa kwemarike yemasheya kunye nokugqabhuka kwamanye amaqamza emali, iingxaki zemali, kunye nokusilela okuzimeleyo. Iintlekele zemali zikhokelela ngokuthe ngqo kwilahleko yobutyebi bamaphepha kodwa azibangeli ukuba kubekho utshintsho olubalulekileyo kuqoqosho lokwenyani (umz. ingxaki ebangelwe yiqamza le-tulip mania elidumileyo ngenkulungwane ye-17).
Ubomi be-Surf Life Saving Northern Region
I-Surf Life Saving Northern Region ngowona mmandla mkhulu kwemine eyenza iSurf Life Saving New Zealand. Ukusukela kwixesha le-2021/2022, lenziwe ngamaqela ali-18 ajongana neendawo ezingama-22 zokugada ukusuka e-Ahipara ukuya eRaglan kuNxweme oluseNtshona kwaye ukusuka kwi- Whangārei Heads ukuya eTakapuna kuNxweme oluseMpuma.
JMSDF Museum yaseKure
IMyuziyam yeJMSDF Kure eKure, eHiroshima .
Eliqhalo lithetha ukuthi "ukusweleka komntu owaziwayo esaziwa ngomsebenzi wakhe omhle".
IGibraltar ) nguMmandla waseBritane ongaphesheya kunye nesixeko esikumazantsi encam ye- Iberian Peninsula . Inommandla we- kwaye ijikeleze emantla yiSpain . Imbonakalo yomhlaba ilawulwa liLiwa laseGibraltar, emazantsi ayo idolophu enabantu abaninzi, ikhaya labantu abangama-32,688 (uqikelelo luka-2022), ikakhulu abantu baseGibraltarians . 
Ngowe-1704, imikhosi yamaNgesi namaDatshi yathimba iGibraltar esuka eSpeyin ebudeni beMfazwe yokuLandelana kweSpeyin . Lo mmandla wanikelwa kwi -Great Britain ngonaphakade phantsi kweSivumelwano sase-Utrecht ngo-1713. Yaba sisiseko esibalulekileyo seRoyal Navy, ngakumbi ngexesha leeMfazwe zeNapoleonic kunye neMfazwe yesibini yeHlabathi, njengoko yayilawula umnyango omncinci kunye nokuphuma kuLwandle lweMeditera, iStrait yaseGibraltar, eyi- kuphela. ububanzi. Eli nqanaba lokuminxa lihlala libalulekile ngokweqhinga, nesiqingatha sorhwebo lolwandle lwehlabathi oludlula kuyo. Uqoqosho lwaseGibraltar lusekwe ikakhulu kukhenketho, ukungcakaza kwi-Intanethi, kwiinkonzo zezimali, nakwi -bunkering . 
Abantu baseMzantsi Ndebele
IsiNdebele ) ngabantu bomthonyama eMzantsi Afrika abathetha isiNdebele . Bahlala ikakhulu kumaphondo aseMpumalanga, eGauteng naseLimpopo, onke akumntla-mpuma welizwe.
Imaine lelona lizwe lisezantsi kwingingqi yeNew England kuMntla-mpuma weUnited States . Umda weNew Hampshire ngasentshona, iGulf of Maine ukuya emazantsi mpuma, kunye namaphondo aseCanada aseNew Brunswick naseQuebec ukuya emantla mpuma nakumantla-ntshona, ngokulandelanayo. Elona lizwe likhulu ngommandla waseNew England, iMaine lelona 12 lincinci ngokwengingqi, i -9th-incinci inabemi, i- 13th-eyona inabemi abaninzi, kunye neyona ndawo yasemaphandleni kumazwe angama-50 ase-US . Ikwangowona usemantla mpuma phakathi kwe- United States edibanayo, ilizwe elisemantla empuma yeGreat Lakes, ekuphela kwelizwe eligama layo linesilabhili esinye, kwaye ekuphela kwelizwe elinomda welinye ilizwe lase-US. Ngokumalunga nesiqingatha sommandla waseMaine ulele kwicala ngalinye le -45th parallel enyakatho kwisibanzi . Esona sixeko sinabantu abaninzi eMaine yiPortland, ngelixa ikomkhulu layo linguAugusta .
IMaine yaziwa ngokwesiko ngokujija kwayo, uLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki enamatye kunye nonxweme oluselunxwemeni; iintaba ezigudileyo; ingaphakathi elinamahlathi kakhulu; iindlela ezintle zamanzi; namaqunube ayo aluhlaza kunye nokutya kwaselwandle, ngakumbi iikreyifishi neeclams . I-Coastal and Down East Maine iye yavela njengamaziko abalulekileyo kuqoqosho loyilo, ngakumbi kwindawo yasePortland, ekwazisa i-gentrification . 
Inani ( ; libhalwe njenge " pi ") yimathematika engaguqukiyo engumlinganiselo wesangqa kwidayamitha yaso, malunga ne 3.14159. Inani livela kwiifomyula ezininzi kwimathematika nakwifiziksi . Linani eli -irrational, okuthetha ukuba alinakuchazwa ngokuthe ngqo njengomlinganiselo wee-integer ezimbini, nangona amaqhezu afana nala. formula_1 zidla ngokusetyenziswa ukuyiqikelela . Ngenxa yoko, umboniso wayo wedesimali awupheli, okanye ungenisa ipateni ephinda-phinda ngokusisigxina . Linani elingaphaya kwengqondo, okuthetha ukuba ayinakuba sisisombululo senxaki ebandakanya kuphela izibalo, iimveliso, amandla, kunye nenani elipheleleyo. Ukugqithiswa kuka kuthetha ukuba akunakwenzeka ukusombulula umngeni wamandulo wokusquaring isangqa ngekhampasi kunye ne-straightedge . Inani lokugqibela lika libonakala lisasazwa ngokungacwangciswanga, kodwa akukho bungqina balo mfanekiso bufunyenweyo.
Kangangamawaka eminyaka, iingcali zezibalo ziye zazama ukwandisa ukuqonda kwazo u , ngamanye amaxesha ngokuthelekisa ixabiso layo ukuya kwinqanaba eliphezulu lokuchaneka. Impucuko yamandulo, kubandakanya amaJiphutha namaBhabhiloni, yayifuna uqikelelo oluchanekileyo lwe yokubala okusebenzayo. Malunga nama-250BC, isazi sezibalo samaGrike u-Archimedes wenze i-algorithm yokuqikelela ngokuchaneka okungafunekiyo. Ngenkulungwane ye-5 ye-AD, iingcali zezibalo zaseTshayina zaqikelelwa ku ukuya kwasixhenxe, ngelixa iingcali zezibalo zaseIndiya zenza uqikelelo olunamanani amahlanu, zombini zisebenzisa ubuchule bejometri. Indlela yokuqala yokubala ka, esekwe kuthotho olungenasiphelo, yafunyanwa kwimillennium kamva. Ukusetyenziswa kwangaphambili okwaziwayo konobumba wesiGrike u-π ukumela umlinganiselo wesangqa sesangqa ukuya kwidayamitha yaso yayiyingcali yezibalo yaseWales uWilliam Jones ngo-1706 
Ukwenziwa kwecalculus kwakamsinya kukhokelele ekubalweni kwamakhulu amanani ka, anele kulo lonke ubalo lwenzululwazi olusebenzayo. Nangona kunjalo, kwinkulungwane yama-20 kunye neyama-21, iingcali zezibalo kunye nezazinzulu zekhompyuter ziye zalandela iindlela ezintsha zokuthi, xa zidityanisiwe namandla okubalekayo, zandise ukumelwa kwedesimali ka- ukuya kwiitriliyoni ezininzi zamanani. Olu lubalo lukhuthazwa kuphuhliso lweealgorithms ezisebenzayo ukubala uthotho lwamanani, kunye nokufuna kwabantu ukwaphula iirekhodi. Ubalo olubanzi olubandakanyekayo luye lwasetyenziselwa ukuvavanya iikhompyutha ezinkulu.
I-1 000 000 yokuqala yamanani ePhi ngala:
3.
IBhunga leNkxaso-mali laseSkotlani
IBhunga leNkxaso-mali laseScottishisiGaelic saseScottish : "Comhairle Maoineachaidh na h-Alba" ; I - SFC ), ekubhekiselwa kuyo ngokusesikweni njengeBhunga leNkxaso-mali yeMfundo ePhakamileyo yaseScotland, liqumrhu likarhulumente elingelilo isebe elihlawuliswe inkxaso-mali kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo aseSkotlani , kuquka iikholeji ezingama - 26 kunye neeyunivesithi ezili - 19 . 
Ibhunga lasekwa nguMthetho weMfundo ePhakamileyo nePhakamileyo (eScotland) 2005 . Ithatha indawo yamabhunga amabini ahlukeneyo enkxaso-mali, iBhunga leNkxaso-mali yeMfundo ePhakamileyo yaseScottish (i-SFEFC) kunye neBhunga leNkxaso-mali yeMfundo ePhakamileyo yaseScottish (SHEFC), eyasekwa nguMthetho weMfundo ePhakamileyo noPhakamileyo (eScotland) ngo-1992 . Ekusekweni kwayo, iSFC yafumana bonke abasebenzi kunye nempahla yaloo mabhunga.
I-multibit ye-PLL okanye i-multibit ye-PLL yi- loop evaliweyo yesigaba (i-PLL) efezekisa ukusebenza okuphuculweyo xa kuthelekiswa ne- unibit ye-PLL ngokusebenzisa amasuntswana amaninzi . Ii-Unibit PLLs zisebenzisa kuphela eyona bit ibalulekileyo (MSB) yebhasi yemveliso yekhawunta nganye ukulinganisa isigaba, ngelixa ii-multibit PLL zisebenzisa amasuntswana amaninzi. Ii-PLL ziyinxalenye ebalulekileyo kunxibelelwano ngocingo.
Ii-PLL zeMultibit ziphucula ukusebenza kakuhle kunye nokusebenza kakuhle: ukusetyenziswa ngcono kwe- frequency spectrum, ukunceda abasebenzisi abaninzi kumgangatho ophezulu wenkonzo (QoS), ukunciphisa amandla okuhambisa iRF, kunye nokunciphisa ukusetyenziswa kwamandla kwiiselfowuni nezinye izixhobo ezingenazingcingo.
IsiAvala yintaba eseSerbia, ejongene neBelgrade . Ime kwikona esemazantsi-mpuma esixeko kwaye ibonelela ngombono omkhulu weBelgrade, Vojvodina kunye neŠumadija, njengoko indawo ejikelezileyo macala onke iyindawo ephantsi. Ime kwi- ngaphezu komphakamo wolwandle, okuthetha ukuba ingena kudidi lwentaba oluchazwe ekuhlaleni nje nge- .
Isi-Icelandic lilizwe lesiqithi saseNordic kuLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki olukuMntla kunye noLwandlekazi lweArctic . IIceland lelona lizwe linabemi abambalwa eYurophu . Ikomkhulu laseIceland kunye nesona sixeko sikhulu yiReykjavík, elikhaya malunga ne-36% yabemi. I-Iceland yeyona ndawo inkulu yoMmandla we-Mid-Atlantic Ridge onyuka ngaphezu komphakamo wolwandle, kwaye umbindi walo wentaba-mlilo ugqabhuka phantse rhoqo . Ngaphakathi kukho ithafa elibonakala ngamathafa esanti kunye nodaka, iintaba kunye nomkhenkce, kwaye imilambo emininzi yomkhenkce iqukuqela ukuya elwandle kwiindawo ezisezantsi . I-Iceland ifudunyezwa yiGulf Stream kwaye inemozulu epholileyo, nangona i-latitude ephakamileyo ngaphandle kwe- Arctic Circle . Ubude bayo obuphakamileyo kunye nempembelelo yaselwandle igcina ihlobo libanda, kwaye uninzi lweziqithi zalo zinemozulu epholileyo .
Ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yase-Iceland (isi-Icelandic: "Lýðveldið Ísland" ), lilizwe lesiqithi elikumantla aseYurophu kwaye liyinxalenye yoMmandla weScandinavia . Ibekwe kuLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki yoMntla, phakathi kweGreenland neGreat Britain, kumntla-ntshona weZiqithi zeFarae . I-Iceland ijikelezwe luLwandle lwaseGreenland ukuya emantla, uLwandlekazi lwaseAtlantiki oluseMantla ukuya empuma nasemazantsi, kunye neDenmark Strait ngasentshona.
Ngo-2020, abantu bebengama- ; oku kuyenza ibe lelinye lawona mazwe anabemi baseYurophu . Ikomkhulu yiReykjavík, esona sixeko sinabantu abaninzi besizwe esinabemi abamalunga ne- , ngelixa isixeko sesibini esibalulekileyo yiAkureyri enabemi abamalunga nama . Ifumaneka kumbindi we-Atlantiki, i-Iceland iphawule umsebenzi wentaba-mlilo kunye ne-geothermal, ebonakalisa ngamandla imbonakalo yomhlaba. Ingaphakathi libandakanya ubukhulu becala intlango, iintaba kunye ne-glaciers, apho imilambo emininzi yomkhenkce igeleza ukuya elwandle, inqumla kwiindawo eziphantsi . Imozulu yesiqithi yahluke kakhulu: emantla icacile, njengoko iphakathi, ngelixa isiqithi sonke imozulu ibanda elwandle ngenxa yeGulf current, evumela ukuhlala kakuhle.
Bhozniya neHerzegovina
I-Bosnia kunye neHerzegovina, efinyeziweyo ethi BiH okanye B&amp;H, maxa wambi ebizwa ngokuba yiBosnia–Herzegovina nedla ngokubizwa ngokungacwangciswanga njengeBosnia , lilizwe elikuMzantsi -mpuma Yurophu, elikwiiBalkans . IBosnia neHerzegovina imida yaseSerbia ngasempuma, iMontenegro ukuya empuma-mpuma, kunye neCroatia ukuya emantla nakumazantsi-ntshona. Emazantsi inonxweme olumxinwa kuLwandle lweAdriatic phakathi kweMeditera, emalunga ubude kwaye ijikeleze idolophu yaseNeum . I-Bosnia, eyingingqi engaphakathi elizweni, inemozulu yelizwekazi eliphakathi kunye nehlobo elishushu kunye nobusika obubandayo, obunekhephu. Kwimimandla esembindini nakwimpuma yelizwe, ijografi ineentaba, emantla-ntshona ineenduli ezilinganiselweyo, kwaye kumntla-mpuma ubukhulu becala ithe tyaba. IHerzegovina, eyingingqi encinci, esemazantsi elizwe, inemozulu yeMeditera kwaye ubukhulu becala ineentaba. I-Sarajevo iyinhloko-dolophu kunye neyona dolophu inkulu yelizwe elandelwa nguBanja Luka, Tuzla kunye neZenica .
Ummandla okhoyo ngoku eBosnia naseHerzegovina uhlalwe ngabantu ukususela ubuncinane kwi- Upper Paleolithic, kodwa ubungqina bubonisa ukuba ngexesha le- Neolithic, iindawo zokuhlala ezisisigxina zabantu zasekwa, kubandakanywa nezo zivela kwi- Butmir, Kakanj, kunye neenkcubeko zeVučedol . Emva kokufika kwe -Indo-Europeans yokuqala, le ndawo yayihlalwa ziimpucuko ezininzi zaseIllyrian kunye neCeltic. Ngokwenkcubeko, ezopolitiko, nentlalontle, eli lizwe linembali etyebileyo nentsonkothileyo. Ookhokho bezizwe zaseMzantsi Slavic ezihlala kule ndawo namhlanje bafika ngexesha le-6 ukuya kweye-9. Ngenkulungwane ye-12, kwasekwa iBanate yaseBosnia ; ngenkulungwane ye-14, oku kuye kwavela kuBukumkani baseBosnia . Embindini wenkulungwane ye-15, yafakwa kwi- Ottoman Empire, ephantsi kolawulo lwalo de kwasekupheleni kwenkulungwane ye-19. Ama-Ottomans azisa inkolo yobuSilamsi kulo mmandla, kwaye yatshintsha imbonakalo yelizwe kunye nenkcubeko yoluntu.
Ukususela ekupheleni kwenkulungwane ye-19 ukuya kutsho kwiMfazwe Yehlabathi I, eli lizwe lafakwa kulawulo lookumkani baseAustria-Hungary. Ngexesha lemfazwe, iBosnia neHerzegovina yayiyinxalenye yoBukumkani baseYugoslavia . Emva kweMfazwe Yehlabathi II, yanikwa iwonga elipheleleyo leriphabliki kwiSocialist Federal Republic yaseYugoslavia eyayisandul’ ukusekwa. Ngowe-1992, emva kokuqhekeka kweYugoslavia, iriphabliki yavakalisa inkululeko . Oku kwalandelwa yiMfazwe yaseBosnia, eyahlala de kwasekupheleni kuka-1995 yaza yafikelela esiphelweni ngokusayinwa kweSivumelwano saseDayton.
UBushra Razack yingcaphephe yophuhliso loluntu lwaseMzantsi Afrika kwaye ukwangummeli wotshintsho kunye noncedo loluntu olugxile ekubandakanyeni abachaphazelekayo. Wazalelwa kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni, eMzantsi Afrika waza wafunda kumabanga aphakamileyo eLadysmith, Kwazulu-Natal nalapho athe waphumelela ibanga leshumi ngo-2003 
UBushra wakhula kunye nabanye abantwana abangama-70 kwikhaya leenkedama kwaye ukususela emncinci wafunda ukubaluleka kokubuyisela okanye ukunikela. Ungumbhali ngokubambisana wencwadi ebizwa, 'Rescue Mission', eyayiyenye yeencwadi eziphonononga ulutsha zeMillennium Development Goals yeZizwe eziManyeneyo ezithiwe thaca kwiNkomfa yeHlabathi yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo , ikomkhulu laseRhawutini. , Mzantsi Afrika. Umsebenzi wakhe noPeace Child, umbutho weembacu osebenzela ukuxhobisa ulutsha ngophuhliso olukhokelwa lulutsha[2] kunye nokunciphisa intlupheko, wamsa kumazwe afana neMorocco, Egypt, Serbia, India, Canada kunye neSkotlani ngethuba esafunda. Emva kwezifundo zakhe uchithe iminyaka emithathu esenza izicwangciso zokubonelela ngeenkonzo kwizibhedlele zokhathalelo lwamehlo eKenya naseCameroon. Amava akhe ophuhliso abandakanya ukusebenza ne-Standard Chartered Bank kunye neprojekthi yabo ye-Global Seeing is Believing, i-CBM, i-UNOCHA (i-Ofisi yeZizwe eziManyeneyo yoLungelelaniso lweMicimbi yoLuntu), kunye ne-Right to Sight International (uNxibelelwano phakathi koMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi kunye ne-International Organization for the Ukuthintelwa kobumfama. UBushra ufumana inkuthazo kubantu asebenza nabo kwiindawo ezifana noMitchells Plain, Cape Flats nasePhilippi kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni eMzantsi Afrika.Kungoku nje ungumphathi wePhilippi Village ePhilippi , iziko elidala amathuba emisebenzi nokukhuthaza. amalungu oluntu lwendawo, ngelixa kwangaxeshanye ibe yindawo edlamkileyo nekhuselekileyo yengxoxo yoluntu kushishino, ubugcisa, inkcubeko kunye nenkqubo yemfundo.
I-Philippi Village luphuhliso oluhlanganisiweyo olusebenzisa izinto ezixubeneyo elilikhaya kuluntu olwahlukeneyo loosomashishini kunye nabanini bamashishini amancinci abaneevenkile zokuthengisa, iiofisi kunye nendawo yomsitho kunye nemidlalo, izibonelelo zemfundo nenkcubeko ePhilippi, eKapa, ​​eMzantsi Afrika .Ithathwa njengento ekhuthaza ushishino kuluntu lwasezilokishini ezikwindawo yaseKapa eCape Flats, eyona ngqwalasela iphambili yePhilippi Village kukubonelela ngeendawo zokusebenza zentsebenziswano kubanini bamashishini abancinci nabancinci, kunye nokudala amathuba engqesho kunye nokunyusa umgangatho woluntu lwasekuhlaleni, lo gama kwangaxeshanye indawo ephilayo nekhuselekileyo yothethathethwano noluntu. Ngesikhumbuzo sokuzalwa kwayo sokuqala, i-Hub yapapasha ukuba idale imisebenzi esisigxina engama-66, imisebenzi yethutyana engama-284 kwaye isingathe imisitho eli-15 kwiziko layo lenkomfa .
Ilali yasePhilippi yasekwa nguBushra Razack , usomashishini ophumelele ibhaso loluntu, iarhente yotshintsho, ingcali yobuntu kunye nophuhliso loluntu.Uzalelwe eKapa waya kumabanga aphakamileyo Ladysmith , KwaZulu-Natal , nalapho aphumelele ibanga leshumi ngo-2003. Wakhulela kwikhaya leenkedama kunye nabanye abantwana abangama-70 kwaye eneminyaka elishumi elinesibini wamela uMzantsi Afrika kwiNkongolo yoLutsha yeHlabathi yokuqala eyaziwa ngokuba yiMillennium Young People's Congress eHonolulu County, eHawaii. Ungumbhali kunye wencwadi ethi: "Rescue Mission", uvavanyo lolutsha kwiiNjongo zoPhuhliso lweMillennium ze-UN ezasungulwa kwiNgqungquthela yeHlabathi yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo eRhawutini, eMzantsi Afrika .
A virus is an organism that can infect a person, and can cause a person a Illness
I-Alaska Airlines Flight 261
IAlaska Airlines Flight 261 yayiyinqwelomoya yeAlaska Airlines yenqwelomoya yaseMcDonnell Douglas MD-83 eyantlitheka kuLwandlekazi lwePasifiki nge-31 kaJanuwari, 2000, malunga emantla eSiqithi sase-Anacapa, eCalifornia, emva kokulahlekelwa yintlekele yolawulo lwebala, kwafa bonke abantu abangama-88 ababekhwele apho: abaqhubi beenqwelo-moya ababini, amalungu amathathu ekhebhini, kunye nabakhweli abangama-83. Inqwelomoya yayiyinqwelomoya ecwangcisiweyo yamazwe ngamazwe esuka eLicenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport ePuerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico, ukuya eSeattle-Tacoma International Airport kufuphi Seattle, Washington, United States, kunye nokumisa okuphakathi kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya saseSan Francisco kufuphi neSan Francisco, California .
Uphando olulandelayo lweBhodi yoKhuseleko lwezoThutho lweSizwe (NTSB) lunqume ukuba ukugcinwa okunganeleyo kwakhokelela ekuguqweni okugqithisileyo kunye nokusilela ekugqibeleni kwenkqubo yokulawula indiza ebalulekileyo ngexesha lokuhamba. Unobangela onokwenzeka wachazwa "kukuphulukana nolawulo lokuma kwenqwelo-moya okubangelwa kukungaphumeleli kwinqwelo-moya ye- horizontal stabilizer trim system jackscrew assembly's trapezoidal nut threads . Ukusilela komsonto kubangelwe kukunxitywa okugqithisileyo okubangelwa kukungathobi ngokwaneleyo kwe -Alaska Airlines kwindibano yejackscrew. " Ngemizamo yabo yobugorha yokusindisa inqwelomoya, bobabini abaqhubi beenqwelomoya emva kokufa kwabo bawongwa ngeMbasa yeGolide yeAir Line Pilots.
Isitalato yindlela kawonke -wonke kwindawo eyakhiweyo . Ngumhlaba woluntu odibana nezakhiwo kwimeko yedolophu, apho abantu banokuhlanganisana ngokukhululekileyo, banxibelelane , kwaye bahambehamba. Isitalato sinokuba lula njengomgangatho wobumdaka, kodwa sihlala sigaywa ngomphezulu oqinileyo, owomeleleyo onje ngetela, ikhonkrithi, ilitye lesiseko okanye izitena . Izahlulo zisenokugudiswa nge -asphalt, zifakwe ngoololiwe, okanye zilungiswe ngenye indlela ukuze zivumelane nabahambi ngeenyawo .
Ekuqaleni, igama "lesitrato" lalithetha nje indlela egangathiweyo ( ). Igama elithi "isitalato" lisasetyenziswa ngamanye amaxesha ngokungekho sikweni njengesithethantonye "sendlela", umzekelo ngokunxulumene nesitalato samandulo saseWatling, kodwa abahlali besixeko kunye nabacwangcisi basezidolophini bazoba umahluko obalulekileyo wale mihla: owona msebenzi uphambili wendlela luthutho, ngelixa izitalato ziququzelela intsebenziswano yoluntu. Imizekelo yezitalato ibandakanya izitalato zabahamba ngeenyawo, iindledlana, kunye nezitalato ezisembindini wesixeko ezixinene kakhulu ukuba zingakwazi ukudlula izithuthi zendlela . Ngokuchaseneyo, oohola bendlela kunye neenqwelo-mafutha ziintlobo zeendlela, kodwa bambalwa abanokubhekisela kuzo njengezitrato. 
Amadoda angama-gay ngu IAbominio
Ubufanasini ngumtsalane wothando, umtsalane ngokwesondo, okanye ukuziphatha ngokwesondo phakathi kwamalungu esini esinye okanye isini . Njengokuziqhelanisa ngokwesondo, ubufanasini "yipateni ehlala ihleli yeemvakalelo, ezothando, kunye/okanye ezinomtsalane ngokwesondo" kubantu besini esifanayo. 
Kunye nobufanasini kunye nesini esahlukileyo, ubufanasini lolunye lwezintlu ezintathu eziphambili zokuziqhelanisa nesondo phakathi kwabantu abathandana besini esahlukileyo-okuqhubekayo . Iingcali zenzululwazi azikayazi eyona sizathu sokuziqhelanisa ngokwesondo, kodwa zithi kubangelwa kukudibana okuntsonkothileyo kofuzo, ihomoni, kunye neempembelelo zokusingqongileyo kwaye ungayijongi njengokhetho. 
ngelishwa, olu hlobo lokwabelana ngesondo sisono esinzulu kwaye umntu unethuba lokuya esihogweni
&lt;templatestyles src="Infobox/style.css" /&gt;
Apalit, ngokusemthethweni uMasipala wase Apalit, ngumasipala weklasi yoku-1 kwiphondo lasePampanga, kwiiPhilippines . Ngokobalo luka-2020, inabemi be-117,160 abantu. 
Le dolophu idume ngeApung Iru Fluvial Procession, edweliswe njengenye yezona zinto zibalulekileyo ezisekwe emanzini enkcubeko yelifa lemveli kwiiPhilippines. Umnyhadala uba rhoqo nge-28-30 kaJuni.
I-Ajvatovica sesona siganeko sikhulu samaSilamsi semveli, inkolo kunye nenkcubeko eYurophu. Ibekwe kufutshane nePrusac, Bosnia kunye ne Herzegovina. Yathiywa ngegama lika -Ajvaz-dedo ( "uTatomkhulu u-Ajvaz" ), umSilamsi ozinikeleyo osebenza ekukhanyiseleni uluntu kwaye afezekise inkqubela kulo mmandla.
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseAlghero-Fertilia
Alghero - Riviera del Corallo Airport sisikhululo seenqwelomoya samazwe ngamazwe simi kwi kumntla-ntshona wesixeko saseAlghero, kumantla eSardinia, eItali. Ikwabizwa ngokuba yi -Alghero-Fertilia Airport, ebizwa ngokuba yilali ekufutshane yaseFertilia okanye kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya iAlghero . Sesinye sezikhululo zeenqwelomoya ezintathu eziphambili ezisebenzela iSardinia, ezinye ziyi -Olbia emantla-mpuma, kwaye kufutshane neCagliari emazantsi. Isikhululo seenqwelomoya siqhutywa yiSO.GE.A.AL ( "Societa di Gestione Aeroporto di Alghero" ).
Ukuhlukunyezwa kwesiyobisi
Ukusetyenziswa kakubi kweziyobisi, okwakwaziwa ngokuba gwenxa kweziyobisi, kukusetyenziswa kwechiza ngokwemilinganiselo okanye ngeendlela eziyingozi emntwini okanye kwabanye. Luhlobo oluthile lokuphazamiseka kweziyobisi . Iinkcazo ezahlukeneyo zokusetyenziswa gwenxa kweziyobisi zisetyenziswa kwiimeko zempilo yoluntu, ezonyango, kunye nobulungisa bolwaphulo-mthetho. Kwezinye iimeko, ukuziphatha kolwaphulo-mthetho okanye okuchasene noluntu kwenzeka xa umntu ephantsi kweempembelelo zeziyobisi, kwaye utshintsho lwexesha elide kumntu ngamnye lunokwenzeka. Ukongeza kukwenzakala okunokwenzeka emzimbeni, ekuhlaleni, nasengqondweni, ukusetyenziswa kwamanye amachiza kunokukhokelela kwizohlwayo zolwaphulo-mthetho, nangona ezi zinokwahluka kakhulu ngokuxhomekeke kulawulo lwasekuhlaleni. name="Mosby"&gt;.
Iziyobisi ezihlala zinxulunyaniswa neli gama ziquka: utywala, i-amphetamines, i-barbiturates, i-benzodiazepines, i- cannabis, i- cocaine, i-hallucinogens (nangona ingekho i- "psychedelic" eyaziwayo, enye yeendidi ezintathu ze- hallucinogens, efunyenwe ukuba nayo nayiphi na into enokubakho), i-methaqualone ., kunye neeopioids . Oyena nobangela wokusetyenziswa gwenxa kweziyobisi awukacaci, kodwa zimbini iithiyori ezibalaseleyo: nokuba sisimo semfuza okanye umkhwa ofundwe kwabanye, othi, ukuba likhoboka leziyobisi, ubonakale njengesifo esingapheliyo esibangela ukuba buthathaka . 
Ngo-2010, malunga ne-5% yabantu (izigidi ezingama-230) basebenzise into engekho mthethweni. Kwaba, abazizigidi ezingama-27 basengozini enkulu yokusebenzisa iziyobisi—eyaziwa ngokuba kukusetyenziswa rhoqo kweziyobisi—ebangela ingozi kwimpilo yabo, ebangela iingxaki ezingokwengqondo, okanye ebangela iingxaki zasekuhlaleni ezibabeka esichengeni sezo ngozi. 
yialloy yeferrous ikakhulu yenziwe nge iron kunye ne carbon, le yokugqibela ikwipesenti engadlulanga kwi 2.06 % ; ngaphaya kwalo mda, iipropati zenguqu yezinto eziphathekayo kunye ne-alloy ithatha igama lentsimbi.
Iiholide kumthetho wezabasebenzi ziintsuku zokungabikho emsebenzini kwaye zibonwa njengelungelo kumqeshwa.
Imimiselo elawulayo kulo mba ebonelelwe yimimiselo emininzi ngokubanzi ibhekisela kuphela kudidi lwabasebenzi, kungekhona kubasebenzi abazisebenzelayo, abazimeleyo okanye abaqeqeshwayo.
Isikhululo sikaloliwe saseValenzano
IValenzano sisikhululo sikaloliwe eValenzano, eItali. Isikhululo sibekwe kuloliwe waseBari-Casamassima-Putignano . Iinkonzo zikaloliwe kunye neziseko zoncedo zikaloliwe ziqhutywa yiFerrovie del Sud Est.
Kwixesha elidlulileyo uNjingalwazi uPalmieri wayefune ukuwonga abantu abaziphethe kakuhle kwaye wathoba amanqaku kubantu abaziphata kakubi.
Uxele IBanda della Cingomma ukuba uyakufumana ivoto ezintandathu
kwaye ke kukho IBanda i-Ammognich, eyenza ngokuchaseneyo, oko kukuthi, iyatshabalalisa amathandathu kunye nobubi.
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya Ukumisa isikhululo sikaloliwe
Isikhululo sikaloliwe sokumisa isikhululo sikaloliwe, esaziwa ngokuba yiJinnah Airport sifumaneka eKarachi,eSindh, ePakistan.
Moekeshiwan, okwakwaziwa njenge Lvinaya Past, ngokoqobo " "Lion's Maw" ", emva kwelitye eliphuma elwandle kwaye lifana nengonyama eleleyo), yintaba-mlilo kwindawo esemazantsi e- Iturup kwiiKuril Islands, ibango yiJapan kwaye ilawulwa yiRashiya. Intaba-mlilo iphawulwa ngokuba ngumgodi omkhulu okhukuliswe luLwandle lwaseOkhotsk . Ugqabhuko-dubulo olukhulu lwenzeka kwangoko ngexesha leHolocene eyafikelela kwisalathiso sokudubula kwentaba-mlilo sesi-7.
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseJaisalmer
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseJaisalmer sisikhululo seenqwelomoya sasekhaya esisebenzela eJaisalmer, eRajasthan, eIndiya . Ifumaneka kumgama ukusuka kumbindi wesixeko. Isikhululo seenqwelomoya sisebenza njengendawo yokuhlala kwisiseko soMkhosi woMoya waseIndiya .
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya sinomgaqo weenqwelo-moya omnye ubude neemitha ezingama- ububanzi. Abathwali abebekhe babhabha besiya/besuka kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya baquka iVayudoot kunye neKingfisher Airlines . Ngo-2015, ayizange isetyenziselwe iinqwelomoya, kwaye yavalwa de iinkonzo zaqala phantsi kweskimu se -UDAN kwi-2017.
UThomas Alva Edison, owazalwa ngoFebruwari 11, 1847 eMilan, eOhio waza wafa ngo-Oktobha 18, 1931 eWest Orange, eNew Jersey, wayengumqambi waseMelika, usosayensi kunye nosomashishini.
Umseki woMbane kaWonke-wonke, elinye lamagunya aphambili kwezoshishino, wayengumyili ochumileyo (ngaphezu kwe-1,000 patent3). Uvulindlela wombane, umsasazi, umsasazi, wayengomnye wabavelisi abaphambili be-cinema (ekunye, phakathi kwabanye, uWilliam Kennedy Laurie Dickson, u-Émile Reynaud, uAuguste noLouis Lumière, uJules Carpentier)4,5,6 kunye nokurekhoda kwesandi (kunye Charles Cross). Ngamanye amaxesha ubizwa ngokuba "yi-wizard yaseMenlo Park", idolophu yaseNew Jersey ebizwa ngokuba yi "Edison" ngembeko yakhe ngo-1954.
UThomas Alva7 Edison ngumntwana wesixhenxe kunye nowokugqibela8 kaSamuel Edison (1804-1896), waseKhanada wemvelaphi yaseDatshi, owabaleka eCanada ngenxa yokuba wathatha inxaxheba kwimvukelo ye-1837-18389 kwaye ngubani owaba ngumthengisi wesibini. , igrocer, umthengisi wezindlu, uMchweli. Umama wakhe, uNancy Elliot (1810-1871), owayesakuba ngumfundisi-ntsapho, naye wayengowaseKhanada kodwa enemvelaphi yaseScotland. Utata kaNancy wayeligorha leMfazwe yoTshintsho lwaseMelika. UThomas Alva Edison ungoyena mncinci kusapho oluthobekileyo olumkhuthaza ngokwengqondo nakwezopolitiko.
Ngomnyaka we-1854, xa wayeneminyaka eyi-7 ubudala, intsapho yakhe yafudukela ePort Huron, eMichigan apho uyise wafumana umsebenzi wokuba ngumchweli. Umfundisi-ntsapho wakhe, uMfundisi uEngle, umgqala njengesidenge ngenxa yokuba unomdla kakhulu, ubuza imibuzo emininzi kwaye akafundi ngokukhawuleza ngokwaneleyo. Emva kweenyanga ezintathu zezifundo, wagxothwa esikolweni sakhe. Encediswa ngumama wakhe owamnika izifundo ekhaya, emva koko wagqiba uqeqesho lwakhe olusisiseko njenge-autodidact egqibeleleyo, efunda ababhali ababalaseleyo abanjengoCharles Dickens okanye uShakespeare, kwaye watya zonke iincwadi zesayensi awayeziswe ngumama wakhe, ngakumbi umsebenzi wokulinga. Isikolo sefiziksi yeFilosofi yeNdalo nguRichard Green Parker11. Ngenzondelelo uquqa kwithala leencwadi laseDetroit: “Ukuba ndikhumbula kakuhle, ndandiqala ngencwadi yokuqala kwishelufu esezantsi ndaza ndaqwenga zonke ezinye, enye emva kwenye. Andizange ndifunde iincwadi ezimbalwa; Ndalifunda lonke ithala leencwadi. »

IMuriaé i-a umasipala emzantsi mpuma weMinas Gerais isimo, Ebrazil. Okuqondene nabo bonke abenza umsebenzi wabo Zona da Mata ingingqi kunye nabemi bayo kwi-2020 (IBGE) babemalunga ne-109,392 yabemi.

UNIPAC UMongameli weYunivesithi u-Antonio Carlos 
IBhutan &lt;/img&gt; ; ), ngokusemthethweni uBukumkani baseBhutan, lilizwe elivaliweyo ekuMazantsi eAsia, elikwiMpuma yeHimalayas, phakathi kweTshayina emantla neIndiya emazantsi. Ilizwe elineentaba, iBhutan yaziwa ekuhlaleni njenge "Druk Yul" okanye "Umhlaba weNdudumo yeNdudumo", igama elibonisa inkcubeko yelifa lelizwe . Igama elithi Bhutan kusenokwenzeka ukuba lisuka kwigama elingumxube wePrakrit elithi Bhŏṭṭaṃta, igama elibhekisa kwindawo ekufutshane neTibet. INepal neBangladesh zikufuphi neBhutan kodwa azabelani ngomda nayo. Eli lizwe linabemi abangaphezu kwama-727,145 kunye nommandla kwaye ibeka indawo ye-133 ngokomhlaba kunye ne-160 kubemi. I-Bhutan yinkosi yomgaqo-siseko kunye nokumkani ( Druk Gyalpo ) njengentloko yelizwe kunye nenkulumbuso njengentloko karhulumente. I-Vajrayana Buddhism yinkolo yaseburhulumenteni kwaye uJe Khenpo yintloko yenkolo yelizwe.
Iintaba zeHimalayan ezikumantla ziphuma kumathafa ashinyeneyo elizwe asemazantsi. Kwiintaba ze-Himalaya zaseBhutan, kukho iincopho ezingaphezulu kwe ngaphezu komphakamo wolwandle . IGangkhar Puensum yeyona ntaba iphakamileyo yaseBhutan kwaye yeyona ntaba iphakamileyo emhlabeni. Izilwanyana zasendle zaseBhutan ziphawuleka ngokwahlukana kwazo, kuquka i- Himalayan takin kunye ne- golden langur . Ikomkhulu kunye nesixeko esikhulu kunazo zonke Thimphu, ebambe kufutshane ne-1/7th yabemi.
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseSão Paulo-Congonhas
São Paulo/Congonhas–Deputado Freitas Nobre Airport sesinye sezikhululo zeenqwelomoya ezine ezisebenza eSão Paulo, eBrazil . Isikhululo seenqwelomoya sathiywa ngegama lendawo esikuyo, ebizwa ngokuba yiVila Congonhas, ipropathi yenzala kaLucas (1767-1851), iViscount yaseCongonhas do Campo, umongameli wokuqala wePhondo laseSão Paulo emva kwenkululeko. EBrazil ngowe-1822, ngexesha loBukhosi . Ngokulandelayo, indawo ye-Viscount yathiywa ngegama lesininzi sesihlahla esibizwa ngokuba yi "-congonha-do-campo" e-Brazil ( "Luxemburgia polyandra", yosapho lwe- Ochnaceae ). Ukusukela nge-19 kaJuni ngo-2017, ithiywe ngokusemthethweni ngeSekela likaFreitas Nobre. Igama elithi Congonhas, nangona kunjalo, lisasetyenziswa kakhulu. Iphethwe sisiXeko saseSão Paulo.
Ngethuba lexesha lenguqu, isikhumulo sezindiza sisebenza ngokudibeneyo yi -Infraero kunye ne-AENA .
Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseRio de Janeiro/Galeão International
I-Rio de Janeiro/Galeão – Antonio Carlos Jobim International Airport eyaziwa kakhulu ngegama layo lokuqala elithi Galeão International Airport, sesona sikhululo seenqwelomoya sisebenza eRio de Janeiro, eBrazil. Ngo-2019, yayiyeyesine isikhululo seenqwelomoya esixakeke kakhulu ngokugcwala kwabantu. Ithiywe ngegama lengingqi yaseGaleão . "I-Praia do Galeão" (i-Galleon Beach) iphambi kwetheminali yabahambi yoqobo (itheminali yangoku yabakhweli yoMkhosi woMoya waseBrazil ) nalapho igaleyini "iPadre Eterno" yakhiwa ngo-1663. Ukususela kwi-5 kaJanuwari 1999, ikwabizwa ngokuba ngumculi waseBrazil uAntonio Carlos Jobim . Isikhululo seenqwelomoya saseGaleão sichazwe ngokucacileyo ekuqulunqweni kwakhe "iSamba do Avião ." Yeyona ndawo inkulu yesikhululo seenqwelomoya ngokwendawo yaseBrazil.
Ukususela ngo-12 Agasti 2014 iqhutywe yi- Concessionary Rio Galeão, i-consortium eyenziwe ngumtyali-mali waseBrazil u-Odebrecht kunye ne-Changi Airport Group, kunye nenxaxheba encinci yenkampani ephantsi kukarhulumente Infraero, umqhubi wangaphambili. I-concessionary entsha isebenzise igama elithi brand RIOgaleão - Aeroporto Internacional Tom Jobim . 
Ezinye zezibonelelo zayo kwabelwana ngazo kunye neGaleão Air Force Base yeBrazilian Air Force.
Michael Schumacher (January 3, 1969) nguqondisindiswe ngokuba yintomtom yezikhothane ezintsha eGermany. Ezenziwe kwiphondo leFormula 1 kwisi-1991 kuze kube ngowama-2006 kwaye kwisi-2010 kuze kube ngowama-2012. Kwelinye igalelo lwakhe, wabizwa ngokubiza 91 Grand Prix kwaye wafikelela amaqela amahlanu ayibhalwe (1994, 1995, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, kwaye 2004).
INepal ngokusemthethweni iFederal Democratic Republic of Nepal, lilizwe elivaliweyo kuMzantsi Asia . Ifumaneka ikakhulu kwii -Himalayas, kodwa ikwabandakanya iindawo ze -Indo-Gangetic Plain . Umda weTibet Autonomous Region yaseChina ukuya emantla, kunye neIndiya emazantsi, empuma, nasentshona, ngelixa yahlulwe kancinane eBangladesh yiSiliguri Corridor, kwaye isuka eBhutan yilizwe laseIndiya iSikkim . INepal inejografi eyahlukeneyo, kubandakanya amathafa achumileyo, iinduli ezinamahlathi akwi-subalpine, kunye neentaba ezisibhozo kwezona zide zehlabathi, kubandakanya iMount Everest, eyona ndawo iphakamileyo emhlabeni. IKathmandu likomkhulu lesizwe kunye nesona sixeko sikhulu . INepal lilizwe lezizwe ngezizwe, iilwimi ezininzi, iinkonzo ezininzi kunye neenkcubeko ezininzi, kunye nesiNepali njengolwimi olusemthethweni.
Igama elithi "Nepal" libhalwe okokuqala kwimibhalo ukusuka kwixesha leVedic ye- Indian subcontinent, ixesha laseNepal yamandulo xa kwasekwa ubuHindu, inkolo ephambili yelizwe. Embindini wenkulungwane yokuqala ye-BC, uGautama Buddha, umsunguli weBuddhism, wazalelwa eLumbini kumazantsi eNepal. Imimandla ekumantla eNepal yayixubene nenkcubeko yaseTibet . Intlambo yaseKathmandu esembindini idibene nenkcubeko yama-Indo-Aryans, kwaye yayisisihlalo somanyano lwaseNewar olwaziwa ngokuba yiNepal Mandala . Isebe laseHimalaya leNdlela yeSilika yamandulo yayilawulwa ngabarhwebi bale ntlambo. Ummandla wecosmopolitan uphuhlise ubugcisa bemveli obahlukileyo kunye noyilo lwezakhiwo . Ngenkulungwane ye-18, uBukumkani baseGorkha bafikelela ekumanyeni iNepal . Ubukhosi bukaShah baseka uBukumkani baseNepal kwaye kamva benza umanyano kunye noBukhosi baseBritane, phantsi komnombo wabo weenkulumbuso zikaRana . Ilizwe alizange libe lithanga kodwa lasebenza njengelizwe elikhuselekileyo phakathi kwe -Imperial China kunye neBritish India . Idemokhrasi yasePalamente yaziswa ngo-1951 kodwa yanqunyanyiswa kabini ngookumkani baseNepal, ngo-1960 kunye no-2005. Imfazwe yamakhaya yaseNepal ngeminyaka yoo-1990s nasekuqaleni kweminyaka yoo-2000 yakhokelela ekusekweni kweriphabliki yehlabathi ngo-2008, yaphelisa ubukhosi bokugqibela bamaHindu ehlabathini.
Iziqithi zaseTurks kunye neCaicos
Iziqithi zaseTurks kunye neCaicos (efinyeziweyo iTCI ; kunye ) yiBritish Overseas Territory equka iZiqithi zeCaicos ezinkulu kunye neZiqithi zeTurks ezincinci, amaqela amabini eziqithi ezishushu kwiLucayan Archipelago yoLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki nakumantla eWest Indies . Baziwa ikakhulu ngokhenketho nanjengeziko lezemali elingaphesheya kolwandle . Inani labemi ngoJulayi ka-2021 libekwe kuma-57,196, liyenza indawo yesithathu ngobukhulu kwimimandla yaseBritane phesheya kolwandle ngabantu. 
Iziqithi zisemzantsi-mpuma weMayaguana kwikhonkco lesiqithi saseBahamas nakumantla esiqithi saseHispaniola ( iHaiti kunye neDominican Republic ). IGrand Turk (idolophu yaseCockburn), ikomkhulu ukususela ngo-1766, imi kwiSiqithi saseGrand Turk malunga empuma-mpuma yeMiami . Banomhlaba opheleleyo . 
Kwezi ziqithi bekumiwe kangangeenkulungwane ngabemi bomthonyama . Eyokuqala erekhodiweyo yaseYurophu ukubona kubo kwaba ngo 1512. Kwiinkulungwane ezalandelayo, babangwa ngamagunya aliqela aseYurophu, yaye ekugqibeleni uBukhosi baseBritani baba nolawulo. Kangangeminyaka emininzi ayelawulwa ngokungangqalanga eBermuda, eBahamas naseJamaica . Xa iBahamas yafumana inkululeko ngo-1973, iziqithi zafumana irhuluneli yazo, kwaye ziye zahlala zingummandla ozimeleyo ukususela ngoko.
ISan Marino ( &lt;/img&gt; , ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseSan Marino ( ; ), ekwabizwa ngokuba yeyona Republic iSerene yaseSan Marino ( ), yindawo encinci yaseYurophu kunye nelizwe elivalelwe yi -Itali . Ibekwe kwicala elikumntla-mpuma weeNtaba ze-Apennine, iSan Marino lilizwe lesihlanu-elincinci emhlabeni kwaye igubungela umhlaba ongaphezulu nje , enabemi abangama-33,562. 
ISan Marino lilizwe elivaliweyo ; kunjalo, isiphelo sawo kumntla-mpuma ungaphakathi yesixeko Italian of Rimini kunxweme Adriatic . Isikhululo seenqwelomoya esikufutshane sikwaseItali. Ikomkhulu lelizwe, isiXeko saseSan Marino, simi phezu kweMonte Titano, ngelixa indawo enkulu yokuhlala iyiDogana ngaphakathi komasipala omkhulu waseSerravalle . Ulwimi olusemthethweni lwaseSan Marino sisiTaliyane .
Ilizwe lifumana igama lalo kwiSaint Marinus, umqibi wamatye osuka kwisiqithi saseRoma iRab kwiCroatia yanamhlanje. Wazalwa ngo-AD 275, uMarinus wathatha inxaxheba ekwakhiweni ngokutsha kweendonga zesixeko saseRimini emva kokutshatyalaliswa kwazo ngabaphangi baseLiburnian . UMarinus emva koko uye wafumana indawo yokuhlala yeemonki ezimeleyo eMonte Titano ngo AD 301; ngoko ke, iSan Marino yenza ibango lelona lizwe lidala elikhoyo elizimeleyo, kunye nelona lizwe lidala lomgaqo-siseko . 
Ngokukodwa, umgaqo-siseko waseSan Marino uyalela ukuba indlu yowiso-mthetho eyonyulwe ngokwentando yesininzi, iBhunga eliKhulu kunye neGenerali, kufuneka linyule iintloko zamazwe amabini rhoqo kwiinyanga ezintandathu. Eyaziwa ngokuba ngabaphathi be-regent, iintloko zombuso ezimbini zisebenza ngaxeshanye kwaye zinamandla alinganayo de ixesha labo liphele emva kweenyanga ezintandathu.
Uqoqosho lweli lizwe ikakhulu lusekelwe kwezemali, kushishino, iinkonzo, ukuthengisa kunye nokhenketho . Lelinye lawona mazwe atyebileyo kwihlabathi kwi -GDP ngomntu ngamnye, enenani elinokuthelekiswa neyona mimandla iphuhlileyo yaseYurophu. Inkqubo yayo yokhathalelo lwempilo ibekwe kwindawo yesi-3 kuhlahlelo lokuqala lweWorld Health Organisation lweenkqubo zempilo zehlabathi.
IDenmark lilizwe eliyinxalenye yeNordic kuMntla Yurophu . Yidolophu enkulu kunye neyona ndawo inabantu abaninzi kuBukumkani baseDenmark, ilizwe elimanyeneyo ngokomgaqo-siseko elibandakanya imimandla ezimeleyo yeZiqithi zeFaroe kunye neGreenland kuLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki eseMantla . I-Metropolitan Denmark yeyona ndawo isemazantsi amazwe aseScandinavia, ilele kumazantsi-ntshona nasezantsi ( Bornholm kunye ne- Ertholmene ) yaseSweden, emazantsi eNorway, nakumantla eJamani, apho yabelana nomhlaba omfutshane kunye nokuphela kwawo. umda.
Ukusukela ngo-2013, uBukumkani baseDenmark, kubandakanywa neZiqithi zaseFaroe kunye neGreenland, ineziqithi ezili-1,419 ezingaphezulu kwe ; Ama-443 kuwo abiziweyo kwaye angama-78 kuwo ahlala. Ithatha indawo yonke engama- . _ _ _ Kwezi, esona siqithi sinabantu abaninzi yiZealand, apho ikomkhulu iCopenhagen ikhona, ilandelwa nguFunen, iSiqithi saseJutlandic esiMantla, kunye neAmager . Ijografi yaseDenmark ibonakaliswa ngumhlaba othe tyaba, olimekayo, unxweme olunesanti, ukuphakama okuphantsi, kunye nemozulu epholileyo . Yayinabemi be-5.935 yezigidi (1 February 2023), apho i-800,000 (i-2 yezigidi kwindawo ebanzi) ihlala kwikomkhulu kunye neyona dolophu inkulu, iCopenhagen . IDenmark isebenzisa impembelelo ye-hegemonic kwi- Realm yaseDenmark, inikezela amandla okuphatha imicimbi yangaphakathi. Ulawulo lwasekhaya lwasekwa kwii-Faroe Islands kwi-1948 naseGreenland ngo-1979; lo mva wafumana ukuzimela ngakumbi ngo-2009.
UBukumkani obumanyeneyo baseDenmark bavela ngenkulungwane yesibhozo njengamandla olwandle anobuchule phakathi komzabalazo wolawulo loLwandle lweBaltic. K
Kwi-1397, yajoyina iNorway kunye neSweden ukwenza i- Kalmar Union, eyaqhubeka de yaphela i-secession ngo-1523. UBukumkani obuseleyo baseDenmark-Norway banyamezele uthotho lweemfazwe ngenkulungwane ye-17 ezakhokelela ekuyekisweni kommandla woBukhosi baseSweden . Emva kweeMfazwe zeNapoleonic, iNorway yafakwa eSweden, ishiya iDenmark kunye neZiqithi zaseFaroe, iGreenland, neIceland . Ukwanda kweentshukumo zobuzwe kwinkulungwane ye-19 yoyiswa kwiMfazwe yokuQala yeSchleswig ye-1848, nangona iMfazwe yesiBini yeSchleswig yowe-1864 yakhokelela kwilahleko eyongezelelekileyo yomhlaba kwiPrusia . Ixesha labona ukwamkelwa koMgaqo -siseko waseDenmark nge-5 kaJuni 1849, ephelisa ubukhosi obupheleleyo obasekwa ngo-1660 kunye nokwazisa inkqubo yepalamente yangoku.
Umrhwebi othengisa ngaphandle kwemveliso yezolimo kwisiqingatha sesibini senkulungwane ye-19, iDenmark yazisa uhlaziyo lwentlalo kunye nentengiso yabasebenzi ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20, eyathi yaseka imodeli yangoku yentlalontle kunye noqoqosho oluxubeneyo oluphambili . IDenmark ayizange ithabathe cala ebudeni beMfazwe Yehlabathi I kodwa yaphinda yafumana isiqingatha esisemantla seSchleswig ngowe-1920. Ubundilele baseDenmark kwaphulwa kwiMfazwe Yehlabathi II emva kohlaselo olukhawulezileyo lwamaJamani ngoAprili 1940. Ngethuba lokuhlala, umbutho wokuchasa wavela kwi-1943 ngelixa i-Iceland yazisa ukuzimela ngo-1944; IDenmark yakhululwa ngoMeyi 1945. Imikhosi yaseSoviet yaphuma eBornholm nge-5 ka-Aprili 1946. Ngo-1973, iDenmark, kunye neGreenland kodwa ingeyiyo iFaroes, yaba lilungu lento ngoku eyi- European Union, kodwa yathethathethana ngeendlela ezithile zokuphuma, ezifana nokugcina imali yayo, ikrone .
Burundi , ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseBurundi ( ; IsiSwahili : "IJamuhuri yaseBurundi" ; IsiFrentshi : "République du Burundi" ), lilizwe elivaliweyo kwiNtlambo enguMwonyo eNkulu ekudibaneni kommandla wamaChibi Amakhulu aseAfrika kunye neMpuma Afrika . Umda weRwanda ngasemantla, iTanzania ngasempuma nasemzantsi-mpuma, kunye neDemocratic Republic of the Congo ngasentshona; ILake Tanganyika ilele kumda wayo osemazantsi-ntshona. Izixeko ezingamakomkhulu yiGitega kunye neBujumbura, esona sixeko sikhulu selizwe. 
AmaTwa, amaHutu namaTutsi aye ahlala eBurundi ubuncinane iminyaka engama-500. Ngaphezu kwama-200 aloo minyaka, iBurundi yayibubukumkani obuzimeleyo, de kwasekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20, xa yaba lithanga laseJamani. Emva kweMfazwe Yehlabathi yokuqala kunye nokutshatyalaliswa kweJamani, i- League of Nations "yayalela" indawo eBelgium. Emva kweMfazwe yesiBini yeHlabathi, oku kwaguquka kwaba yiNgxowa-mali yeZizwe eziManyeneyo . Omabini amaJamani namaBelgian alawula iBurundi neRwanda njengethanga laseYurophu elaziwa ngokuba yiRuanda-Urundi . IBurundi neRwanda azizange zibe phantsi kolawulo olufanayo de kwalixesha lobuthanga baseYurophu eAfrika. 
IBurundi yafumana inkululeko ngo-1962 kwaye ekuqaleni yayinobukhosi, kodwa uthotho lokubulala, ukubhukuqa kunye nemozulu jikelele yokungazinzi kwengingqi yafikelela incopho ekusekweni kweriphabliki kunye nelizwe elinye ngo-1966. Iziganeko zokuhlanjululwa kobuhlanga ekugqibeleni kwaneemfazwe ezimbini zamakhaya nokubulawa kwabantu abaninzi ngeminyaka yee -1970 nangeminyaka yee -1990 kwakhokelela ekufeni kwabantu abangamakhulu amawaka, nto leyo eyabangela ukuba uqoqosho lungabi nankqubela yaye abemi bangabona bangamahlwempu ehlabathini . Kunyaka ka-2015 kukho ukruthakruthwano olukhulu lwezopolitiko njengoko umongameli uPierre Nkurunziza wakhetha ukungenela isihlandlo sesithathu, iinzame zokubhukuqa aziphumelelanga kwaye unyulo lwepalamente nomongameli welizwe lwagxekwa ngokubanzi ngamalungu oluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe.
Ilizwe elizimeleyo lenkqubo yezopolitiko yaseBurundi lelo lommeli womongameli weriphabliki yedemokhrasi esekwe phezu kwelizwe elinamaqela ngamaqela. Umongameli waseBurundi yintloko yelizwe kunye nentloko karhulumente . Ngoku kukho amaqela angama-21 abhalisiweyo eBurundi . Ngomhla we-13 kweyoKwindla ka-1992, inkokeli yobhukuqo-mbuso yamaTutsi uPierre Buyoya waseka umgaqo-siseko, owawubonelela ngenkqubo yamaqela amaninzi ezopolitiko kwaye ubonakalisa ukhuphiswano lwamaqela amaninzi. Kwiminyaka emithandathu emva koko, ngomhla wesi-6 kuJuni ka-1998, umgaqo-siseko watshintshwa, wandiswa izihlalo zeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho kwaye wenza amalungiselelo oosekela-mongameli ababini. Ngenxa yeSivumelwano sase-Arusha, iBurundi yamisela urhulumente wethutyana ngowama-2000 Ngo-Oktobha 2016, iBurundi yazisa i-UN ngenjongo yayo yokuhoxisa kwiNkundla yoLwaphulo-mthetho lwamazwe ngamazwe . 
I-Burundi ihleli ikakhulu iluluntu lwasemaphandleni, kunye ne-13.4% kuphela yabemi abahlala ezidolophini ngo-2019 Ukuxinana kwabantu malunga nama-315 abantu ngekhilomitha nganye yesikwere (753 nge sq mi) lelesibini ngobukhulu kwi -Afrika ekwi-Sub-Saharan . Malunga nama-85% abemi bangamaHutu, i-15% ngamaTutsi, yaye ngaphantsi kwe-1% ngabemi bomthonyama bamaTwa . Iilwimi ezisemthethweni zaseBurundi sisiKirundi, isiFrentshi, kunye nesiNgesi, isiKirundi samkelwa ngokusemthethweni njengolwimi olulodwa lwesizwe. 
Malta , , ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseMalta ( ), lilizwe lesiqithi kuMazantsi Yurophu, ekuLwandle lweMeditera . Iqulathe ichwebakazi, phakathi kweItali neLibya . Ihlala kuma emazantsi eSicily ( eItali ), kwimpuma yeTunisia, kunye ne emantla eLibya . 
Iilwimi ezisemthethweni ziziMalta kunye nesiNgesi, kwaye i-66% yabemi baseMalta yangoku banolwazi ubuncinane ngolwimi lwesiTaliyane .
IMalta ibimiwe ukusukela malunga ne5900 BC. Indawo yayo embindini weMeditera ngokwembali iyinike ukubaluleka kobuchule njengesiseko somkhosi waselwandle, ngokulandelelana kwamagunya akhuphisanayo kwaye alawula iziqithi, kubandakanya amaFenike kunye namaCarthaginians, amaRoma, amaGrike, ama-Arabhu, amaNorman, amaAragonese., Knights of St. John, French, and British, phakathi kwabanye. 
Ngabantu abamalunga nama-516,000 kummandla wama- , iMalta lilizwe leshumi-elincinci kwihlabathi ngokwengingqi kunye nesine ilizwe elinabantu abaninzi elizimeleyo . Ikomkhulu layo yiValletta, eyona mali incinci yelizwe kwi- European Union ngokwengingqi nabemi. Ngokutsho kwedatha evela kwi-2020 yi -Eurostat, i-Functional Urban Area kunye nommandla we-metropolitan wagubungela sonke isiqithi kwaye unabemi be-480,134, kwaye ngokutsho kweZizwe eziManyeneyo, i- ESPON kunye ne-EU Commission, "indawo yonke IMalta yenza idolophu enye". I-Malta ngokunyukayo ibizwa ngokuba yi- city-state, kwaye ikwadweliswe kuluhlu olubhekiselele kwizixeko okanye imimandla yemetropolitan. 
IMalta yaba yikoloni yaseBritane ngo-1813, isebenza njengesikhululo sendlela yeenqanawa kunye nekomkhulu leBritish Mediterranean Fleet . Yayirhangqwe ngamagunya e-Axis ngexesha leMfazwe yesibini yeHlabathi kwaye yayisisiseko esibalulekileyo se-Allied ekusebenzeni eMntla Afrika nakwiMeditera. Ipalamente yaseBritane yapasisa uMthetho wokuzimela kweMalta ngo-1964, inika iMalta inkululeko kwi-United Kingdom njengeLizwe laseMalta, kunye no -Elizabeth II njengokumkanikazi wayo. Eli lizwe laba yiriphabliki ngowe-1974. Ibe lilungu leManyano yeZizwe eziManyeneyo kunye neZizwe eziManyeneyo ukusukela ekufumaneni inkululeko, yaza yajoyina i -European Union ngo-2004; yaba yinxalenye yomanyano lwemali lwe-eurozone ngo-2008.
IMalta inamaKristu ukusukela ngexesha lobuKristu bokuqala, nangona ubukhulu becala yayingamaSilamsi ngelixa yayiphantsi kolawulo lwama-Arabhu, ngelo xesha amaKristu ayenyanyezelwa. Ulawulo lwamaSilamsi lwaphela ngokuhlasela kukaNorman eMalta nguRoger I ngo-1091. Namhlanje, ubuKatolika yinkolo yaseburhulumenteni, kodwa uMgaqo-siseko waseMalta uqinisekisa inkululeko yesazela neyonqulo. Uqoqosho lwaseMalta luxhomekeke kakhulu kukhenketho, kwaye ilizwe lizikhuthaza njengendawo yokuya eMeditera kunye nemozulu efudumeleyo xa kuthelekiswa neYurophu iphela, iindawo ezininzi zokuzonwabisa, kunye nezikhumbuzo zezakhiwo kunye nembali, kubandakanywa iindawo ezintathu zeLifa leMveli le-UNESCO : Ħal Saflieni . IHypogeum, iValletta, kunye neetempile ezisixhenxe ze-megalithic ezizezinye zezakhiwo ezindala ezikhululekileyo kwihlabathi. 
Montenegro &lt;/img&gt; ; , Црна Гора, ' Intaba Emnyama ' ) lilizwe elikuMzantsi -mpuma weYurophu . Iyinxalenye yeeBalkans kwaye ijikelezwe yiBosnia kunye neHerzegovina ukuya emantla-ntshona, iSerbia ukuya emantla-mpuma, iKosovo ngasempuma, iAlbania emazantsi-mpuma, iCroatia ukuya emazantsi-ntshona, kunye noLwandle lweAdriatic emazantsi kunye nonxweme oluyi-293.5 km. I-Podgorica, idolophu enkulu kunye neyona dolophu inkulu, igubungela i-10.4% yommandla waseMontenegro we- , kwaye ilikhaya malunga ne-31% yabemi bayo bebonke abangama-621,000. I-Cetinje yayilikomkhulu langaphambili lasebukhosini ( ) yaseMontenegro kwaye yindawo yamaziko aliqela kazwelonke, kubandakanywa nendawo yokuhlala esemthethweni kamongameli waseMontenegro . 
Ngexesha le- Early Medieval, iinqununu ezintathu zazibekwe kwintsimi yeMontenegro yanamhlanje: iDuklja, ngokumalunga nesiqingatha esisezantsi; Travunia, ngasentshona; kunye neRascia efanelekileyo, emantla. Inqununu yeZeta yavela kwi-14th kunye ne-15th inkulungwane. Ukususela ekupheleni kwenkulungwane ye-14 ukuya ekupheleni kwenkulungwane ye-18, imimandla emikhulu yaseMontenegro yayilawulwa yiRiphabliki yaseVenetian yaza yafakwa kwiAlbania yaseVenetian . Igama elithi "Montenegro" laqala ukusetyenziswa ukubhekisa kweli lizwe ngasekupheleni kwenkulungwane ye-15. Emva kokuwa phantsi kolawulo loBukhosi base-Ottoman, iMontenegro yafumana ukuzimela kwayo okwesibini ngo-1696 phantsi kolawulo lweNdlu yasePetrović-Njegoš, okokuqala njengolawulo lobuthixo kwaye kamva njengolawulo lwehlabathi . Ukuzimela kweMontenegro kwaqatshelwa ngamaGunya amakhulu kwiNkongolo yaseBerlin ngowe-1878. Ngowe-1910, eli lizwe laba bubukumkani .
Emva kweMfazwe Yehlabathi I, ubukumkani baba yinxalenye yeYugoslavia . Emva kokuqhekeka kweYugoslavia, iiriphabliki zaseSerbia nezaseMontenegro zidibene zamisela umanyano . Ukulandela ireferendamu yenkululeko eyayibanjwe ngoMeyi ka-2006, iMontenegro yabhengeza ukuzimela kwayo ngoJuni ka-2006 kwaye umanyano lwachithwa. 
I-Montenegro inoqoqosho oluphezulu lwengeniso ephakathi kwaye ibeka i-48 kwi- Index yoPhuhliso loLuntu . Lilungu leZizwe eziManyeneyo, i-NATO, uMbutho woRhwebo weHlabathi, uMbutho woKhuseleko kunye neNtsebenziswano eYurophu, iBhunga laseYurophu, kunye neSivumelwano soRhwebo esiKhululwa kuMbindi Yurophu . IMontenegro ikwalilungu eliseka iManyano yeMeditera, kwaye ikwinkqubo yokujoyina i-European Union . 
IMorocco &lt;/img&gt; ), ngokusemthethweni uBukumkani baseMorocco, lilizwe elikummandla waseMaghreb kuMntla-ntshona weAfrika . Ijonge uLwandle lweMeditera emantla kunye noLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki ngasentshona, kwaye inemida yomhlaba kunye neAlgeria ngasempuma, kunye nommandla ophikisanayo weNtshona yeSahara emazantsi . IMauritania imi kumazantsi eNtshona yeSahara. I-Morocco iphinda ibango i -Spanish exclaves ye -Ceuta, i-Melilla kunye ne-Peñón de Vélez de la Gomera, kunye neziqithi ezincinci ezilawulwa yi-Spanish ezikunxweme lwayo. Igubungela ummandla wama- okanye, enabemi abamalunga nezigidi ezingama-37. Unqulo lwayo olusemthethweni noluphambili bubuSilamsi, kwaye iilwimi ezisemthethweni sisiArabhu nesiBerber ; Isiyelelane saseMorocco sesiArabhu nesiFrentshi sikwathethwa kakhulu. Isazisi saseMorocco kunye nenkcubeko yingxubevange yama -Arabhu, amaBerber, amaAfrika kunye neenkcubeko zaseYurophu . Ikomkhulu layo yiRabat, ngelixa eyona dolophu inkulu iyiCasablanca . 
Kwingingqi ehlala abantu ukususela kwixesha le- Paleolithic kwiminyaka eyi-300,000 eyadlulayo, ilizwe lokuqala laseMorocco lasekwa ngu -Idris I ngo-788. Emva koko yalawulwa luthotho lweedynasties ezizimeleyo, yafikelela kwinqanaba layo njengamandla engingqi kwi-11th kunye ne-12th inkulungwane, phantsi kwe- Almoravid kunye ne-Almohad dynasties, xa yayilawula uninzi lwePeninsula yase-Iberia kunye neMaghreb. Iinkulungwane zokufuduka kwama-Arabhu ukuya eMaghreb ukusukela kwinkulungwane yesi-7 yatshintsha indawo yaseMorocco. Ngenkulungwane ye-15 neye-16, iMorocco yajongana nezoyikiso zangaphandle kulawulo lwayo, kunye nePortugal yathatha indawo ethile kunye noBukhosi base-Ottoman bungena empuma. Ubukhosi baseMarinid kunye noSaadi ngenye indlela baxhathisa ulawulo lwamazwe angaphandle, kwaye iMorocco yayikuphela kwelizwe laseMntla Afrika elasinda kulawulo lwase-Ottoman. Ubukhosi be-'Alawi, obulawula ilizwe ukuza kuthi ga namhlanje, bahlutha amandla ngo-1631, kwaye kwiinkulungwane ezimbini ezalandelayo bandisa ubudlelwane bezozakuzo kunye nezorhwebo kunye nehlabathi laseNtshona . Indawo yobuchule yaseMorocco kufutshane nomlomo weMeditera yavuselela umdla waseYurophu; Ngo-1912, iFransi neSpain zahlula ilizwe lazizikhuselo ezihlukeneyo, zigcina indawo yamazwe ngamazwe eTangier . Ukulandela izidubedube eziqhubekayo kunye nokuvukela ulawulo lwamakholoniyali, ngo-1956, iMorocco yaphinda yafumana uzimele-geqe kwaye imanyana kwakhona.
Ukusukela kwinkululeko, iMorocco ihleli izinzile. Inoqoqosho lwesihlanu ngobukhulu e-Afrika kwaye inempembelelo ebalulekileyo kwi-Afrika nakwilizwe lama -Arabhu ; ithathwa njengegunya eliphakathi kwimicimbi yehlabathi kwaye inamalungu kuManyano lweArabhu, iManyano yeMeditera kunye neManyano yeAfrika . I-Morocco lilizwe elimanyeneyo lomgaqo-siseko kunye nepalamente eyonyuliweyo. Isebe elilawulayo likhokelwa nguKumkani waseMorocco kunye nenkulumbuso, ngelixa amandla owiso-mthetho abekwe kumagumbi amabini epalamente: iNdlu yabaMeli kunye neNdlu yamaCeba . Amandla enkundla axhomekeke kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko, enokuthi iphonononge ukuba semthethweni kwemithetho, unyulo kunye nohlolo. Ukumkani unegunya elikhulu lokulawula kunye nowiso-mthetho, ngakumbi emkhosini, inkqubo yangaphandle kunye nemicimbi yenkolo; angakhupha imimiselo ebizwa ngokuba "ziidahirs", enegunya lomthetho, kwaye angayichitha ipalamente emva kokubonisana nenkulumbuso kunye nomongameli wenkundla yomgaqo-siseko.
I-Morocco ibanga ubunini bommandla ongalawulekiyo we- Western Sahara, ewunyule ukuba ngamaPhondo aseMazantsi . Ngowe-1975, emva kokuba iSpeyin ivumile ukuwushenxisa lo mmandla ize inike iMorocco neMauritania ukulawula, kwaqhambuka imfazwe yabanqolobi phakathi kwaloo magunya nabanye kubemi balapho . Ngowe-1979, iMauritania yaliyeka ibango layo kuloo mmandla, kodwa imfazwe yaqhubeka igquba. Ngowe-1991, kwenziwa isivumelwano sokuphelisa imfazwe, kodwa umbandela wolongamo awuzange uzinziswe. Namhlanje, iMorocco ibambe isibini kwisithathu sommandla, kwaye iinzame zokusombulula le ngxabano ukuza kuthi ga ngoku aziphumelelanga ukwaphula umqobo wezopolitiko.
I-Lajes Field okanye i-Lajes Air Base, i-Air Base etyunjwe ngokusemthethweni enguNombolo 4 ( "Base Aérea Nº 4", BA4, yindawo yomoya esetyenziswa ngeendlela ezininzi kufuphi neLajes kunye ne kumntla-mpuma weAngra do Heroísmo kwiSiqithi saseTerceira eAzores, ePortugal . Likhaya kwiPortuguese Air Force "Base Aérea N º4" kunye neAzores Air Zone Command, iyunithi yebutho loMkhosi woMoya waseUnited States (eqhutywa yi -65th Air Base Group of United States Air Forces in Europe - Air Forces Africa ), kunye nesikhululo sommandla wabakhweli bomoya. Imi malunga nama kwimpuma yeSixeko saseNew York kwaye malunga ne kwintshona yeLisbon, ePortugal; Isiseko sihlala kwindawo ecwangcisiweyo phakathi koMntla Melika kunye neYurophu kuLwandlekazi lweAtlantiki emantla .
Malawi okanye [maláwi] ; : "IMalaŵi" ), ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseMalawi, lilizwe elivaliweyo kuMzantsi-mpuma weAfrika elalisakuba yiNyasaland . Imida yeZambia ngasentshona, iTanzania ukuya emantla nasempuma-mpuma, kunye neMozambique ngasempuma, emazantsi nakumazantsi-ntshona. IMalawi ifikelela ngaphaya kwe kwaye inabemi abaqikelelwa kwi-19,431,566 (ukusukela ngoJanuwari 2021). Ikomkhulu laseMalawi (nesona sixeko sikhulu) yiLilongwe . Eyesibini ngobukhulu yiBlantyre, isithathu ngobukhulu yiMzuzu kwaye isine ngobukhulu likomkhulu layo langaphambili, iZomba . Igama elithi "Malawi" lisuka kwiMaravi, igama lakudala lamaChewa ahlala kule ndawo. Eli lizwe libizwa ngokuba yi “The Warm Heart of Africa” ngenxa yobuhlobo babantu balo. 
Inxalenye yeAfrika ngoku eyaziwa ngokuba yiMalawi yazinziswa malunga nenkulungwane ye-10 ngokufuduka kwamaqela e-Bantu . kwi-1891, le ndawo yayilawulwa yiBritane kwaye yaba ngumkhuseli we- United Kingdom eyaziwa ngokuba yiNyasaland. Ngo-1953, yaba lukhuselo phakathi kweFederation of Rhodesia neNyasaland eyayisele izimele. I-Federation yachithwa ngo-1963. Ngo-1964, i-protectorate yaphela: iNyasaland yaba lilizwe elizimeleyo phantsi koKumkanikazi u-Elizabeth II, kwaye yabizwa ngokuba "yiMalawi" . Kwiminyaka emibini kamva yaba yiriphabliki. Yafumana inkululeko epheleleyo kwi-United Kingdom, kwaye ngo-1970 yaba ngurhulumente weqela elinye phantsi komongameli Hastings Banda, owahlala kule ndima de kwangowe-1994. Namhlanje, iMalawi inedemokhrasi, iRiphabhlikhi enamaqela amaninzi ekhokelwa ngumongameli onyuliweyo. ULazarus Chakwera weMalawi Congress Party ukhokele iqela leTonse Alliance yamaqela alithoba ezopolitiko kwaye waphumelela kuNyulo lukaMongameli olugunyaziswe yinkundla obelubanjwe nge-23 kaJuni ngo-2020 emva kokuba unyulo lukaMongameli lukaMeyi ka-2019 lwarhoxiswa ngenxa yezitenxo ezinkulu zolonyulo. Umkhosi welizwe, uMkhosi woKhuselo waseMalawi, uquka umkhosi, umkhosi waselwandle kunye nephiko lomoya. Umgaqo-nkqubo waseMalawi wamazwe angaphandle uxhasa iNtshona . Igcina ubudlelwane obuhle bezozakuzo kunye namazwe amaninzi, kwaye ithatha inxaxheba kwimibutho yamazwe ngamazwe eliqela, kubandakanywa iZizwe eziManyeneyo, iManyano yeZizwe eziManyeneyo, uMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika (i-SADC), i- Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA), kunye ne- Afrika. Umanyano (AU).
IMalawi lelinye lawona mazwe angaphuhliswanga kangako . Uqoqosho lusekelwe kakhulu kwezolimo, kwaye lunabemi abaninzi basemaphandleni nabakhula ngokukhawuleza. Urhulumente waseMalawi uxhomekeke kakhulu kuncedo lwangaphandle ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zakhe zophuhliso, nangona isixa esifunekayo (kunye noncedo olunikezelwayo) sehlile ukususela ngo-2000. Urhulumente waseMalawi ujongene nemingeni kwiinzame zakhe zokwakha kunye nokwandisa uqoqosho, ukuphucula imfundo, ukhathalelo lwempilo, kunye nokukhuselwa kwendalo, kunye nokuzimela ngokwezimali nangona intswela-ngqesho ixhaphakile. Ukusukela ngo-2005, iMalawi iye yaqulunqa imigaqo-nkqubo eliqela egxile ekujonganeni nale miba, kwaye imbonakalo yelizwe ibonakala iphucuka: Iimpawu eziphambili zenkqubela phambili kuqoqosho, imfundo, kunye nokhathalelo lwezempilo zabonwa ngo-2007 no-2008.
IMalawi iphila ubomi obuphantsi kwaye iphezulu kakhulu yokusweleka kweentsana . I-HIV/AIDS ixhaphake kakhulu, nto leyo enciphisa abasebenzi kwaye ifuna ukonyuka kwenkcitho karhulumente. Eli lizwe linabemi abahlukahlukeneyo abaquka abemi bomthonyama, abemi baseAsia nabaseYurophu . Ziliqela iilwimi ezithethwayo, yaye kukho intaphane yeenkolelo zonqulo. Nangona ngaphambili bekukho ungquzulwano lwengingqi ngamaxesha athile oluphenjelelwa yiyantlukwano yobuhlanga, ngo-2008 olu ngquzulwano lwangaphakathi lwaye lwehla kakhulu, kwaye nombono wokuzimanya nobuzwe bukabani baseMalawi iye yaphinda yavela.
ICanosa di Puglia, eyaziwa ngokuba yiCanosa, yidolophu kunye "nedolophu" kwiphondo laseBarletta-Andria-Trani, eApulia, kumazantsi e-Itali. Itholakala phakathi kweBari kunye neFoggia, kumda osemntla-ntshona we-plateau ye- Murgia elawula i- Ofanto Valley kunye namathafa abanzi aseTavoliere delle Puglie, ukusuka kwiNtaba yeVulture e- Gargano, ukuya kunxweme lwase -Adriatic . ICanosa, iCanusium yaseRoma, ithathwa njengeziko eliphambili lezakudala lase-Apulia, kwaye sesinye sezona zixeko zidala ezihlala abantu e-Itali. Inani leevazi kunye nezinye izinto ezifunyenweyo ze-archaeological zifumaneka kwiimyuziyam zasekhaya kunye neengqokelela zabucala. Akukude kwisikhundla soMlambo i-Ofanto apho amaRoma afumana indawo yokusabela emva kokoyiswa kweMfazwe yaseCannae kwaye yindawo yokungcwaba yaseBohemund I yaseAntiyokwe.
ISkalbmierz ngumasipala wasePoland wasezidolophini-semaphandleni kwiSithili seKazimierza Wielka, iHoly Cross Voivodeship.Ithatha indawo eyi-86.21 km² kwaye ngo- 2004 yayinabemi abangama-6,957.
Umdaka ngumbala. Inokuthi ithathwe njengombala odibeneyo, kodwa ubukhulu becala ngumthunzi omnyama we-orange. Kwimodeli yombala we-CMYK esetyenziselwa ukuprinta kunye nokupeyinta, umdaka uvame ukwenziwa ngokudibanisa imibala e-orange kunye nomnyama. Kwimodeli yombala we-RGB esetyenziselwa ukuveza imibala kwizikrini zikamabonwakude kunye neemonitha zekhompyuter, umdaka udibanisa obomvu noluhlaza.
Umbala omdaka ubonwa ngokubanzi kwindalo, iinkuni, umhlaba, umbala weenwele zomntu, umbala wamehlo kunye nombala wolusu . UBrown ngumbala womthi omnyama okanye umhlaba otyebileyo. 
Ngokutsho kohlolisiso olwenziwa ngabantu baseYurophu naseUnited States, umdaka ngowona mbala ungawuthandiyo uluntu; idla ngokunxulunyaniswa nokucaca, i-rustic, indle, kunye nobuhlwempu, nangona inakho unxulumano oluhle, kuquka ukubhaka, ukufudumala, izilwanyana zasendle kunye nokwindla.
Iorenji sisiqhamo seentlobo ezahlukeneyo ze-citrus kwintsapho yaseRutaceae (jonga uluhlu lwezityalo ezaziwa ngokuba ziorenji ); ibhekisa ikakhulu "kwiCitrus" × "sinensis", ekwabizwa ngokuba yiorenji eswiti, ukuyahlula "kwiCitrus × aurantium" ehambelana nayo, ekubhekiselwa kuyo njengeorenji ekrakra . I-orange emnandi ivelisa i-asexually ( i-apomixis ngokusebenzisa i-nucellar embryony ); Iindidi ze-orenji eziswiti zivela ngotshintsho. 
Iorenji ngumxube phakathi kwepomelo ( "Citrus maxima" ) kunye nemandarin ( "Citrus reticulata" ). The chloroplast genome, and therefore the maternal line, is that of pomelo. Iorenji eswiti inegenome yayo epheleleyo elandelelanayo . 
Iorenji yavela kummandla oquka i-Southern China, uMntla-mpuma we-Indiya, kunye neMyanmar, kwaye ukukhankanywa kwangaphambili kwe-orenji eswiti yayikuncwadi lwesiTshayina ngo-314 BC. , orange trees were found to be the most cultivated fruit tree in the world. Imithi ye-orenji ikhuliswa kakhulu kwiindawo ezishushu kunye nemozulu eshushu ngenxa yeziqhamo zayo ezimnandi. Isiqhamo somthi we-orenji sinokutyiwa sisitsha, okanye silungiselwe incindi yaso okanye amaxolo anuka kamnandi. , sweet oranges accounted for approximately 70% of citrus production.
Ngo-2019, i-79 yezigidi zeetoni zeeorenji zakhuliswa kwihlabathi jikelele, kwaye iBrazil ivelisa i-22% yetotali, ilandelwa yi -China ne -Indiya . 
Isikhululo sikaloliwe saseFoggia
Isikhululo sikaloliwe saseFoggia ikhonza isixeko kunye "ne-comuni" yaseFoggia, kummandla wase- Apulia, e-Southern Italy . Ivulwe ngo-1864, iyinxalenye ye- Adriatic Railway (Ancona-Lecce), kwaye sisiphelo sikaloliwe waseNaples-Foggia . It is also a junction for several other, secondary lines, namely the Foggia–Manfredonia, Lucera–Foggia and Foggia–Potenza railways.
Isikhululo ngoku silawulwa yi -Rete Ferroviaria Italiana (RFI). However, the commercial area of the passenger building is managed by Centostazioni. Iinkonzo zikaloliwe ziqhutywa yi -Trenitalia . Nganye kwezi nkampani iphantsi kweFerrovie dello Stato (FS), inkampani kaloliwe yase-Italiyane.
ILimassol yamaRomany : _ "Lemesós" 
 [lemeˈsos] ; : "Limasol"
okanye Leymosun ) sisixeko esikunxweme olusemazantsi eSipro kunye nekomkhulu lesithili esinegama elifanayo . ILimassol yindawo yesibini ngobukhulu edolophini eSipro emva kweNicosia, enabemi basezidolophini abangama-183,658 kunye nabemi bedolophu abangama-239,842. 
Kwi-2014, i-Limassol yabekwa kwindawo ye -TripAdvisor njengendawo yesi-3 ephezulu kwaye ezayo kwihlabathi, kwiindawo zayo eziPhezulu zokuKhetha zabahambi ezili-10 kuluhlu lokunyuka. Esi sixeko sikwabekwe kwindawo yama-89 kwihlabathi liphela kuPhando lweMercer lokuPhila (2017). 
Kwinqanaba lika-2020 elipapashwe yiGlobalization kunye neWorld Cities Research Network, iLimassol yahlelwa njenge "Gamma -" isixeko sehlabathi . 
Okubizwa ngokuba yi- split yisikhundla esithathwa ngumzimba womntu apho imilenze ihambelana neendlela ezichaseneyo, ngokufanelekileyo yenza i-angle ye-180 °. Ukuphunyezwa kwayo kufuna, ngokukodwa, ukuguquguquka okukhulu kwezihlunu ezifana ne- hip flexors, i-quadriceps kunye ne-hamstrings. A 
Ukwahlula kwenziwa ikakhulu kwimisebenzi yezemidlalo efana nejimnastiki, umdaniso, ubugcisa bokulwa, ukuqubha okuhambelanayo, kunye nokutyibiliza ngomfanekiso.
Badla ngokudlala indima ethile okanye banokuba yinxalenye yobuchule bezemidlalo obuvavanywayo ebudeni bokhuphiswano, ngoxa kwimeko yekarati busebenza ukuze kuzuzwe ukukhaba okukhulu ngakumbi. Ukwahlula kwenziwa kwakhona kwi -yoga (njengaseHanumanasana, okanye i-monkey pose). Okokugqibela, ngokulula ngakumbi, banokubonisa indlela yokwelula.
2022 FIFuRoni da Futboll
2022 FIFuRoni da Futboll yayiyiNdebe yeHlabathi yeFIFA yama-22, iNdebe yeHlabathi yeFIFA ka - 2022, ubuntshatsheli behlabathi bequadrennial kumaqela esizwe ebhola ekhatywayo eququzelelwe yiFIFA. Kwenzeke eQatar ukusuka kwi-20 kaNovemba ukuya kwi-18 kaDisemba 2022, emva kokuba ilizwe linikezelwe ngamalungelo okubamba kwi-2010. YayiyiNdebe yeHlabathi yokuqala ukubanjwa kwilizwe lama-Arabhu namaSilamsi, kwaye eyesibini ukubanjwa ngokupheleleyo e-Asia emva kwetumente ka-2002 eMzantsi Korea naseJapan.
Le tumente ibiyeyokugqibela enamaqela angama-32 athathe inxaxheba, inani lamaqela linyuswe laya kutsho kuma-48 kuhlelo luka-2026 . Ukunqanda ukugqithiswa kwemozulu eshushu yaseQatar, umcimbi wawubanjwe ngoNovemba noDisemba. Yabanjwa ngexesha elincitshisiweyo leentsuku ezingama-29 kunye nemidlalo engama-64 edlalwa kwiindawo ezisibhozo kwizixeko ezihlanu. I-Qatar ingene kulo mcimbi-iNdebe yeHlabathi yabo yokuqala-ngokuzenzekelayo njengeqela lesizwe lomkhosi, kunye namaqela angama-31 agqitywe yinkqubo yokufaneleka.
IArgentina yabekwa njengengqwelomoya emva kokuphumelela umdlalo wokugqibela kwiFrance 4-2 kwiipenalti emva kokutsala 3-3 emva kwexesha elongezelelweyo. Yayilixesha lesithathu leArgentina, ibe yayilixesha labo lokuqala ukususela ngo-1986, kwakunye nelizwe lokuqala ngaphandle kweYurophu eliphumelele ukhuphiswano ukususela ngo-2002.
 okanye iNiger ngokusemthethweni iRiphabhlikhi yaseNiger lilizwe elingenamanzi eNtshona Afrika. Lilizwe elidibeneyo elingumda weLibya kumntla-mpuma, iChad empuma, iNigeria emazantsi, iBenin neBurkina Faso emazantsi ntshona, iMali entshona neAlgeria emantla ntshona.
Igama livela kuMlambo iNiger ogeleza entshona yelizwe; ithiyori malunga nemvelaphi yegama lomlambo kukuba livela kwisiTuareg n'eghirren elithetha 'amanzi agelezayo'. Ukubiza amagama ngesiFrentshi ngu /niːˈʒɛər/, ngelixa kwii-media zesiNgesi /ˈnaɪdʒər/ kusetyenziswa.
I-TV Diário (i-Daily TV) sisikhululo sikamabonwakude eBrazil esizinze kwisixeko saseFortaleza, ikomkhulu lelizwe laseCeará. Kukwa-Sistema Verdes Mares, enye yeengqungquthela zeendaba eziphambili zelizwe, ezibandakanya i-TV Verdes Mares, i-FM 93 kunye ne-Verdes Mares kunye nephephandaba "i-Diário do Nordeste". Isikhululo saziwa ngokuvelisa inkqubo yasekhaya ngokupheleleyo egxile kwizithethe zoMmandla waseMntla-mpuma weBrazil.
I-Télé Tchad yinkampani yoluntu evelisa kunye neenkqubo zokusasaza kunomathotholo nakumabonakude e-Chad . Yayilwa ngoDisemba 10, 1987 , isasaza ngesiFrentshi nesiArabhu.
Aupaluk (inuktitut: "ᐊᐅᐸᓗᒃ") ilali esemantla eNunavik, kwingingqi yaseNord-du-Québec yaseQuebec . Yeyona ndawo inabantu abaninzi abangama- Inuit eNunavik .
Igama lithetha "apho umhlaba ubomvu khona", libhekisela kumhlaba wawo onentsimbi.
Abemi bayo bayanda: yayiyi-195 ngo-2011, isuka kwi-159 ngo-2001.
I-Aupaluk ifumaneka kunxweme olusentshona Unawe Foundation, emantla Tasiujaqname kwaye 80 km emzantsi Kangirsuk.
Inikezelwa sisikhululo seenqwelomoya saseAupaluk esikufuphi.
Ukususela ngo-1996, i-Kativik Regional Police Force (KRPF) ibonelela ngeenkonzo zamapolisa kule lali.
Ngo-2023 eNigerien coup d'état
Ngomhla wama-26 kaJulayi 2023, amajoni avela kunogada waseNiger wabamba uMongameli u-Mohamed Bazoum, ngelixa elinye iqela lamajoni labhengeza ukubhukuqwa kwakhe, ukuvala imida yelizwe, ukumisa amaziko karhulumente kunye nokuvakalisa ixesha lokuhamba komntu ngelixa bebhengeza ukwakhiwa kwe-junta. 
Le yayiyimbambano yesibini yemfazwe ukususela ekuzuzeni ilizwe inkululeko ngowe-1960.
Ngo-Agasti 10, 2023, i-Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) yagqiba ekubeni igcine ukhetho lokungenelela emkhosini eNiger. ngaloo ndlela ivula indlela yokuhlanganisa umkhosi ekufuneka ubukhulu becala ubunjwe ngamajoni aseNigeria naseSenegal..
Ubhukuqo-mbuso lolwesixhenxe ukwenzeka eNtshona nakuMbindi Afrika ukusukela ngo-2020 
UTélé Sahel ngumsasazi welizwe laseNtshona Afrika eNiger. Ilawulwa kwaye iqhutywa yiOfisi kaRhulumente yeRadio kunye neTelevishini yaseNiger, izikhululo zayo zisasazwa kuwo onke amaziko asezidolophini. Eyasungulwa kwi-1964, uMoussa Saley unguMlawuli Jikelele wangoku. 
I-Télé Sahel yasetyenziselwa ukusasaza isibhengezo se -2023 Nigerien coup d'état.
Amadou Abdramane (IsiArabhu: أمادو عبدالرحمن‎) ligosa loMkhosi woMoya waseNigerien osebenze njengesithethi seBhunga leSizwe loKhuseleko lweLizwe ukusukela ngo-2023 eNigerien coup d'état ngomhla wama-26 kaJulayi 2023 kwaye wathatha inxaxheba ekumiselweni kuka- Abdourahamane Tchiani njengoMongameli welizwe. IRiphabhlikhi yaseNiger . 
Amadou Abdramane ligosa loMkhosi woMoya waseNigerien osebenze njengesithethi seBhunga leSizwe loKhuseleko lweLizwe ukusukela ngo-2023 eNigerien coup d'état ngomhla wama-26 kaJulayi 2023 kwaye wathatha inxaxheba ekumiselweni kuka- Abdourahamane Tchiani njengoMongameli welizwe. IRiphabhlikhi yaseNiger . 
Ngo-2023 i-Nigerian coup d'état
IBoeing 737 yinqwelo moya emxinwa eveliswe nguBoeing kwiifektri zayo i-Everett kunye neRenton eWashington .Iphuhliselwe ukuncedisa i- Boeing 727 kwiindlela ezimfutshane nezibhityileyo, i-twinjet igcina ububanzi be-fuselage engama-707 kunye nezihlalo ezithandathu ezilinganayo kodwa zine-underwing turbofans ezimbini endaweni yezine. Kucingelwa ukuba ngo-1964, i-737-100 yokuqala yenza inqwelomoya yayo yokuqala ngo-Epreli ka-1967 yaza yaqalisa inkonzo ngoFebruwari ka-1968 eLufthansa .I-737-200 eyandisiweyo yangena kwinkonzo ngo-Epreli 1968, kwaye yavela kwizizukulwana ezine, inikezela ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo zabakhweli abangama-85 ukuya kuma-215.
Ii-737-100/200 ezahluka-hlukeneyo zaye zanikwa amandla yi- Pratt &amp; Whitney JT8D ii-injini ezidlulayo eziphantsi kwaye zinika indawo yokuhlala abantu abangama-85 ukuya kwi-130. Yaziswa ngo-1980 kwaye yaziswa ngo-1984, i- 737 Classic -300/400/500 ezahlukeneyo zaphuculwa kunye ne -CFM56-3 turbofans kwaye zinika i-110 kwizihlalo ze-168. Yaziswa ngo-1997, i -737 Next Generation (NG) -600/700/800/900 ezahlukeneyo ziye zahlaziywa i-CFM56-7 turbofans, iphiko elikhulu kunye ne- cockpit yeglasi ephuculweyo, kunye nesihlalo se-108 ukuya kuma-215 abakhweli. Isizukulwana samva nje, i- 737 MAX, 737-7/8/9/10 MAX, inikwe amandla yi- CFM LEAP -1B ephezulu ye-bypass turbofans kunye ne-138 ukuya kwi-204 abantu, bangene kwinkonzo kwi-2017.
Ulwaluko, ulwaluko kunye nokwaluka kukusuka ebuntwaneni ukuya ebudaleni, lisiko lamandulo lokwaluka elalisenziwa (nangona kwakungengawo lodwa) ngamaXhosa, kwaye liqhele ukwenziwa kuMzantsi Afrika wonke. Eli siko ngokwesithethe sijongwa njengeziko lokufundisa, ukulungiselela ulutsha olungamadoda uxanduva lobudoda. Inkwenkwe engekakoluki kuthiwa "yinkwenkwe" (inkwenkwe), nokuba ingakanani na ubudala, kwaye ayivumelekanga ukuba ithabathe inxaxheba kwizinto zamadoda ezifana neentlanganiso zezizwe. 
Igama elithi hammer pneumatic, ekwabizwa ngokuba yimotopick, libhekisa kumatshini wokomba wepercussion. Isetyenziselwa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, kumsebenzi wokutyunyuzwa kwamatye okanye umsebenzi wokwembiwa kwendlela.
Imidlalo yePasifiki ka-2023
IMidlalo yePasifiki ka-2023 iya kuba luhlelo lwe-17 lwetumente ye- Oceania ephezulu yemidlalo emininzi kwaye iya kubanjelwa eHoniara, kwiiSolomon Islands, iphawula okokuqala ukuba isixeko sibambe imidlalo.
Abdourahamane Tchiani
Abdourahamane Tchiani (enye indlela: Abdourahmane Tchiani ) wazalwa ngo-1960 okanye ngo-1961) ligosa lomkhosi laseNiger elingumongameli weBhunga leSizwe loKhuseleko lweLizwe, umbutho womkhosi waseNiger.
U-Abdourahamane Tchiani uvela kwiNgingqi yaseTillabéri, eyona ndawo iphambili yokuqesha umkhosi waseNiger kwintshona yelizwe. Ulilungu lamaHausa. Wajoyina umkhosi kwi-1984 waza wafunda kwiSikolo seSizwe samaGosa aSebenzayo eThiès, eSenegal. 
Ukuhluthwa kwamandla.
